Subtitle: Eleanor? Come on in.
Eleanor? Come on in.
Hi, Eleanor. I'm Michael.
How are you today?
I'm great. Thanks for asking.
Oh, one question. Where am I?
Translation:
오, 질문이 하나 있어요 여기가 어디죠? 당신은 누구고
무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거죠?

Subtitle: Who are you, and what's going on?
Translation:
여기가 어디죠? 당신은 누구고
무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거죠?

Subtitle: Right, so, you, Eleanor Shellstrop, are dead.
Your life on Earth has ended, / and you are now in the next phase of your existence in the universe.
Translation:
지구에서의 당신의 삶은
끝났습니다 / 그리고 당신은 지금 우주에서
다음 단계의 존재가 됐어요

Subtitle: Cool. Cool. I have some questions.
Thought you might. [chuckles]
How did I die? I don't remember.
Translation: 제가 어떻게 죽었죠? 기억이 안 나요

Subtitle: Yes, um, in cases of traumatic or embarrassing deaths, / we erase the memory to allow for a peaceful transition.
Translation:
네, 충격적이고 당혹스러운
죽음의 경우에 / 우리는 기억을 지워서 전환이
평화롭게 이뤄지도록 합니다

Subtitle: Are you sure you want to hear?
All right, so you were in a grocery store parking lot.
You dropped a bottle of something called, "Lonely Gal Margarita Mix for One."
Translation:
당신이 병을 하나
떨어뜨렸는데, 그건 '외로운 여자를 위한
마가리타 믹스'였어요

Subtitle: And when you bent down to pick it up, a long column of shopping carts / that were being returned to the shopping cart collection area / rolled out of control and plowed right into you.
Translation:
당신이 그걸 집으려고 구부리자
쇼핑 카트 반환 구역으로 / 들어오던 긴 쇼핑 카트 행렬이 / 걷잡을 수 없이 굴러와서
당신을 덮쳤어요

Subtitle: -Oof. That's how I died? -No, sorry, there's more.
Translation: 제가 그렇게 죽었다고요? 아뇨, 미안하지만 더 있어요

Subtitle: You were able to grab on to the front of the column of shopping carts, / but it'd swept you right out into the street / where you were struck and killed by a mobile billboard truck advertising / an erectile dysfunction pill called "Engorge-ulate."
Translation:
당신은 제일 앞의
쇼핑 카트를 붙잡았지만 / 그게 당신을 길바닥으로
밀어내 버렸어요 / 거기서 당신은 이동 광고 트럭에
치여서 사망했어요 / '인고지율레이트'라는 발기 부전
치료 약을 광고하던 차였죠

Subtitle: Funnily enough, the first EMT to arrive was an ex-boyfriend of yours--
Translation:
더 재미있는 건, 현장에 도착한
첫 응급요원이 당신 전 애인이었죠

Subtitle: Okay, that's... I get it, thank you.
-Oh, okay, sorry. -Um, so who was right?
Translation: 오, 좋아요, 미안해요 그럼 누가 맞았던 거죠?

Subtitle: I mean about all of this?
Well, let's see. Hindus are a little bit right, / Muslims a little bit. Jews, Christians, Buddhists, / every religion guessed about 5%, / -except for Doug Forcett. -Who's Doug Forcett?
Translation:
글쎄요, 봅시다
힌두교도 조금 맞고 / 이슬람교도 조금은 맞죠 유대교, 기독교, 불교 모두
5% 정도는 맞혔어요 / 유대교, 기독교, 불교 모두
5% 정도는 맞혔어요 / 더그 포세트만 빼고 말이죠 더그 포세트가 누구죠?

Subtitle: Well, Doug was a stoner kid who lived in Calgary during the 1970s.
One night, he got really high on mushrooms, / and his best friend, Randy, said, / "Hey, what do you think happens after we die?"
Translation:
어느 날 밤, 마약에 잔뜩
취해 있는데 / 그의 가장 가까운 친구인
랜디가 이렇게 말했어요 / '이봐, 우리가 죽으면
어떻게 된다고 생각해?'

Subtitle: And Doug just launched into this long monologue / where he got like 92% correct.
Translation:
그러자 더그가 혼자
긴 독백을 시작했어요 / 그는 거기서 92% 정도 맞혔어요

Subtitle: [chuckles] I mean, we couldn't believe what we were hearing.
Translation:
우리는 우리 귀를 의심하지
않을 수 없었어요

Subtitle: That's him, actually, right up there.
Translation:
저게 그죠, 저 위에 있네요
여기선 꽤 유명하죠

Subtitle: He's pretty famous around here.
Translation:
저게 그죠, 저 위에 있네요
여기선 꽤 유명하죠 "더그 포세트"

Subtitle: I'm very lucky to have that.
-So... -[chuckles]
Maybe my biggest question. Am I...
I mean, is this...
Or...
Well, it's not the heaven-or-hell idea that you were raised on.
Translation:
글쎄요, 이건 당신이 생각하는 천국이냐
지옥이냐의 문제가 아니죠

Subtitle: But generally speaking, in the afterlife, / there's a Good Place and there's a Bad Place.
Translation:
하지만 일반적으로 말하면 사후 세계에는 굿 플레이스와
배드 플레이스가 있어요 / 사후 세계에는 굿 플레이스와
배드 플레이스가 있어요

Subtitle: You're in The Good Place.
-[exhales sharply] -You're okay, Eleanor.
You're in The Good Place.
Well, that's good.
Sure is. [laughs]
Okay, let's take a walk, shall we?
Oh, did I have a purse? No, I'm dead, right. Okay.
Translation: 오, 제가 지갑이 있었나요? 아니야, 난 죽었지, 됐어

Subtitle: So, this is how it works.
The Good Place is divided into distinct neighborhoods.
Translation:
굿 플레이스는 구별되는 몇 개
지역으로 나뉘어 있어요 "무한한 빛"

Subtitle: Each one contains exactly 322 people / who have been perfectly selected / to blend together into a blissful harmonic balance.
Translation:
각 지역엔 정확히 322명이 있죠 "당신이 기대한 일용품" "작은 애완동물 판매점" / 그들은 완벽하게 선별돼서 / 함께 어울려서 더없이
행복한 조화를 이루게 되죠

Subtitle: Do all the neighborhoods look like this?
No, every neighborhood is unique. Some have warm weather, some cold.
Translation:
아니요, 모든 지역은
각각 특징이 있어요 어떤 지역은 따뜻하고
어떤 지역은 추워요

Subtitle: Some are cities, some farmland.
Translation:
어떤 지역은 도시이고
어떤 지역은 농장이에요

Subtitle: But in each one, every blade of grass, / every ladybug, every detail has been / precisely designed and calibrated for its residents.
Translation:
하지만 각 지역에서는
모든 풀잎과 무당벌레와 / 하지만 각 지역에서는
모든 풀잎과 무당벌레와 모든 자세한 부분들이 / 그곳의 거주민들에게 맞게
정확히 설계되고 보정돼 있죠

Subtitle: There's a lot of frozen yogurt places.
Yeah. [sighs]
That's the one thing we put in all the neighborhoods.
Translation:
그건 우리가 모든 지역에
만들어 놓은 거예요

Subtitle: People love frozen yogurt. I don't know what to tell you.
Translation:
사람들이 프로즌 요구르트를
좋아해서요 뭘 더 말해야 할지 모르겠네요

Subtitle: You're gonna have a million more questions, I know.
Translation:
궁금한 게 셀 수 없이
많을 거예요

Subtitle: For right now, better grab a seat.
Translation:
지금 당장은 자리 잡고
앉는 게 좋겠어요

Subtitle: Movie's about to begin.
Ah. [chuckles] Hello, everyone.
And welcome to your first day in the afterlife.
You were all, simply put, good people.
Translation:
여러분은 모두 간단히 말해
좋은 사람들입니다

Subtitle: But how do we know that you were good?
Translation:
하지만 어떻게 우리가 여러분이
좋은 사람이었는지 알까요?

Subtitle: How are we sure?
During your time on Earth, every one of your actions / had a positive or a negative value, / depending on how much good or bad that action put into the universe.
Translation:
"선과 악" 여러분이 지구에 있을 때
여러분이 한 모든 행위는 / 긍정적이거나 부정적인
가치를 가졌습니다 / 그 행동이 우주에 얼마만큼의 선 또는 악을 추가했는지에
따라서 말이죠

Subtitle: Every sandwich you ate, every time you bought a magazine, / every single thing you did / had an effect that rippled out over time / and ultimately created some amount of good or bad.
Translation:
여러분이 먹은 모든 샌드위치 여러분이 산 모든 잡지, 그리고 / 여러분이 한 모든 일은 / 시간이 흐름에 따라
파급효과를 일으켜서 / 결국 어느 정도 분량의
선 또는 악을 만들어냈어요

Subtitle: You know how some people pull into the breakdown lane / when there's traffic?
Translation:
차가 막힐 때
어떤 사람들은 갓길로 / 끼어드는 거 아시죠?

Subtitle: And they think to themselves, "Ah, who cares? No one's watching."
Translation:
그리고 그들은 생각하죠
'뭐 어때? 아무도 안 보는데'

Subtitle: We were watching.
Surprise!
Anyway, when your time on Earth has ended, / we calculate the total value of your life / using our perfectly accurate measuring system.
Translation:
어쨌든, 지구에서 여러분의
시간이 끝날 때 / 우리는 여러분의 삶의
총 가치를 계산합니다 / 완벽하게 정확한 우리의
측정시스템을 이용해서요

Subtitle: Only the people with the very highest scores, / the true cream of the crop, get to come here, to The Good Place.
Translation:
가장 높은 점수를
가진 사람들만이 / 소수의 선택된 사람들만이
이곳, 굿 플레이스에 오게 됩니다

Subtitle: What happens to everyone else, you ask?
Don't worry about it.
The point is, you are here because you lived one of the very best lives / that could be lived.
Translation:
중요한 건 여러분이
여기에 있다는 사실입니다 여러분은 가능한 최고의
삶을 살았기 때문입니다 / 여러분은 가능한 최고의
삶을 살았기 때문입니다

Subtitle: And you won't be alone. Your true soulmate is here too.
Translation:
그리고 여러분은 혼자가 아닙니다 여러분의 진정한 소울메이트도
여기에 있기 때문입니다

Subtitle: -[crowd gasps and murmurs] -That's right. Soulmates are real.
One of the other people in your neighborhood / is your actual soulmate, and you will spend eternity together.
Translation:
여러분의 지역에 있는
사람 중 한 사람이 / 여러분의 실제 소울메이트입니다 그리고 여러분은 영원히
함께 할 것입니다

Subtitle: So welcome to eternal happiness.
Welcome to The Good Place.
Sponsored by...
Otters holding hands while they sleep.
You know the way you feel when you see / a picture of two otters holding hands?
Translation:
수달 두 마리가 손을
잡고 있는 사진을 볼 때 / 어떤 감정을 느끼시나요?

Subtitle: That's how you're gonna feel every day.
Translation:
그것이 여러분이 매일
느끼게 될 감정입니다

Subtitle: So who is in The Bad Place that would shock me?
Translation:
그럼 누가 배드 플레이스에 있죠?
내가 놀랄 만한 사람 말이에요

Subtitle: Uh... Well, Mozart, Picasso, Elvis, / basically every artist ever, / uh, every US president except Lincoln.
Translation:
글쎄요, 모차르트 피카소, 엘비스
기본적으로 모든 예술가와 / 피카소, 엘비스
기본적으로 모든 예술가와 / 링컨을 뺀 모든 미국 대통령이죠

Subtitle: [Eleanor] That sounds about right. What about Florence Nightingale?
Translation: 그 말이 대충 맞는 거 같아요 플로렌스 나이팅게일은요?

Subtitle: [Michael] It was close, but, no, she didn't make it.
Translation:
그녀도 여기 올 뻔했죠
하지만 오지 못했어요

Subtitle: Wow, all those amazing people down there, it just seems so hard to believe.
Translation:
와, 지구에서 그렇게
훌륭했던 사람들인데 정말 믿기 힘들어요

Subtitle: Again, it's an incredibly selective system.
Translation:
다시 말하지만, 이건 대단히
선별적인 시스템이에요

Subtitle: Most people don't make it here.
But you, a lawyer who got innocent people off death row, / you're special, Eleanor.
Translation:
하지만 당신은 변호사로서 결백한
사람들을 사형에서 구해줬어요 / 당신은 특별해요, 엘리너

Subtitle: And by the way, welcome to your new home.
Translation:
그래서 어쨌든 당신의 새집에 오신 걸
환영합니다!

Subtitle: -[Michael] Oh, it's perfect, isn't it? -[gasps]
You see, in The Good Place, / every person gets to live in a home that perfectly matches his or her true essence.
Translation:
굿 플레이스에서는
모든 사람이 자기의 / 굿 플레이스에서는
모든 사람이 자기의 본성에 완벽하게 맞는
집에 살게 되죠

Subtitle: Cool.
So I guess that's why my house, for example, / is this adorable little cottage, / whereas other people might have homes that are bigger, / like that one.
Translation:
그래서 아마도 제집은 / 이렇게 사랑스럽고
조그마한 오두막인 것 같아요 / 다른 사람들은 저것같이 / 더 큰 집을 가지겠지만요

Subtitle: [Michael] Exactly. Oh, I'm so happy you get it.
As you can see, the interior has been decorated just as you like it, / in the Icelandic primitive style.
Translation:
보다시피, 내부는 당신의
취향에 맞게 꾸몄어요 / 아이슬란드식 소박한 스타일로요

Subtitle: Oh, oh, and, uh, of course, you love clowns, so...
Translation:
오, 물론 당신이 좋아하는
광대들도 있죠, 그래서...

Subtitle: I do love clowns.
Now, let me show you the, uh, the video system here.
Translation: 이제 여기 있는 비디오 시스템을 보여줄게요

Subtitle: You can review everything that happened in your life / from your point of view.
Translation:
당신의 삶에서 일어난
모든 일을 / 당신의 관점에서
다시 볼 수 있어요

Subtitle: There we go.
This is your human rights mission to the Ukraine.
Translation:
이건 당신이 우크라이나에서
벌인 인권 활동이에요

Subtitle: I mean, you got a ton of points for that one.
It really put you over the top.
Oh.
Chidi, come on in.
Eleanor? I'm Chidi Anagonye, / and you are my soulmate.
Translation: 엘리너? 난 치디 아나곤예입니다 / 당신의 소울메이트죠

Subtitle: Cool! Bring it in, man.
Now, excuse me. I have other people to attend to.
Translation: 전 이만 실례할게요 돌봐드릴 다른 사람들이 있어서요

Subtitle: So where you from, Chidi?
Well, I was born in Nigeria, raised in Senegal, / but my work took me all over the place.
Translation:
전 나이지리아에서 태어나서
세네갈에서 컸어요 / 하지만 일은 여러 곳에서 했어요

Subtitle: Australia, Hong Kong, Paris.
What about you?
Uh, well, I... I was born in Phoenix.
-Mmm-hmm. -Arizona.
And then I went to school in Tempe, Arizona.
Translation:
그리고 학교는 애리조나 주
템피에서 다녔어요

Subtitle: And then I moved back to Phoenix, Arizona.
Your English is amazing.
Oh! I'm actually speaking French.
This place just translates whatever you say / into a language the other person can understand.
Translation:
전 실제로는 프랑스어로
말하고 있어요 여기서는 무슨 언어를 하든지 / 다른 사람이 이해할 수 있는
언어로 번역을 해주죠

Subtitle: -So it's incredible. -Whoa.
-And now I want to say this. -Mmm-kay.
Translation: 이제 이 말을 하고 싶어요 좋아요

Subtitle: Eleanor.
I have spent my entire life in pursuit of fundamental truths about the universe.
Translation:
난 내 전 생애를 우주에 관한 근본적 진리를
탐구하는 데 바쳤어요

Subtitle: And now we can actually learn about them together as soulmates.
Translation: 이제 우리가 함께 소울메이트로서 이걸 배워나갈 수 있어요

Subtitle: It's overwhelming.
Chidi. You'll stand by my side no matter what, right?
Translation:
치디 당신은 무슨 일이 있어도
내 편이 돼 줄 거죠?

Subtitle: -Of course I will. -Promise me. Say, "I promise / I will never betray you for any reason."
Translation:
물론이에요 약속해줘요, '약속해요' / '절대 어떤 일이 있어도 당신을
배신하지 않을게요'라고 해줘요

Subtitle: Eleanor, I swear / that I will never say or do anything / to cause you any harm.
Translation:
엘리너, 맹세해요 / 전 당신에게 어떤 해를 주는 / 말을 하거나 그런 행동을
하지 않을 거예요

Subtitle: Good.
Because those aren't my memories.
I wasn't a lawyer. I never went to the Ukraine.
Translation:
전 변호사가 아니었어요
전 우크라이나에 간 적이 없어요

Subtitle: I hate clowns.
There's been a big mistake.
I'm not supposed to be here.
Wait, what?
Are you sure this isn't you?
Yeah, man, I'm pretty sure I wasn't a death-row lawyer / who collected clown paintings and rescued orphans.
Translation:
네, 그래요, 아주 확실해요
난 사형 전문 변호사가 아니었어요 / 그림을 수집하지도, 고아들을
구호하지도 않았고요

Subtitle: They got my name right, but nothing else.
Translation:
그들이 제 이름은 맞혔지만
나머지는 다 틀렸어요

Subtitle: I mean, somebody royally forked up. [chuckles]
Somebody forked up.
Why can't I say "fork"?
If you're trying to curse, you can't here.
Translation:
여기선 욕을 하려고 해도
할 수가 없어요

Subtitle: I guess a lot of people in this neighborhood / don't like it, so it's prohibited.
Translation:
이 지역의 많은 사람이 / 그걸 싫어할 거예요
그래서 금지되어 있어요

Subtitle: That's bull-shirt.
So, if you're not this person, then who are you?
Translation:
당신이 이 사람이 아니라면
그럼, 당신은 누구죠?

Subtitle: What did you do for a living?
I was... In...
Sales.
So we sell two products here, NasaPRO and NasaPRO Silver.
Translation:
우린 여기서 두 가지 제품을 팔죠
나사프로와 나사프로 실버예요

Subtitle: We aim this at seniors.
Now, you can't legally call it "medicine"
Translation:
이건 법적으로 약이라고
할 수 없어요

Subtitle: because it doesn't technically work / and it is technically chalk, so what you're gonna want to do--
Translation:
왜냐하면 기술적으로
그런 효능이 없으니까요 / 이건 기술적으로 분필이에요
그래서 당신이 해야 할 일은...

Subtitle: You need me to lie to old people and scare them into buying fake medicine.
Translation:
노인들에게 거짓말하고 겁을 줘서
가짜 약을 사게 하라는 거네요

Subtitle: I get it, man. Which one's my desk?
So your job was to defraud the elderly...
Translation:
그럼 당신의 일은 노인들에게
사기 치는 거였군요?

Subtitle: Sorry, the sick and elderly?
But I was very good at it.
Translation: 하지만 전 그 일을 아주 잘했어요

Subtitle: I was the top salesperson five years running.
Okay, but that's worse.
I mean, you, you do get how that's worse, / right?
Translation:
그게... 당신은 왜 그게
더 나쁜지 알죠? / 그렇죠?

Subtitle: You know, maybe it's a test.
Maybe if you go to Michael and you tell him the truth, / you'll pass the test / -and you'll get to stay. -No way.
Translation:
만일 당신이 마이클한테 가서
진실을 말한다면 / 당신은 그 시험을
통과하는 거예요 / - 그래서 머물게 될 거예요
- 안 돼요

Subtitle: I can't risk going to The Bad Place.
Translation:
배드 플레이스에 가는 위험을
감수할 수는 없어요

Subtitle: Okay, well, maybe it's not actually, like, all that bad.
Translation:
좋아요, 그래도 그렇게 하는 게
아주 나쁘지는 않을 거예요

Subtitle: Let's just get some information first.
We'll ask Janet. Hey, Janet?
-Hi there. -[exclaims]
How can I help you?
What the fork? Who are you?
I'm Janet.
I'm the informational assistant here in The Good Place.
Translation:
저는 이곳 굿 플레이스의
정보 도우미입니다

Subtitle: She's like this walking database.
You can ask her about the creation of the universe, or history--
Translation:
그녀에게 우주의 창조
또는 어떤 역사를 물어볼 수...

Subtitle: Oh, there was a guy who lived in Avondale, Arizona, around 2002.
Translation:
오, 2002년경에 애리조나의
애본데일에 살던 남자가 있어요

Subtitle: His name was Kevin Paltonic.
-Is he gay? -No.
Really?
Huh. I guess he just didn't want to have sex with me.
Translation:
그는 그냥 나하고 섹스하기가
싫었던 거군요

Subtitle: That's correct.
Well, that's fine, I wasn't that into him anyway.
Translation:
괜찮아요, 나도 그 남자를
그렇게 좋아하지 않았어요

Subtitle: -Yes, you were. -Okay, Janet, I have a question.
Translation:
- 그렇지 않아요
- 좋아요, 재닛 - 내가 질문이 있어요
- 말씀하세요

Subtitle: -Okay. -What is The Bad Place like?
Oh, sorry, that is the one topic I'm not allowed to tell you about.
Translation:
미안해요, 그건 제가 당신한테
말해선 안 될 한 가지 주제예요

Subtitle: I can only play you a brief audio clip of what is happening there right now.
Translation:
지금 거기서 일어나는 일에 대한
짧은 녹음을 들려드릴 수는 있어요

Subtitle: Okay.
[woman] The bear has two mouths!
Well, it doesn't sound awesome.
Does everyone have a huge house except me?
Translation:
나만 빼고 모든 사람이
큰 집을 가지고 있나요?

Subtitle: All right, we need a plan.
I say we just lie low and hope that they don't notice me.
Translation:
우린 그냥 조용히 있으면서
그들 눈에 안 띄기만 바라야죠

Subtitle: I'm sorry, I don't think I can help you.
Translation:
미안해요, 전 당신을 도울 수
없을 것 같아요

Subtitle: I just don't like being dishonest, / and I can't advise you to be dishonest either.
Translation:
전 거짓말하는 게 그냥 싫어요 / 그리고 당신도 거짓말하라고
조언할 수는 없어요

Subtitle: Come on, I'm just asking you to fudge a little bit.
Translation:
난 그저 당신한테 적당히
얼버무려 달라고 부탁하는 거예요

Subtitle: You must've told a few white lies in your life.
Translation:
당신도 살면서 선의의 거짓말은
분명히 해봤을 텐데요

Subtitle: I mean, what was your job?
I was a professor of ethics and moral philosophy.
Mother-forker!
-I'm getting a stomachache. -[sighs]
I'm in a perfect utopia, / and I'm... I have a stomachache. This is awful.
Translation:
전 완벽한 낙원에 있어요 / 그런데 배가 아프다니
이건 끔찍해요

Subtitle: I, uh... I think I have to tell Michael about this.
[Michael] Tell Michael about what?
[Eleanor] Michael? Hi.
What have you been up to?
Eleanor, Chidi, I would like you to meet Tahani and Jianyu.
They are soulmates and your next-door neighbors.
Hello.
Can I just say I love your house?
Translation:
당신 집이 참 좋다고
말씀드리고 싶어요

Subtitle: It's just so tiny and cute.
It's like a little child's plaything, like for a family of mice / or for a very fancy little dog.
Translation:
마치 아이들 장난감 같은데
생쥐 가족이나 / 아주 예쁜 작은 개를
위한 것 같아요

Subtitle: I love it. It's just so sweet and teensy.
Translation:
그게 마음에 들어요
너무 아늑하고 작아요

Subtitle: Just like you. Boop.
You booped me. [laughs]
-I did. -That's fun.
Tahani and Jianyu are having a little / welcome party tonight, and they've invited the entire neighborhood.
Translation:
타하니와 지안유가 오늘 밤 / 작은 환영 파티를 열 거예요
그들은 전 이웃을 초대했어요

Subtitle: Oh, I simply adore entertaining.
Don't I just adore it, Jianyu?
Oh, yes, by the way, Jianyu here is a Buddhist monk, you see, / and he obeys a strict code of silence.
Translation:
오, 그래요, 그런데 지안유는
불교 수도승이에요, 아시겠죠? / 그리고 그는 엄격한
침묵 서약을 지키고 있어요

Subtitle: So when you see him smiling and nodding, / that's actually his way of jumping up and down with glee.
Translation:
그래서 그가 미소를 짓고
고개를 끄덕이는 건 / 실제로는 기뻐서
껑충껑충 뛰는 거죠

Subtitle: Isn't that right, darling?
So we'll see you tonight?
-Great. -Yes.
-[chuckles] -No way.
My entire house could fit in this room.
Translation:
내 집 전체가 이 방에
다 들어가겠어요

Subtitle: Okay, uh...
Help me out here.
Tell me one good thing that you did on Earth, / just one truly kind and decent act / so that I can feel better about helping you out.
Translation:
지구에서 했던 좋은 일
하나를 말해보세요 / 진심으로 친절하고 제대로 된
행동 하나만 말이에요 / 그래야 당신을 돕는 거에 대해
기분이 나아질 거 같아요

Subtitle: Let's forget about good.
Um, just tell me something neutral about yourself.
Translation:
그냥 당신 자신에 관해 뭐든
중립적인 거 말해보세요

Subtitle: Like, tell me about the day before you died.
Translation:
예를 들어, 당신이 죽기
전날에 대해 말해주세요

Subtitle: What do you remember?
Hi there. Do you have a second to talk about the environment?
Translation:
안녕하세요, 환경에 대해 잠깐
얘기할 수 있을까요?

Subtitle: Do you have a second to eat my farts?
You missed.
[scoffs] Pick it up if you're so horny for the environment.
Translation:
당신이 주워요 환경에 그렇게 관심이
많다면 말이에요

Subtitle: I don't remember anything specific.
-Oh... -Look.
I might not have been a saint, but it's not like I killed anybody.
Translation:
난 성인은 아니었는지 몰라요
하지만 사람을 죽이진 않았어요

Subtitle: I wasn't an arsonist.
I never found a wallet outside of an IHOP
and thought about returning it but saw the owner lived out of state / so just took the cash and dropped the wallet back on the ground.
Translation:
그걸 돌려줄까 생각했지만
주인이 다른 주에 사는 걸 알고는 / 현금을 약간 빼고 그걸 다시
땅에 던져 놓는 짓은 안 했어요

Subtitle: Okay, that's really specific, / and that makes me think that you definitely did do that.
Translation:
좋아요, 정말 구체적이군요 / 그래서 당신이 확실히 그렇게
했다는 생각이 드네요

Subtitle: All I'm saying is these people might be "good,"
Translation:
내 말이 뭐냐 하면, 이 사람들은
아마 '선'할지 모르죠

Subtitle: but are they really that much better than me?
Translation:
하지만 그들이 정말로
나보다 훨씬 나을까요?

Subtitle: Well, I spent half my life in North Korea / fighting for women's rights and the other half in Saudi Arabia / fighting for gay rights.
Translation:
글쎄요, 난 내 삶의 절반을
북한에서 보내며 / 여성의 권리를 위해 싸웠어요
나머지 반은 사우디아라비아에서 / 동성애자들의 권리를 위해 싸웠죠

Subtitle: So we said, "If the UN won't remove those land mines, we will."
Translation:
그래서 만약 UN이 지뢰를
제거 안 하면 우리가 한다고 했죠

Subtitle: And we dug up over a thousand unexploded land mines / from the area surrounding the orphanage.
Translation:
우린 천 개가 넘는 폭발하지 않은
지뢰를 파냈어요 / 보육원을 둘러싸고 있는
지역에서 말이에요

Subtitle: Well, then he said, / "You can't give me both your kidneys, you'll die."
Translation:
그런데 그가 말했어요 / '당신 신장 2개를 나한테
모두 주면 당신은 죽어요'

Subtitle: And I said, "But you will live."
And I know we just met on this bus ten minutes ago, but he seemed nice.
Translation:
우린 10분 전에 그 버스에서
만났죠, 하지만 그는 좋았어요

Subtitle: Oh, forget it. Heading to the bar!
Translation:
오, 더 못 듣겠어요
바로 가겠어요!

Subtitle: Thank you, thank you.
You all know that I am the architect of this neighborhood.
Translation:
여러분 모두 제가 이 지역의
설계자라는 걸 압니다

Subtitle: But what you don't know is...
Golly, I'm not supposed to tell you this, but, um...
Translation:
이런, 여러분에게 이 얘기는
해서는 안 되는데

Subtitle: Oh, what the heck?
This is actually the very first neighborhood / that I have ever designed.
Translation: 이건 실제로 제가 설계한 / 제일 첫 지역입니다

Subtitle: I had been an apprentice for over 200 years, / and my boss has finally given me my first solo project.
Translation:
전 200년 동안 견습생이었어요 / 그리고 제 상관이 마침내 저의
첫 단독 프로젝트를 줬죠

Subtitle: Yes! [laughs]
Ah, ah, ah. Hold on there, ace.
Let me get more of them shrampies.
-Okay, easy. -What?
-They're for everybody, right? -Yes, exactly.
Translation:
이건 모든 사람을 위한
거잖아요? 맞아요

Subtitle: [Michael] And you deserve a perfect world / because every single one of you / is a good person.
Translation:
여러분은 완벽한 세상에
있을 자격이 있습니다 / 왜냐하면 여러분 모두가 / 좋은 사람이기 때문이죠

Subtitle: That's it for me. Back to you, Tahani.
-Bravo, Michael, bravo! -Thank you.
And I would just like to quickly say / if any of you would like to play tennis tonight, / we have 36 regulation grass tennis courts.
Translation:
그리고 잠깐 공지해드릴게요 / 혹시 오늘 밤 테니스 치고
싶은 분이 계신다면 / 우린 36면의 정식 잔디
테니스 코트가 있어요

Subtitle: Such fun. Cheers. [laughs]
Tahani, what a condescending bench.
-Okay, okay, okay, okay. -Am I right?
Why does she still have that British accent, right?
Translation:
왜 그녀는 아직도
영국 억양을 쓰죠, 그렇죠?

Subtitle: No one else here has an accent.
-She's choosing to have that accent. -[shushes]
Translation:
그녀는 일부러 그 억양을
쓰기로 작정한 거예요

Subtitle: [imitating Tahani] "Oh, hello.
I am just a big, beautiful, utterly perfect cartoon giraffe."
Translation:
'전 그냥 크고 아름답고 완벽한
만화에 나오는 기린이에요'

Subtitle: Oh, okay. Okay. I think it's time to go home.
Translation:
오, 알겠어요
이제 집에 갈 시간 같아요

Subtitle: Wait, wait, wait. I just have to go upstairs / real quick and steal a bunch of gold stuff.
Translation:
잠깐만요, 2층에
올라가 봐야겠어요 / 정말 재빨리 가서
금붙이를 훔쳐야겠어요

Subtitle: Okay, don't do that.
Don't do... No, Eleanor, Eleanor, Eleanor.
Hello, creepy house that I hate.
Hello, one million clowns.
Why aren't there stairs here?
What kind of weirdo house is this?
Did you fill your bra with shrimp?
No. [hiccups]
Yes.
Whatever, it's freakin' heaven.
I'm sure they have plenty of shellfish.
Translation:
틀림없이 그들은 조개류를
많이 갖고 있을 거예요

Subtitle: That Tahani is a real butthead, huh?
[gasps] Hey.
At least I can still say "butthead."
Oh, she is a butthead.
Found some pajamas.
Chidi... Chidi, Chidi?
I'm sorry that you had to deal with this...
It's okay.
It's not, though. [sighs]
Do you think anybody cared that I died?
Translation:
내가 죽었다는 걸 누가
신경이나 쓴다고 생각해요?

Subtitle: Maybe someone did. I don't know.
I was an only child.
My parents were divorced when I was a kid.
They were both crummy people, so they're probably... [exclaims]
Translation:
그들은 형편없는 분이었어요
그래서 두 사람 모두 아마...

Subtitle: In The Bad Place.
Maybe they're being used to torture each other.
Translation:
아마 그분들은 서로 고문하는 데
익숙해지고 있을 거예요

Subtitle: -It would work. -[chuckles]
I bet way more people cared that you died.
Translation:
분명 당신의 죽음에는 더 많은
사람들이 관심을 가졌을 거예요

Subtitle: 'Cause you're a nice person. [clears throat]
You're a nice person, Chidi...
Anaconda.
-"Anagonye." -Aganocomonga.
"Anagonye."
-Ags... say it again. -"Anagonye."
-No, say what you said before. -I did. It's Anagonye.
Translation:
아니요, 그 전에
말한 걸 말해봐요 했잖아요, 그건 아나곤예예요

Subtitle: -You just changed it. -I didn't change it, it's my name.
Translation: 방금 바꿨어요 안 바꿨어요, 그게 내 이름이에요

Subtitle: Argrugande. Ariana Grande.
[gasps] That's a person.
I did it.
Good night. Good night.
Well, that's terrifying.
That can't be good.
[Eleanor] Oh, fork.
-Michael. -Hmm?
Is that giant, terrifying ladybug supposed to be there?
Translation:
저 거대하고 무서운 무당벌레가
저기 있어야 하나요?

Subtitle: Ah. Well, great question, Tahani.
No. No, it's not.
I have no idea why any of this is happening or how to control it.
Translation:
왜 이런 일이 일어나는지 또 어떻게 통제해야 하는지
난 전혀 몰라요

Subtitle: Should we run away then?
Yes.
Righto.
Chidi, Chidi! What's going on?
Why are there giant animals everywhere?
Translation:
왜 거대한 동물들이
여기저기 있는 거죠?

Subtitle: Do you hear Ariana Grande playing?
Translation:
아리아나 그란데 노래
나오는 거 들리나요?

Subtitle: Why is everyone wearing blue and yellow?
Translation:
왜 모두 파랗고 노란 옷을
입고 있는 거죠?

Subtitle: You're not.
You're the only one who's not.
Eleanor, this is all happening because of you.
Oh, fork me.
Okay, okay. We don't know this is because of me.
Translation:
좋아요, 이게 나 때문인지
우린 몰라요

Subtitle: Eleanor, this place is a perfectly made Swiss watch, / and you are a wrench in the gears.
Translation:
엘리너, 이곳은 완벽하게
만들어진 스위스 시계예요 / 그리고 당신은 톱니바퀴에
던져진 연장이죠

Subtitle: Actually, you're a hammer, just smashing the gears into dust.
Translation:
사실 당신은 망치예요, 톱니바퀴를
부숴서 먼지로 만들어 버리죠

Subtitle: Oh, hang on. Not everybody here is perfect, okay?
Translation:
기다려요, 여기 모든 사람이
완벽하진 않아요, 알았어요?

Subtitle: Tahani is totally condescending.
And there are a couple of, you know, chunksters.
Oh, come on!
No judgment. I'm just saying / I'm not the only one with flaws. So how can we be sure this is my fault?
Translation:
판단하지 말아요
난 그냥 나만 결점이 / 있는 건 아니라는 거예요, 어떻게
이게 내 잘못이라고 확신하죠?

Subtitle: You hogged all the shrimp, and now there are shrimp flying around.
Translation:
당신은 새우를 독차지했어요
그리고 지금 새우가 날아다니고요

Subtitle: You called Tahani a giraffe, and now there are giraffes everywhere.
Translation:
당신이 타하니를 기린이라고 했죠
지금 기린이 사방에 있어요

Subtitle: Okay, fine, turns out there are many ways to know that it was me.
Translation:
좋아요, 그게 나 때문이라는 걸
아는 많은 방법이 있는 거군요

Subtitle: Let's just face it, Eleanor, you don't belong here.
Translation:
현실을 직시해요, 엘리너
당신은 여기 속하지 않아요

Subtitle: Well, then this system sucks.
What, one in a million gets to live in paradise / and everyone else is tortured for eternity?
Translation:
뭐라고요, 백만 명 중
한 사람이 낙원에 살고 / 나머지 사람들은 모두
영원히 고문을 받는다고요?

Subtitle: Come on.
I mean, I wasn't freaking Gandhi, but I was okay.
I was a medium person.
I should get to spend eternity in a medium place!
Translation:
난 미디엄 플레이스에서
영원히 머물러야 해요

Subtitle: Like Cincinnati.
Everyone who wasn't perfect but wasn't terrible / should get to spend eternity in Cincinnati.
Translation:
완벽하진 않지만
끔찍하지도 않은 모든 사람은 / 신시내티에서 영원을
보내게 해야 해요

Subtitle: Look, apparently it doesn't work that way.
Translation:
이봐요, 분명히 그런 식으로
시스템이 작동하진 않아요

Subtitle: I'm sorry, Eleanor, but there's nothing anyone can do.
Translation:
미안해요, 엘리너, 하지만
아무도 뭘 할 수 없어요

Subtitle: Unless...
There is something we can do. Unless you could teach me.
Translation:
우리가 뭔가를 할 수도 있겠죠 만약에 당신이 나를
가르칠 수 있다면요

Subtitle: -Teach you what? -How to be good.
Translation: 당신한테 뭘 가르치죠? 좋은 사람 되는 법요

Subtitle: That was your job, right? A professor of ethics?
Translation:
그게 당신 직업이었어요, 그렇죠?
윤리학 교수라고 했죠?

Subtitle: No one knew I was a problem when I arrived.
Translation:
내가 도착했을 때 아무도 내가
문제라는 걸 몰랐어요

Subtitle: Things only started getting crazy / after I was an ash-hole to everyone at the party. Ugh.
Translation:
상황이 엉망이 되기 시작한 건 / 내가 파티에서 사람들에게
바보같이 굴면서부터였어요

Subtitle: You know I'm trying to say "ash-hole" and not "ash-hole," right?
Translation:
내가 '바보같이'를 말하려 할 때
제대로 발음 안 되는 거 알죠?

Subtitle: I got that, yes.
Okay, give me a chance. Let me earn my place here.
Translation:
좋아요, 나한테 기회를 줘요
이곳에 내 자리를 얻도록 해줘요

Subtitle: -Let me be your ethical guinea pig. -[knocking on door]
Translation:
내가 당신의 윤리적
실험 대상이 될게요

Subtitle: [Michael] Hey, guys! Uh... Emergency neighborhood meeting, now!
Translation:
이봐요! 비상 동네 회의가
있어요, 당장요!

Subtitle: We'll be right there, Michael!
If I walk out of here in these clothes, I'm toast.
Translation:
내가 이 옷을 입고 여기를
걸어나가면, 난 끝이에요

Subtitle: My soul is in your hands, soulmate. What's it gonna be?
Translation:
내 영혼은 당신 손에 달렸어요
소울메이트, 어떻게 할 거예요?

Subtitle: -You, Eleanor Shellstrop, are dead. -Cool.
-You, Eleanor Shellstrop, are dead. -Cool.
Eleanor, you are my soulmate.
There's been a big mistake.
I'm not supposed to be here.
-Wait, what? -These people might be good, / but are they really that much better than me?
Translation:
- 잠깐만요, 뭐라고요?
- 이 사람들은 '선'할지 모르죠 / 하지만 그들이 정말로
나보다 훨씬 나을까요?

Subtitle: [Chidi] Eleanor! This is all happening because of you!
Give me a chance. Let me earn my place here.
Translation:
나한테 기회를 줘요
이곳에 내 자리를 얻도록 해줘요

Subtitle: Let me be your ethical guinea pig.
Translation:
내가 당신의 윤리적
실험 대상이 될게요

Subtitle: My soul is in your hands, soulmate.
Translation:
내 영혼은 당신 손에 달렸어요
소울메이트

Subtitle: [stammers] I don't know what to do here. This is a mess.
Translation:
여기서 뭘 해야 할지 모르겠어요
완전 엉망이에요

Subtitle: Morally speaking, this is a putrid, disgusting bowl of ethical soup.
Translation:
도덕적으로 말하자면 이건 썩어서
구역질 나는 윤리의 수프예요

Subtitle: Okay, well, how about we just chill / and go to the town meeting and talk it out after?
Translation:
좋아요, 그럼 우리 좀 진정하고 / 동네 회의에 가서 이것에 대해
얘기해보면 어떨까요?

Subtitle: Great. Hey, how do I make that helper woman show up?
Translation:
좋아요, 이봐요, 어떻게
그 도우미 여자를 나오게 하죠?

Subtitle: Hello? Front desk lady? Magical slave robot?
-Excuse me, Janet? -Hi, there.
[gasps] Still not used to it. Um, Janet, I need...
Translation: 아직도 익숙지 않네 재닛, 내가 필요한 건...

Subtitle: Quick question, can anyone access our search history, / or is this an incognito browsing situation / like when you're stalking a hot mailman from your work computer?
Translation:
하나만 물을게요, 혹시 누군가가
검색 기록을 볼 수 있나요? / 아니면 이건 시크릿 모드같은 거로
인터넷 검색하는 건가요? / 마치 당신이 회사 컴퓨터로
섹시한 남자를 스토킹할 때처럼요?

Subtitle: It is 100% confidential.
No one can access what you ask me, including Michael.
Translation:
누구도 당신이 내게 물어본 걸
알 수 없어요, 마이클도요

Subtitle: Now, what kind of pornography would you like to see?
Translation:
그럼, 어떤 종류의 포르노를
보고 싶으세요?

Subtitle: No. No, no, no, not porn.
I, um... I need clothes, like yours and Chidi's with the stripes.
Translation:
난 옷이 필요해요
당신과 치디가 입고 있는 옷이요

Subtitle: -[chimes] -There you go.
[Michael] Everybody, everybody!
Gather round, please, thank you, thank you.
Obviously, there's something very wrong with this neighborhood.
Translation:
분명히, 이 지역에
큰 문제가 있습니다

Subtitle: We don't know what it is, how long it will last, / or what caused it.
Translation:
우리는 그게 뭔지
얼마나 지속될지 / 또는 그 원인도 모릅니다

Subtitle: What do we know, Janet?
Translation: 우리가 알고 있는 게 뭐죠, 재닛?

Subtitle: We know where it happened.
-Here. -Yes, thank you, Janet.
The chaos happened here.
See, that's the trouble with these perfect systems.
Translation:
보세요, 그게 이 완벽한 시스템에
문제를 일으키고 있어요

Subtitle: One little flaw can lead to...
Well, it can lead to...
-Gary over there. -[crowd murmuring]
Hey, Gary. Hang in there, buddy.
Boy, my armpits are leaking. What is that called again?
Translation:
이런, 내 겨드랑이가 새고 있어
이걸 뭐라고 한다고 그랬죠?

Subtitle: -Sweat. -Right, right.
Still not used to being in a human body. [chuckles]
Translation:
아직 사람 몸에 있는 게
익숙하지 않아서요

Subtitle: And what do you do with sweat? Do you lick it away, is that right?
Translation:
땀을 어떻게 한다고 했었지?
핥아버리나요, 그래요?

Subtitle: -No, you dab it with a cloth. -Oh, right.
Translation:
땀을 어떻게 한다고 했었지?
핥아버리나요, 그래요? 아니에요, 천으로 닦아내야죠 아, 맞아요

Subtitle: And then you lick the cloth? That seems weirder.
Translation:
그리고 천을 핥던가?
그건 더 이상한데요

Subtitle: -[gasps] Michael. Look! -Okay. That's a good sign.
Translation: 마이클 보세요! 좋아요, 그건 좋은 신호예요

Subtitle: [stammers] It could mean that this is almost over.
Translation:
이게 거의 끝났다는
의미일 수 있어요

Subtitle: Oh, such a relief.
That was my first time as a fashion "don't,"
Translation:
'해선 안 될' 옷차림을
한 건 처음이었어요

Subtitle: and I did not care for it.
[Eleanor] Okay, things are settling down outside.
I think it's time to...
make me good, partner. How do we do it?
Translation:
날 어떻게 좋은 사람으로
만들 거죠, 파트너?

Subtitle: Is there a pill I can take or something I could vape?
Translation:
먹을 수 있는 알약이나
들이마실 수 있는 게 있나요?

Subtitle: Where did you get a chalkboard?
It's The Good Place, you can get anything you want at any time.
Translation:
여긴 굿 플레이스예요, 원하는 건
뭐든지 언제든지 얻을 수 있어요

Subtitle: And you chose a chalkboard?
What are you reading?
The Metaphysics of Morals by Immanuel Kant.
It's a treatise on the aesthetic preconditions / of the mind's receptivity to duty.
Translation:
도덕적 의무에 대한
이성적 수용성의 / 심미적 전제 조건에
대한 논문이에요

Subtitle: It's a book on how to act good.
Translation:
선한 일을 하는 방법에
관한 책이에요

Subtitle: Oh, great! So you've decided to help me?
Translation:
오, 좋아요! 그럼 날 돕기로
결정한 거군요?

Subtitle: I don't know. There's a thousand questions.
-Is there a moral imperative to help you? -Hmm.
Do I have a greater obligation to my community?
Translation:
나는 내 지역사회에 대해
더 큰 의무가 있는가?

Subtitle: Are you taking someone else's spot, someone who deserves to be here?
Translation:
여기 있어 마땅한 다른 사람의
자리를 당신이 뺏고 있는 것인가?

Subtitle: Ooh! On that question, I honestly think I was just put here by mistake.
Translation:
그 질문에 대해선, 솔직히 난
실수로 여기 배정된 것 같아요

Subtitle: Because Michael called me Eleanor Shellstrop, / so he knows I'm me.
Translation:
왜냐하면, 마이클이 나를 엘리너
셸스트롭이라고 불렀으니까 / 그는 내가 나란 걸 알아요

Subtitle: He's just wrong about my overall "quality" level.
Translation:
그는 단지 나의 전반적인
'품질' 수준을 잘못 안 거죠

Subtitle: Please, help me, man. I swear I am worth it.
Translation:
제발, 도와줘요, 맹세코
난 그럴 가치가 있어요

Subtitle: Tell me one fact that you know about me.
Translation:
나에 대해 알고 있는
사실 하나만 말해보세요

Subtitle: I mean, we spent the whole day together. You must remember something.
Translation:
우린 하루를 같이 보냈어요, 나에
대해 뭔가 기억나는 게 있겠죠

Subtitle: What country am I from?
[sighs] Is it racist if I say Africa?
Yes, and Africa is not a country. I am from Senegal.
Translation:
네, 그리고 아프리카는 나라가
아니에요, 난 세네갈에서 왔어요

Subtitle: Do I have any siblings? Where did I go to college?
Translation:
저한테 형제가 있나요?
대학은 어디를 나왔죠?

Subtitle: Trick question. You didn't.
I was literally a college professor.
Do you not remember one single thing about me?
Translation:
당신은 나에 대해 단 하나도
기억 못 하는 거예요?

Subtitle: Dude, things have been nuts around here.
Translation:
이봐요, 여기 일이 이상하게
돌아가고 있잖아요

Subtitle: I bet you don't know anything about me.
Translation:
당신도 나에 대해 아무것도
모른다고 확신해요

Subtitle: You were born in Phoenix. You went to school in Tempe.
Translation:
당신은 피닉스에서 태어났어요
템피에서 학교를 다녔고요

Subtitle: You're an only child.
Your favorite show is something called The Real Housewives of Atlanta, / and your favorite book is Kendall Jenner's Instagram feed.
Translation:
형제는 없고요
당신이 좋아하는 프로그램은 '애틀랜타의 진짜 가정주부'고
좋아하는 책은 / '애틀랜타의 진짜 가정주부'고
좋아하는 책은 켄들 제너의 '인스타그램 피드'죠

Subtitle: How did you know all that?
Because you are constantly talking about yourself.
Translation:
왜냐하면, 당신은 계속해서
자기 얘기만 하고 있기 때문이에요

Subtitle: You are the most self-obsessed person I have ever met.
Translation:
당신은 내가 만난 사람 중에
자기 집착이 가장 강한 사람이죠

Subtitle: [laughs] You should see Kendall Jenner's Instagram feed.
Okay, this is my fear about you, Eleanor.
You are too selfish to ever be a good person.
Translation:
당신은 너무 이기적이어서
절대 선한 사람이 될 수 없어요

Subtitle: Well, I think you're wrong. What country am I from, again?
Translation:
- 난 당신이 틀린 것 같아요
- 내가 어디서 왔다고 했죠?

Subtitle: Sen...sodyne.
That is a brand of toothpaste.
Look, the only thing that you are concerned with / is your own happiness.
Translation: 그건 치약 이름이죠 당신이 신경 쓰는 유일한 건 / 당신 자신의 행복뿐이에요

Subtitle: That's your problem.
Okay, names in the hat. Time to pick a designated driver.
Translation: 좋아, 모자에 이름을 넣어 대리운전자를 뽑을 시간이야

Subtitle: And the loser is...
Betsy.
Wait, you never get picked, / and you're always the one who draws the name.
Translation:
잠깐, 넌 한 번도 안 뽑혀 / 그리고 항상 네가
이름을 뽑고 말이야

Subtitle: -Let me see that. -There's no need.
Translation:
- 그거 좀 보여줘
- 그럴 필요 없어

Subtitle: Everyone here believes in my integrity 100%, right, guys?
Translation:
여기 있는 모두가 내 진실성을
100% 믿어, 그렇지?

Subtitle: Give it to me.
For the record...
I did that out of principle, because it absolutely had your name on it.
Translation:
난 원칙대로 했어, 여기 분명히
네 이름이 적혀 있었기 때문이야

Subtitle: If I check the other ones, I can figure it out / by process of elimination.
Translation:
내가 다른 것들을 확인해보면
맞는지 알 수 있을 거야 / 제거의 과정을 통해서 말이야

Subtitle: Again, out of principle. Let it wash over you, Betsy.
Translation:
다시 말하는데... 원칙에 따랐어
그래 봐야 달라질 건 없어, 벳시

Subtitle: This is what integrity looks like.
[Michael] All right, everyone, let's get started.
Things have settled down. Phew! [chuckles]
So hopefully, we're off and running.
Translation:
바라건대, 이제 모든 게
정상적으로 돌아왔어요

Subtitle: Welcome to orientation, day two.
Translation:
오리엔테이션 2일 차에
온 것을 환영합니다 "오리엔테이션 2일 차"

Subtitle: Now, today we're gonna start with something / that everyone has always wanted to do.
Translation: 오늘은 모두가 항상 하고 싶었던 / 것부터 시작하도록 할게요

Subtitle: -Flying. -[crowd cheering and applauding]
Now that you're dead, let's live a little, right?
Uh, sorry. Uh, Michael? If... If I might?
I was just thinking, earlier today in all of the chaos, / large swaths of this neighborhood were destroyed.
Translation:
전 이런 생각을 하고 있었어요
이른 아침부터 이 혼란 가운데 / 이 지역의 많은 곳이 파괴됐어요

Subtitle: We thought perhaps some of us could volunteer to help clean up the debris.
Translation:
아마도 우리 중 몇 명이 자원해서 그 잔해 치우는 걸
도와주면 어떨까 생각했어요

Subtitle: You know, it's quite a fun way to band together as a community, / isn't that right, Jianyu?
Translation:
지역사회로 하나로 뭉칠 수 있는
재밌는 방법이에요 / 안 그래요, 지안유?

Subtitle: Oh, uh, yeah, sorry. For those of you who don't know, / my soulmate, Jianyu here, is a Buddhist monk.
Translation:
오, 미안해요
모르시는 분들도 있겠지만 / 여기는 내 소울메이트 지안유예요
불교 수도자예요

Subtitle: He took a vow of silence that he's still observing, / even here, in The Good Place.
Translation:
지안유는 침묵의 서약을 했는데
여전히 그걸 지키고 있어요 / 심지어 여기 굿 플레이스에서도요

Subtitle: It's truly inspiring.
Well, Tahani, it's not really your job to clean up, / but I suppose there's no harm if you really want to.
Translation:
글쎄요, 타하니, 청소하는 건
당신의 일이 아니에요 하지만 당신이 정말 그러길
원한다면 문제 될 건 없을 거예요 / 하지만 당신이 정말 그러길
원한다면 문제 될 건 없을 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, well, hurrah. We need about, uh, 12 volunteers.
Translation:
오, 만세! 자원 봉사자가
12명 정도 필요해요

Subtitle: I can't believe all these people are passing on flying / to pick up garbage all day. [scoffs]
Translation:
이 사람들 모두가 나는 거 대신에 / 온종일 쓰레기를
줍겠다는 걸 믿을 수 없어요

Subtitle: Have fun, nerds.
I'll be soaring through the air like a forkin' bird.
Translation:
나는 빌어먹을 새처럼
하늘로 날아오를 거야

Subtitle: -Eleanor and I would love to help. -Ah. Hurrah, hurrah. Yay.
Dude.
You want to prove you're not selfish? Here's the perfect test.
Translation:
이기적이지 않다는 걸 증명하고
싶죠? 이건 완벽한 시험이에요

Subtitle: There's something fun that you want to do, / and then there's something less fun that people are doing for the common good.
Translation:
당신이 하고 싶은
재미있는 일이 있고 / 공익을 위해 하는
덜 재미있는 일이 있어요

Subtitle: Which do you choose?
-Have fun. -[indistinct chatter]
[man 1] Hey! [man 2] Oh, hey!
[man 3] Aw, yeah! [man 4] All right!
-Whoo! -Hey, up there.
Having fun, or does it maybe suck, probably?
Well, I wouldn't call it fun. I'd say it's like 50 million simultaneous orgasms, / but better.
Translation:
이건 그냥 재미 정도가 아니에요 이건 오르가슴을 동시에
5천만 번 느끼는 거 같아요 / 심지어 더 좋아요

Subtitle: How's volunteer garbage pickup?
-About the same. -Great!
You know, this really reminds me of my time in Vietnam, / picking up mortar shells with my godmother, Diana.
Translation:
있죠, 이건 정말 내가 베트남에
있을 때를 생각나게 해요 / 내 대모님인 다이애나와 함께
박격포탄을 주웠었죠

Subtitle: Doesn't really matter of what she's a princess of. It's not really important.
Translation:
대모님이 어디 공주인지는
별로 중요하지 않아요

Subtitle: Tahani! How goes the cleaning?
Oh, swimmingly, Michael. And I have to say / this neighborhood that you've built is truly a masterpiece, / the likes of which I've never seen.
Translation:
순조로워요, 마이클
그리고 난 이 말을 해야겠어요 / 당신이 지은 이 지역은
정말 걸작이에요 / 난 이런 건 정말 처음 봤어요

Subtitle: And I've been to Johnny Depp's private bird sanctuary.
Translation:
난 조니 뎁의 사유 조류
보호지에도 가봤지만 말이에요

Subtitle: Well, thank you. That's very kind of you to say.
But it's also dead wrong.
This neighborhood is a disaster.
See, I must have made a mistake somewhere. And it led to all this chaos, / and now I'm just... I'm just terrified that it's gonna happen again.
Translation:
내가 분명
뭔가 실수를 한 거예요 그리고 그게 모든 혼란을 일으켰고
이제 난 그냥 두려워요, 이런 일이 / 그리고 그게 모든 혼란을 일으켰고
이제 난 그냥 두려워요, 이런 일이 또 일어날까 봐요, 난 좋은 얼굴을
보여주려고 노력하고 있어요

Subtitle: I'm trying to put a good face on...
Translation:
또 일어날까 봐요, 난 좋은 얼굴을
보여주려고 노력하고 있어요

Subtitle: Uh, well, this face that I've constructed for myself.
Translation: 내가 직접 만든 이 얼굴 말이에요

Subtitle: But the truth is, I... I'm just miserable.
Translation: 하지만 진실은 나는 그저 비참할 뿐이에요

Subtitle: I have to go.
Thank you so much for your service.
Oh, no. Powerful people do not handle failure well.
Translation:
오, 안 돼 힘 있는 사람들은
실수에 잘 대처하지 못해요

Subtitle: Michael could be heading for a total meltdown.
Soulmate, are you thinking what I'm thinking?
Translation: 소울메이트 나랑 같은 생각 하고 있어요?

Subtitle: Should we say it at the same time? All right. One, two, three.
We must help Michael.
Oh, you sly devil.
You're going to keep me on my toes, aren't you?
All right, come on. Let's go.
-[Antonio] Oh, boy! -Hey, Gunnar! Hey, Antonio!
-Hey, Eleanor. Isn't this great? -Uh, yeah.
Translation:
안녕하세요, 엘리너 - 참 좋지 않아요?
- 네

Subtitle: When I thought of the afterlife, / I totally pictured being an unpaid, non-flying janitor.
Translation:
내가 사후 세계에 대해
생각했을 땐, 난 확실하게 / 내가 사후 세계에 대해
생각했을 땐, 난 확실하게 무급의, 날지 못하는
잡역부를 생각했었어요

Subtitle: Us, too! [laughs]
[laughs sarcastically] You guys are so fun. Just relentlessly fun.
Translation: 당신들 정말 재미있어요 정말 엄청나게 재미있어요

Subtitle: I keep thinking, "When are they gonna stop being fun?"
Translation:
나는 계속 생각하고 있어요
'언제 재미가 없어질까?' 하고요

Subtitle: And the answer is never. You're never gonna stop.
Translation:
그리고 그 답은 '절대'죠
절대 재미가 없어지지 않을 거예요

Subtitle: Well, I have had a pretty full day of being unselfish.
Translation:
난 꽤 이기적이지 않은
하루를 보낸 것 같아요

Subtitle: I've made some new friends. My area's almost garbage-free.
Translation:
새 친구들을 만들었고
내 구역은 거의 쓰레기가 없어요

Subtitle: So you're gonna help me figure out how to stay, right?
Translation:
그래서, 이제 내가 여기 남는
방법을 알아내도록 도와줄 거죠?

Subtitle: Well, that is a really tough question.
Most great philosophers would say / helping you is pointless, that you can't try to be good, / especially when your motivations are so obviously corrupt.
Translation:
대부분의 위대한 철학자들은
이렇게 말할 거예요 / 당신을 돕는 건 의미 없고, 당신은
선해지려고 노력할 수 없다고요 / 특히 동기가 너무 분명하게
오염되어 있다면 말이죠

Subtitle: Yeah, but what do most great philosophers know?
Translation:
네, 하지만 대부분의 위대한
철학자들이 뭘 알겠어요?

Subtitle: On the other hand, Aristotle thought that moral virtue is something / that you could get better at.
Translation:
반면 아리스토텔레스는
도덕적 덕목은 / 향상시킬 수 있는
것이라고 생각했어요

Subtitle: He... He compared it to playing the flute.
Translation:
그는 그걸 플루트를
연주하는 것과 비교했어요

Subtitle: The more you practice, the more you improve.
Aristotle! That's my boy, right there. He was the best.
Translation:
아리스토텔레스! 역시! 정말 맞는
말이에요! 그가 최고였어요

Subtitle: I mean, most people agree he was the best one.
Translation:
내 말은, 대부분의 사람들이 그가
최고였다는 데 동의할 거예요

Subtitle: So it sounds to me like you are onboard the "Help Eleanor" train.
Translation:
나에게는 당신이 이미 '엘리너
돕기' 기차에 탄 것처럼 들려요

Subtitle: Well, I've narrowed it down to two possibilities, yes and no.
Translation:
난 그걸 두 가지
가능성으로 줄였어요 한다, 안 한다

Subtitle: Well, no worries.
Just hit me up when you're done weighing my life in your hands.
Translation:
내 삶을 어떻게 할 건지
결정하면 알려주세요

Subtitle: I'll just keep doing what I do best: being super considerate and selfless.
Translation:
난 내가 제일 잘하는 걸
계속하고 있을게요 최고로 사려 깊고
이타적인 거 말이에요

Subtitle: -Hey, guys. -Okay, Eleanor, reminder.
We switched to a rotating system / for choosing a designated driver, and it's your turn.
Translation:
우린 순번제로 바꿔서 / 대리운전자를 뽑기로 했었어
그리고 이제 네 차례야

Subtitle: Got it. [chuckles softly]
Full disclosure, I forgot we were doing this new system.
Translation:
사실대로 말하면, 난 우리가
이 새 방법을 쓴다는 걸 까먹었어

Subtitle: I got off work early. I've been here for about an hour, / and I'm already pretty drunk.
Translation:
난 오늘 일찍 퇴근했고
여기에 온 지 한 시간쯤 됐어 / 그래서 난 이미 꽤 취했어

Subtitle: -Someone else will do it. -Good call.
Translation: 다른 사람이 할 거야 잘 생각했어

Subtitle: Guess the only place I'll be driving is through the giant loophole / in the system I accidentally discovered.
Translation:
내가 운전할 수 있는 유일한 곳은
내가 우연히 발견한 / 이 거대한 허점 속에서뿐일 거야

Subtitle: I can't believe they've managed to mix one million flavors together, / and yet, somehow, I can taste each individual one.
Translation:
그들이 백만 가지 맛을 함께
섞었다는 걸 믿을 수 없어요 / 그리고 왠지 모르게 각각의
맛을 느낄 수 있어요

Subtitle: It's remarkable.
I got no-flavor.
Translation: 난 아무 맛이 없는 걸 골랐어요

Subtitle: -It's all I deserve, really. -No.
Translation:
- 난 이런 걸 먹어도 싸요
- 아니에요

Subtitle: Look, I... I appreciate you trying to cheer me up.
Translation:
내 기분을 북돋워
주려는 것엔 정말 감사해요

Subtitle: I really do, but you don't understand.
Translation:
정말로요, 하지만
당신은 이해 못 해요

Subtitle: This was the very first neighborhood that I got to design.
Translation:
이건 내가 설계한
첫 번째 지역이에요

Subtitle: It was my chance to prove myself, and now I've blown it.
Translation:
이건 나 자신을 증명할 기회였고
난 그걸 날려버렸어요

Subtitle: You know, sometimes a flaw can make something even more beautiful, / like with Cindy Crawford and how short she is.
Translation:
가끔은 결점이 무언가를
훨씬 아름답게 만들죠 신디 크로퍼드처럼요
그녀는 정말 키가 작아요 / 신디 크로퍼드처럼요
그녀는 정말 키가 작아요

Subtitle: Oh, Tahani, if I made one tiny mistake in my design, / if there's a single glitch in the system, / if even one blade of grass is angled a fraction of a degree off...
Translation:
오, 타하니 내가 설계에 작은 실수를 했다면
시스템에 하나의 오류라도 있다면 / 내가 설계에 작은 실수를 했다면
시스템에 하나의 오류라도 있다면 / 하나의 풀잎이라도 아주 작은 각도로 틀어진다면

Subtitle: The whole neighborhood is compromised.
Whose dog is that?
Guys, whose dog is that?
Whose dog is that?
See, this is one of those glitches I was talking about.
Translation:
보세요, 이게 내가 말한
그 오류 중 하나예요

Subtitle: Nice try, puppy!
Phew! [laughs] That was a close one.
[Pevita] Teacup!
Hey, have you seen my dog?
Translation:
저기요, 제 강아지를
본 적 있나요?

Subtitle: Shouldn't these be magical trash bags?
Translation:
이건 마법 쓰레기봉투여야
하는 거 아닌가?

Subtitle: [Janet] Five more minutes, flyers!
-Five more minutes! -Oh, man, really?
Janet, I'm finished with cleanup, and I'm ready to fly.
Translation:
재닛, 청소를 끝냈어요
그리고 난 날 준비가 됐어요

Subtitle: -How do I start? -Hop on the launch pad / and conjure an image that brings you pure joy.
Translation:
- 어떻게 시작하죠?
- 발사대로 올라가서 / 당신에게 진정한 기쁨을 주는
장면을 떠올려보세요

Subtitle: Some people think of their wedding day or favorite vacation spot.
Translation:
어떤 사람들은 결혼식 날이나
좋아하는 휴가지를 생각하죠

Subtitle: [sighs] People puking on roller coasters. People puking on roller coasters.
[gasps and laughs] It's working!
-Ow! What the fork? -[thunder breaking]
Janet, any chance this is a scheduled trash storm?
Translation:
재닛, 이게 예정된 쓰레기
폭풍일 가능성이 있나요?

Subtitle: So here's the situation, Pevita.
I kind of kicked your dog into the sun.
But I got her back.
-[dog whimpers] -Everything... Everything seems fine.
Translation: 모든 게... 모든 게 괜찮아 보여요

Subtitle: Teacup, thank goodness you're okay.
Everyone, it is merely a construct of a dog.
Translation:
여러분, 이건 그저
개의 구성 요소일 뿐이에요

Subtitle: It feels no pain or joy or love.
Translation:
개는 어떠한 고통도 기쁨도
사랑도 느끼지 않아요

Subtitle: Teacup doesn't love me?
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, it definitely feels love.
Do you actually want a dog that loves you a little bit more?
Translation:
혹시 당신을 더 사랑해 주는
개를 원하시나요?

Subtitle: Because I can kick her right back into the sun / and get you another one just like that.
Translation:
왜냐하면, 난 이 개를 다시
태양으로 차버리고 / 비슷한 개 1마리를
얻어 줄 수 있어요

Subtitle: -No! -Oh, boy. I'm making things worse.
Translation:
비슷한 개 1마리를
얻어 줄 수 있어요 - 싫어요!
- 오, 이런 내가 상황을 더 나쁘게 만드네요

Subtitle: Okay, all right, that's all right. Breathe. Breathe. Do you breathe?
Translation:
내가 상황을 더 나쁘게 만드네요 됐어요, 괜찮아요 숨 쉬세요...
숨 쉬고 있어요?

Subtitle: If you do, then just breathe / 'cause everything's fine, Michael, it's fine.
Translation:
숨 쉬세요...
숨 쉬고 있어요? / 그렇다면, 그냥 숨을 쉬세요 모든 게 괜찮으니까요
마이클, 괜찮아요

Subtitle: [Tahani] It's raining garbage. Run!
No, no, no, I'm gonna run this way.
[panting] Chidi! Hey. Before you say anything...
Translation: 치디! 이봐요! 당신이 어떤 말이든 하기 전에...

Subtitle: That's it, I just don't want you to say anything.
Translation:
됐어요, 난 그냥 당신이
아무 말도 안 하길 원해요

Subtitle: -What did you do? -Nothing!
It just started raining trash out of nowhere for no reason at all.
Translation:
아무 이유도 없이 갑자기
쓰레기 비가 내리기 시작했어요

Subtitle: [shrieks] Okay, fine, fine.
My bag broke, and I ditched the trash / instead of taking it all the way to the dumpster.
Translation:
내 봉투가 찢어져서
쓰레기를 길바닥에 버렸어요 / 그걸 쓰레기통에까지
가져가지 않고 말이에요

Subtitle: But in my defense, / there were only five minutes left in flying and I wanted to go flying.
Translation:
그걸 쓰레기통에까지
가져가지 않고 말이에요 하지만 변명을 하자면 / 날기 위한 시간이
5분밖에 안 남았고 나는 가서 날고 싶었어요

Subtitle: How is that a defense? You made a bad choice.
Translation:
그게 어떻게 변명이 되죠?
당신은 나쁜 선택을 했어요

Subtitle: I made a bad choice? We could have literally been flying, / and all you wanted to do was talk about morals.
Translation:
내가 나쁜 선택을 했다고요?
우린 말 그대로 날 수 있었어요 / 당신이 원하는 건 그저
도덕성에 관해 얘기하는 거였죠

Subtitle: I mean, you're like the worst part of Superman.
This is a relief. I can stop my deliberations.
Translation:
이제 안심이에요
더 생각 안 해도 되겠어요

Subtitle: You're a selfish person, and it is pointless to help you.
Translation:
당신은 이기적인 사람이고
당신을 돕는 건 무의미해요

Subtitle: You are on your own.
[Antonio] Oh, man.
-How 'bout this trash storm, Gunnar? -More cleaning up to do.
Translation: 이 쓰레기 폭풍 어때, 거너? 치울 게 더 많아졌어

Subtitle: -It's a... It's a dream come true. -[crashes]
-We're okay! -[sighs]
You can't die here.
Come on, I mean, even you have to admit, those guys are psycho.
Translation:
이봐요, 당신도 인정해야 해요
저 사람들은 사이코예요

Subtitle: I don't know what's happening to me. I mean, it's my duty / to be calm and in control and I'm falling apart.
Translation:
나한테 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지
모르겠어요 / 침착하고 자제하는 게 내 의무인데
지금 난 무너지고 있어요

Subtitle: No, Michael, you are a paragon of fortitude.
Translation:
아니에요, 마이클, 당신은
불굴의 용기의 본보기예요

Subtitle: -[scoffs] -You're a mountain of strength.
I'm not a mountain of strength.
I'm a canyon...
full of poo-poo. [sobbing]
Jianyu, the architect of this neighborhood / has just referred to himself as a canyon full of poo-poo.
Translation:
지안유, 이 지역의 설계자가 / 방금 자기를 똥으로 가득 찬
계곡이라고 했어요

Subtitle: Surely now you will say something.
Translation: 이제 정말, 뭐 할 말 없어요?

Subtitle: Grace us with your vocalized wisdom. Please, I'm begging you.
Translation:
우리에게 은혜를 베풀어서 당신의
지혜를 듣게 해줘요, 간청할게요

Subtitle: Yes, yes, I understand.
The strength is inside me. It's been there all along.
Translation: 그 힘은 내 안에 있어요 계속 거기에 있었네요

Subtitle: No, of course, I can overcome any obstacle.
Translation:
네, 당연히 난 어떤 장애물도
극복할 수 있어요

Subtitle: Oh, thank you, Jianyu, thank you.
[chuckles] I'm back.
You did it.
Oh, you have so much to teach me.
Maybe I should try to be silent, too.
Translation:
나도 침묵하려고
노력해야 할 것 같아요

Subtitle: No really, look. Here I go.
Oh! That was wonderful! So cleansing.
Just water tonight, huh? Designated driver?
-Yeah, it sucks. -I think it's awesome.
Translation: 네, 엿 같네요 난 멋지다고 생각해요

Subtitle: I mean, someone's got to do it, right?
Translation:
내 말은, 누군가는 그걸
해야 하잖아요, 그렇죠?

Subtitle: I think it's a cool thing to do for people.
Translation:
사람들을 위해 그런 일을
하는 건 멋지다고 생각해요

Subtitle: Yeah. No, I meant...
I meant it sucks that I can't do it more often, you know?
Translation:
내 말은 더 자주 할 수 없어서
엿 같다는 거예요, 알죠?

Subtitle: I actually prefer it to drinking.
Translation:
사실 나는 운전하는 걸
술 마시는 것보다 좋아해요

Subtitle: Staying sober and knowing my friends will get home safe, / that's my buzz.
Translation:
취하지 않고 친구들이
집에 무사히 갈 수 있게 돕는 건 / 저의 기쁨이에요

Subtitle: Hey, guys, good news and bad news.
Translation:
얘들아, 좋은 소식과
나쁜 소식이 있어

Subtitle: See that hot bartender over there? He's into me, and we're gonna bang it out.
Translation:
저기에 있는 섹시한 바텐더 보여? 저 사람이 나에게 관심이 있어
그래서 우린 따로 어울릴 거야

Subtitle: The bad news is, it means I can't drive you guys home.
Translation:
나쁜 소식은 내가 너희를
집에 데려다줄 수 없다는 거야

Subtitle: -But I did call a cab for you guys. -[sighs]
Translation:
하지만 너희를 위해
내가 택시를 불렀어

Subtitle: But they recognized my number, and they didn't want to come.
Translation:
하지만 내 번호를 알아보고는
오기 싫어했어

Subtitle: I've thrown up in a lot of cabs.
So are we good here?
Eleanor, you have a very important choice to make.
Translation:
엘리너, 넌 굉장히
중요한 선택을 해야 해

Subtitle: If you blow us off, / you are banned from Thursday night drinks forever.
Translation:
우릴 버리고 가버리면 / 넌 목요일 밤 술 모임에서
영원히 제명될 거야

Subtitle: Yeah, I'm good with that.
Translation:
그래, 그래도 난 괜찮아
직장에서 보자고

Subtitle: I'll see you guys at work. Peace!
Translation:
그래, 그래도 난 괜찮아
직장에서 보자고 평화!

Subtitle: You, let's go.
Hey. How did you know I was here?
Translation:
이봐요 내가 여기 있는 거
어떻게 알았어요?

Subtitle: I saw you from my window.
That's where I live, by the way. Not that you ever asked.
Translation:
그건 그렇고
저기가 내가 사는 곳이에요 당신은 물어본 적이 없죠

Subtitle: What are you doing?
I went to all the places where I dumped trash earlier / and cleaned it up so it couldn't be traced back to me.
Translation:
난 모든 곳에 갔어요 내가 아까 쓰레기를
버렸던 곳에 말이죠 / 그리고 청소를 했어요, 그게
나한테 돌아오지 않게 말이에요

Subtitle: Well, it looks like you cleaned up everything.
Translation:
보아하니 모든 걸
청소한 것 같네요

Subtitle: You're doing this because you feel bad.
Translation:
당신은 기분이 불편해서
이 일을 하는 거예요

Subtitle: And you're not even doing it to get me to help you anymore, / because I told you that's not gonna happen.
Translation:
내가 당신을 돕게 하려고
이 일을 하는 건 아니죠 / 난 당신을 돕지 않을 거라고
말했으니까요

Subtitle: Okay, yeah, fine, I felt bad / for stupid Gunnar and stupider Antonio and the whole neighborhood.
Translation:
맞아요, 마음이 불편했어요 / 바보 같은 거너랑 더 바보 같은
안토니오와 모든 이웃에게요

Subtitle: I felt bad about what I did. It was a weird feeling.
Translation:
내가 한 일에 대해 불편했어요
그건 이상한 기분이었죠

Subtitle: Not used to it. Didn't love it.
Translation:
익숙하지 않은 느낌이었고
별로 좋지는 않았어요

Subtitle: Well, feeling remorse about being wrong / isn't as good as just doing something right, but it's a start.
Translation:
익숙하지 않은 느낌이었고
별로 좋지는 않았어요 잘못한 일에 대해 후회한다는 건 / 잘못한 일에 대해 후회한다는 건 옳은 일을 하는 것만큼
좋은 건 아니지만 그게 시작이에요

Subtitle: -Look, I think you're capable of change. -[sighs]
Translation:
나는 당신이 바뀔 수
있다고 생각해요

Subtitle: And I will help you try.
Oh, wow, man, I swear I won't let you down.
Hi there. I've collected the worst-smelling garbage that I could find.
Translation:
안녕하세요
내가 찾을 수 있는 것 중 가장 악취가 심한
쓰레기를 찾았어요

Subtitle: Do you still want me to dump it inside of Antonio's house?
Translation:
당신은 아직도 내가 이걸
안토니오 집에 던지길 원하세요?

Subtitle: [exclaims] What? No.
I did not tell you to do that. You are loco, girlfriend.
Translation:
난 당신한테 그렇게
하라고 안 했어요 당신 미쳤군요, 친구

Subtitle: Okay, I won't let you down starting now.
Ah, Eleanor. Good morning.
Michael, do you know what the best part about this place is?
Translation:
- 좋은 아침이에요
- 마이클 이곳에서 가장 좋은 게
어떤 부분인지 아세요?

Subtitle: You figured out how to make a to-go cup / that doesn't leak right where the seam meets the lid.
Translation:
컵과 뚜껑이 만나는 곳이 / 새지 않는 테이크아웃 컵을
만드는 법을 알아냈다는 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, I'm so glad you noticed. I was very proud of that.
Translation: 알아차렸다니 정말 기뻐요 난 그게 정말 자랑스러웠죠

Subtitle: One of the hardest problems I had to solve.
Translation:
내가 가장 풀기
어려운 문제 중 하나였어요

Subtitle: Eleanor, I know what you did.
Translation:
엘리너 당신이 무슨 짓을
했는지 알고 있어요

Subtitle: Cleaning up the entire neighborhood by yourself.
[laughs] I knew you were special, but this is proof.
Translation:
당신이 특별한 건 알았지만
이게 그 증명이에요

Subtitle: Well, I was just doing my part. You know, and, um...
Translation: 난 그저 내 할 일을 했어요 그리고...

Subtitle: Since I'm special, your words, I didn't get to fly.
Translation:
특별하다고 하시니까 말씀인데
저는 어제 못 날아봤어요

Subtitle: I'm sorry. No, I've had to ban flying for 1,000 years. Too many injuries.
Translation:
미안해요, 안 되죠, 난 나는 걸 천 년 동안 금지해야 했어요
부상자가 너무 많았죠

Subtitle: One resident hit a rotting turkey carcass at a 1,000 miles an hour.
Translation:
한 주민은 썩어가는 칠면조
시체와 부딪혔어요 시속 1,600km로요

Subtitle: It just exploded into this fireball of turkey flesh and bones and sinew.
Translation:
폭발해서 칠면조 살과 뼈와 힘줄로 된
불덩이가 됐어요

Subtitle: Anyway, enjoy your coffee. And the cup.
Translation: 어쨌든, 커피 맛있게 드세요 그 컵으로요

Subtitle: So I have moved out of my apartment officially / and into your guest room. Figured it would cause less suspicion / and make things easier for our "good person" lessons.
Translation:
그래서 나는 내 아파트에서
공식적으로 나왔어요 / 그리고 당신의 손님방으로 왔어요
그게 '선한 사람' 교육에 대해 / 의심도 덜 사고
수월할 거 같아서였죠

Subtitle: Cool. Uh, just FYI, I'm a very loud snorer.
Translation:
좋아요, 그냥 알려드리는데
난 코를 심하게 골아요

Subtitle: And I like to drip dry in the nude, so eyes to yourself, perv.
Translation:
그리고 벌거벗은 채로 몸을
말려요, 그러니 쳐다보지 말아요

Subtitle: Okay. Fine. Now you got a long way to go to pull this off.
Translation:
알았어요, 당신이 이걸 달성하기
위해선 갈 길이 멀어요

Subtitle: It will take hours and hours of studying ethics and moral philosophy.
Translation:
윤리와 도덕 철학을 공부하는데
많은 시간이 걸릴 거예요

Subtitle: We're gonna have assignments and quizzes and papers.
Translation:
과제도 있을 거고
퀴즈와 시험도 볼 거예요

Subtitle: It's gonna be so much fun.
Remind me what I'm getting out of this again.
Translation:
이렇게까지 해서 얻는 게 뭔지
다시 알려줘요

Subtitle: You get to avoid eternal damnation.
Oh, yeah. Right.
-Hey, I got you a present. -What?
Senegal.
That's not a present. That's just common decency.
Translation:
그건 선물이 아니에요
그냥 상식적인 예절이에요

Subtitle: Yeah, but I forkin' nailed it.
Good talk.
So, Aristotle was Plato's student.
So, Aristotle was Plato's student.
And Aristotle believes that your character is voluntary, / because it's just the result of your actions, / which are under your control.
Translation:
아리스토텔레스는 사람들의 성격은
자발적이라고 했어요 "넌 여기 속하지 않아" / 왜냐하면 자발적이라는 건
행동의 결과이기 때문이죠 / 사람들이 통제할 수 있고요 "니코마코스 윤리"

Subtitle: For example, right now, / you have made the insane choice to ignore the person / who is literally trying to save you from eternal damnation.
Translation:
예를 들어, 바로 지금 / 당신을 말 그대로 영원한
지옥살이에서 구해줄 사람을 / 당신을 말 그대로 영원한
지옥살이에서 구해줄 사람을 무시하는 미친 선택을
한 것처럼요

Subtitle: No, yeah, yeah, yeah, I'm listening.
Uh, I just...
Are we sure we should be paying attention to these guys?
Translation:
우리가 정말 이 사람들에게
주의를 기울여야 하나요?

Subtitle: It's like, who died and left Aristotle in charge of ethics?
Translation:
죽어서 아리스토텔레스에게 윤리를
책임지게 한 사람이 누군가요?

Subtitle: Plato.
Uh, coming!
Uh, we're just... Kissing.
-And groping? -[softly] What?
Hello.
Tahani. Hi. What brings you here?
You know, I was just, uh, in the neighborhood. [laughs]
Do you get it, Eleanor?
Because, you know, we're all in the same afterlife, / so, you know, I'm always in the neighborhood.
Translation:
왜냐하면, 그러니까, 우린 모두
같은 사후 세계에 있잖아요 / 그러니까, 전 항상
근처에 있는 거죠

Subtitle: Do you get it?
I do, and it's delightful.
Anyway, this is for you.
Just a housewarming plant.
It's a little reminder that if there's ever anything that you need, / I am right next door.
Translation:
다시 한번 말씀드리지만
뭐든 필요한 게 있으면 / 얘기해요, 전 바로
옆집에 있으니까요

Subtitle: How could I possibly forget?
-Have a great day, Tahani! -Oh, all right.
Translation: 좋은 하루 되세요, 타하니! 오, 그럴게요

Subtitle: Ugh. Tahani.
[in British accent] Welcome to the neighborhood.
Even though we all arrived here at the same time.
Here's some dirt I put in a bowl because I'm amazing.
Translation:
난 대단한 사람이니까 여기 그릇에
담긴 흙 좀 드릴게요

Subtitle: I thought it was kind of a nice gesture.
[in normal voice] Oh, Chidi.
It's a total con. I see through her little act.
Translation:
이건 완전히 사기예요
난 그녀의 의도를 간파했어요

Subtitle: Her act of being a nice person who brings you gifts?
Translation:
당신한테 선물을 가져다줌으로써
좋은 사람이 되려는 의도요?

Subtitle: -Bingo. -Okay.
I'll... I'll remind you that you're trying to learn / -how to be a good person. -Mmm-hmm.
Translation:
제가... 상기시켜드리죠
당신은 지금 / 좋은 사람이 되는 법을
배우려고 하는 중이에요

Subtitle: Maybe you should return the favor and bring her something.
Translation:
호의에 대한 보답으로 그녀에게
뭔가를 갖다 주는 게 좋을 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, so now I'm supposed to be nice and make friends / and treat her with mutual respect?
Translation:
그러니까 지금 제가
좋은 사람이어야 하고 친구를 / 사귀어야 하니까 그녀를
상호 존중하라는 거죠?

Subtitle: Yeah.
That's exactly what she wants me to do, Chidi. Wake up!
Translation:
정확히 그게 바로 그녀가
원하는 거예요, 정신 차려요!

Subtitle: That, that's what everyone wants everyone to do.
Translation:
그게... 그게 모든 사람이
다른 사람에게 원하는 거예요

Subtitle: Hello, Chidi. No frozen yogurt for you this morning?
Translation:
안녕하세요, 치디 프로즌 요구르트
오늘 아침엔 안 먹어요?

Subtitle: Oh, uh, no, just, uh, doing some reading.
Ugh, been there, brother.
Workin' hard or hardly workin', am I right?
Translation:
열심히 일하거나
거의 안 하거나죠, 맞죠?

Subtitle: -Hump day. -Uh, sorry.
Janet's functioning as my assistant, / but she's a little stiff, so I've been trying to get her / to be a little more casual and conversational.
Translation:
재닛은 내 비서로 일하고 있어요 / 하지만 그녀는 조금 뻣뻣해요
그래서 난 재닛을 / 좀 더 격식 차리지 않고 말을
많이 하게 만들려고 노력하고 있죠

Subtitle: -I'll have what she's having. -It's a work in progress.
Translation: 난 저 여자와 같은 거로 할게요 아직 작업 중이에요

Subtitle: Listen, Chidi. I've been studying your file.
Translation: 들어봐요, 치디 난 당신의 파일을 검토하고 있어요

Subtitle: You're a very interesting case.
You essentially only did one thing while you were on Earth.
Translation:
당신은 기본적으로 지구에 있을 때
딱 한 가지 일만 했더군요

Subtitle: You thought and wrote about ethics.
Yes, I spent 18 years working on my manuscript called, / -Who We Are and Who We Are Not... -Right. No, no, no.
Translation:
네, 저는 제 원고를 쓰는데
18년이 걸렸어요 / 그 제목이 '우리의 본질과 비본질'

Subtitle: Practical Ethics and Their Application in the Modern World; A Treatise on--
Yes, yes, yes, that's the one. -That's the one. -Mmm-hmm.
I think you should experience new adventures.
Translation:
난 당신이 새로운 모험을
경험해야 한다고 생각해요

Subtitle: You know, do things that you haven't done on Earth, right?
Translation:
지구에선 하지 못했던
일들 말이죠, 어때요?

Subtitle: So why don't we meet tomorrow and try out some new hobbies.
Translation:
내일 만나서 새로운 취미를
좀 시도해보는 건 어떨까요?

Subtitle: Uh, why not? [chuckles softly] I'll see you guys tomorrow.
Not if I see you first. Where's the beef?
Translation:
제가 당신을 먼저 보지 않는다면요
알맹이는 어디 있죠?

Subtitle: -[chuckles] I don't know. -[Janet] Hump day.
Hello, Eleanor.
Jianyu, darling, look, it's Eleanor from next door.
Translation:
지안유, 자기야
옆집에 사는 엘리너가 왔어요

Subtitle: Is he asleep?
Yeah, there's really no way to tell. Come on in.
Translation:
네, 알 방법이 없네요 들어오세요
무슨 일로 오셨나요?

Subtitle: What brings you to our home, my dear?
Well, I'm simply repaying your kind gift / with a housewarming gift of my own.
Translation:
당신의 친절한 선물에 대한 / 보답으로 제가 준비한
집들이 선물이에요

Subtitle: Fresh pears.
It's a plant, just like your gift, but you can actually eat them.
Translation:
당신의 선물처럼 식물이지만
실제로 그걸 먹을 수 있어요

Subtitle: So maybe it's a better gift.
Translation:
그러니까 이게
더 나은 선물 같네요

Subtitle: -Who's to say? -That's so kind.
However, in, um, Chinese culture, pears are actually a symbol of bad luck.
Translation:
하지만, 중국 문화에선
배는 사실 불운의 상징이라고 해요

Subtitle: And I wouldn't want to offend Jianyu, / so I'm afraid I'm gonna have to throw these in the garbage.
Translation:
그리고 전 지안유를
자극하고 싶지 않아요 / 그래서 안타깝지만 저는 이걸
쓰레기통에 버려야겠어요

Subtitle: But do come and sit down.
We haven't even had a chance / to discuss all of the mayhem in our neighborhood yet.
Translation:
우린 게다가 우리 지역에 일어났던 / 그 아수라장에 대해
얘기조차 나누지 못했어요

Subtitle: -It's so disconcerting. -Yes.
What do you think is causing it?
Oh, I'm sure I don't know. But we must keep our heads up.
Translation: 정말 모르겠어요 하지만 우린 기운을 내야 해요

Subtitle: In fact, tomorrow I'm actually going door-to-door / to make sure that every single person in this entire neighborhood / is keeping calm and carrying on.
Translation:
사실, 내일 저는
집집이 돌아다니면서 / 이 온 지역의 모든 사람이 차분하게 잘 견디고 있는지
확인하려고 해요 / 차분하게 잘 견디고 있는지
확인하려고 해요

Subtitle: 'Cause I think that helping others will make me feel / like I truly belong here, you know?
Translation:
왜냐하면 다른 사람들을 돕는 것이 / 절 진짜 이곳에 속한 것처럼
느끼게 하기 때문이죠

Subtitle: Here's a brainstorm, why don't I go with you?
Translation:
갑자기 떠오른 생각인데
저도 같이 가면 안 될까요?

Subtitle: I mean, I would love to do my part to help the neighborhood, / not to mention, get a little bonding time with you, lady.
Translation:
제 말은, 저도 이웃을 돕는데
일익을 담당하고 싶어요 / 당연히 당신과 약간의
교제 시간도 가지고 말이죠

Subtitle: Oh, hurrah!
[Tahani] Such fun.
[Eleanor] I'm telling you, Tahani's out to get me.
[stammers] What are you talking about?
This note was slipped under my door yesterday.
Translation:
이 쪽지가 어제
문 아래로 들어왔어요

Subtitle: It has to be Tahani.
She just said to me... [in British accent] "I want to feel like I truly belong here."
Translation:
그녀가 나한테 말하기를, '전 정말
여기 속해 있다고 느끼고 싶어요'

Subtitle: Well, where have I seen the word "belong" recently?
Oh, yeah, kaplow!
I really don't think she's the type of person who would write this.
Translation: 난 정말로 타하니가 이런 걸 쓸 종류의 사람이 아니라고 생각해요

Subtitle: She is that kind of person and she did write it.
Translation:
타하니는 그런 종류의 사람이고
그녀가 이걸 썼어요

Subtitle: She wants everybody to think she's such a perfect princess / just 'cause she's tall and glamorous / and has cappuccino skin and curves everywhere.
Translation:
타하니는 모든 사람들이 자기를
완벽한 공주로 생각하길 원해요 / 단지 자기가 키가 크고 글래머고 / 단지 자기가 키가 크고 글래머고 갈색 피부에 몸매가 좋다는
이유에서 말이에요

Subtitle: And now I'm complimenting her. And kind of turned on.
Translation:
그리고 지금 나도 타하니를
칭찬하고 있어요 그리고 좀 흥분이 되네요

Subtitle: The point is, she straight up sucks, bro.
Translation:
중요한 건, 타하니는
정말 밥맛이라는 거예요

Subtitle: Typical Tahani.
Brings us a faulty plant so she can brag about being a better gardener.
Translation:
우리한테 흠 있는 식물을
갖다 줘서 자기가 더 나은 정원사라고
자랑하려는 거죠

Subtitle: No, I think this is another way in which your negative actions affect this world.
Translation:
아뇨, 제 생각엔
당신의 부정적인 행동들이 이 세계에 다른 방식으로
영향을 미치는 것 같아요

Subtitle: This plant represents your relationship to Tahani, / so when you're mean to her, it starts to wilt.
Translation:
이 식물은 당신과
타하니 사이의 관계를 나타내요 / 그래서 당신이 그녀에게 못되게
굴면, 이게 시들기 시작해요

Subtitle: Well, then this plant is doomed / because tomorrow, I'm going with her and I'm gonna prove to you / and to everyone that she is secretly a two-faced, / calculating, phony bench.
Translation:
그렇다면 이 식물은
죽을 수밖에 없네요 / 왜냐하면 내일 나는 타하니와
돌아다니면서 당신과 / 왜냐하면 내일 나는 타하니와
돌아다니면서 당신과 모든 사람들에게 타하니가
남모르게 이중적이고 / 계산적이고, 허위로 가득 찬
년이라는 걸 증명할 거니까요

Subtitle: -[whining] -Hmm. Yeah.
Truth hurts, doesn't it, plant?
So, all I want to do is just check in, see how everyone's holding up.
Translation:
난 그저 들어가서 모두가 어떻게
지내는지 알고 싶을 뿐이에요

Subtitle: Just bring some cheer to these extraordinary people.
Translation:
이 특별한 사람들에게 약간의
힘을 가져다주려는 거예요

Subtitle: Cool.
So, tell me about yourself.
I mean, I want to hear it all, girlfriend.
Translation: 전 모든 걸 듣고 싶어요, 타하니

Subtitle: The good, the bad, the really bad, / the embarrassing, the humiliating, just... Let's bond.
Translation:
좋은 점, 나쁜 점, 진짜 나쁜 점 / 당황스러웠던 일, 수치스러웠던 일
그냥 함께 나눠요!

Subtitle: Okay, well I was born in Pakistan, raised in London, schooled in Paris, / but I think the primary reason that I'm in The Good Place / is that I raised quite a lot of money for non-profit groups.
Translation:
좋아요, 저는 파키스탄에서
태어났어요 런던에서 자랐고 파리에서
공부했어요, 하지만 / 내가 굿 플레이스에
오게 된 주된 이유는 / 비영리 단체를 위해 많은 돈을
모금했기 때문인 거 같아요

Subtitle: Did you ever, uh, skim a little off the top for yourself?
Translation:
그중 당신을 위해 일부를
빼돌리기도 했나요?

Subtitle: Gracious, no, no! Every penny was accounted for.
Translation: 세상에, 아니요! 동전 하나까지 다 보고했어요

Subtitle: And as I raised nearly $60,000,000,000, there was quite a lot of pennies.
Translation:
그리고 난 거의 600억 달러를
모금했기 때문에 동전이 엄청나게 많았죠

Subtitle: But I also dabbled in some other professions.
I was a model, a museum curator, an "It Girl," and...
Oh, I was Baz Luhrmann's muse for a while. That was quite fun.
Translation:
오, 잠깐 동안 바즈 루어만의
뮤즈이기도 했어요, 아주 재밌었죠

Subtitle: Modeling? That's a crazy life.
Want to tell me about that rock bottom you probably hit?
Translation:
가장 바닥을 쳤던 일에 대해
저한테 얘기하고 싶어요?

Subtitle: Oh, I didn't really do it for long. Couture just doesn't fit my body.
Translation: 모델로는 오래 일하지 않았어요 명품 옷이 제 몸에 안 맞아요

Subtitle: I'm cursed with ample bosom.
And yet you soldier on.
Oh, this is silly...
So "Tahani" means "congratulations" in Arabic.
And "Al-Jamil" means "beautiful,"
-so my full name altogether means... -"Congratulations, Beautiful."
Translation: 그래서 제 이름을 다 합치면... '축하해요, 예쁜이'

Subtitle: Thanks, Eleanor. You big flirt. [giggles]
-Hey, babe, got you coffee. -Oh, great.
Translation: 자기야, 커피 여기 있어 오, 좋아

Subtitle: Oh, Andy's Coffee, uh, we shouldn't go there.
Translation:
어, 앤디네 커피잖아
거기 가면 안 돼

Subtitle: Everybody's boycotting.
Yeah, I know that one guy found a scorpion in his latte.
Translation:
나도 어떤 사람이
라테에서 전갈 발견한 거 알아

Subtitle: I don't really care, though, 'cause it's so close to here.
Translation:
하지만 난 전혀 신경 안 써
그 집이 여기서 제일 가깝거든

Subtitle: No, no, no, it's because he's sexually harassing people.
Translation:
아니야, 그건 앤디가 사람들을
성희롱하기 때문이야

Subtitle: Look, a journalist went undercover for an interview / and recorded him. Here, watch.
Translation:
아니야, 그건 앤디가 사람들을
성희롱하기 때문이야 어떤 기자가 신분을 속이고
인터뷰를 하러 갔어 / 그리고 그를 촬영했어 이것 좀 봐

Subtitle: Here's the thing, sweetheart.
You're very qualified, but you're also what we call / in the coffee shop game a, uh, dog-face.
Translation:
당신은 자격은 되는데
하지만 당신은 우리가 / "단독: 커피점 변태 성욕자" 커피점에서 말하는 '개상'이야

Subtitle: You're a three, and you have to be a nine to work here.
It's just math.
-[woman] So, I didn't get the job? -[chuckles]
No, dog-face, you didn't get the job.
Translation:
그래, 개상이어서
일을 할 수 없어

Subtitle: All right, I'll check your references.
-Just to be nice-- -[woman] Hey, my breasts!
I'll check 'em. Oh, they're good. Honk!
I mean, this guy's a monster, we can't support this guy.
Translation:
내 말은, 이놈은 괴물이야
이놈 커피를 마시면 안 돼

Subtitle: Okay, hey, you're not better than me / just 'cause you won't support a guy who grabbed a boob once.
Translation:
네가 가슴 한번 만진 놈의
커피를 안 마신다고 해서 / 네가 나보다 나은
사람이 되는 게 아니야

Subtitle: No, I'm just saying we shouldn't go there. We can get coffee somewhere else.
Translation:
단지 거기에 가선 안 된다는 거야
커피는 딴 데서 마셔도 되잖아

Subtitle: Did you know your left reference / is a little bit bigger than your right reference?
Translation:
당신 왼쪽 추천서가
오른쪽 추천서보다 / 당신 왼쪽 추천서가
오른쪽 추천서보다 약간 큰 거 알고 있어?

Subtitle: It's not a bad thing, it's just... It's a thing. [chuckles]
Translation:
이건 나쁜 게 아니야
이건 그냥... 그런 거야

Subtitle: This is the perfect hobby for you, Chidi.
Translation:
이게 당신에게 완벽한
취미가 될 거예요, 치디

Subtitle: Cartography.
Your neighborhood stretches way beyond what you've already seen.
Translation:
당신의 지역은 당신이
이미 본 곳을 훨씬 넘어서 뻗어 있어요
당신은 그 지도를 만들 수 있어요

Subtitle: And you can map it, / revealing all of the mysteries, like an explorer.
Translation:
훨씬 넘어서 뻗어 있어요
당신은 그 지도를 만들 수 있어요 / 탐험가처럼 모든 신비를
드러내면서요

Subtitle: -I see how that might be fun. -[chuckles]
Translation: 그게 어떤 재미인지 알 것 같네요

Subtitle: Uh, but, uh, exploring makes me nervous.
I have what doctors call, "directional insanity."
I once got lost on an escalator. So, not exactly Christopher Columbus.
Translation:
한 번은 에스컬레이터에서
길을 잃었어요 그러니까 크리스토퍼
콜럼버스는 아닌 거죠

Subtitle: Fun fact, Columbus is in The Bad Place / because of all the raping, slave trade, and genocide.
Translation:
재미있는 사실: 콜럼버스는
배드 플레이스에 있어요 / 그 모든 강간과 노예 거래
그리고 집단 학살 때문이죠

Subtitle: The fact that it makes you nervous is exactly why you should do it.
Translation:
당신을 불안하게 만들기 때문에
바로 이걸 해야 하는 거예요

Subtitle: You know, get out of your comfort zone. Become a trail-blazer.
Translation:
당신의 안전 구역에서 나와요
탐험가가 되라고요!

Subtitle: Fun fact, all deceased members of the Portland Trail Blazers / basketball team are also in The Bad Place.
Translation:
재미있는 사실: 포틀랜드
트레일 블레이저 농구팀의 팀원 중 사망한 사람들도 모두
배드 플레이스에 있답니다 / 팀원 중 사망한 사람들도 모두
배드 플레이스에 있답니다

Subtitle: -[giggles] -Uh, yeah, sorry about this.
I steered her away from colloquialisms and into "fun facts" and "trivia tidbits."
Translation:
재닛을 대화형에서 '재미있는
사실'과 사소한 정보로 바꿨어요

Subtitle: I thought it'd be more in her wheelhouse.
Translation:
이게 재닛에게 더 잘
어울릴 거라 생각했죠

Subtitle: Fun fact, a "wheelhouse" is a part of a boat.
Okay, thank you, Janet, thank you.
Fun fact, Janet is me.
All right, let's forget about exploring. Plenty more ideas for hobbies.
Translation:
알았어요, 탐험은 잊어버리세요 취미에 대한 아이디어가
많이 있으니까요

Subtitle: -Let's walk back to town, shall we? -Okay.
-Wrong way. -[Chidi] Yep.
Well, Glenn, we just wanted to make sure you were all right.
Translation:
글렌, 우린 그저 당신이
괜찮은지 확인하고 싶었어요

Subtitle: -Tahani, you're too sweet. -Oh.
-Isn't she just the nicest person? -Mmm-hmm.
That is what a lot of people are saying.
Oh, everyone I know is saying that.
Translation:
내가 아는 모든 사람들도
그렇게 말하고 있어요

Subtitle: Yeah, it's just a big neighborhood, / full of enormous mansions and people who love Tahani!
Translation:
맞아요, 여긴 큰 지역이에요 / 큰 저택들과 타하니를 사랑하는
사람들로 가득 차 있죠

Subtitle: Eleanor and I just want to see if there's anything we can do to help you.
Translation:
엘리너와 저는 뭔가 도와드릴 게
없는지 확인하고 싶었어요

Subtitle: Oh, Tahani, you are so thoughtful.
Despite all the chaos earlier, we simply couldn't be happier.
Translation:
일전의 혼란에도 불구하고
우린 이보다 더 행복할 순 없어요

Subtitle: Oh, I'm so glad to hear it, Cualli. Please take a maple butter scone.
Translation: 오, 그렇다니 정말 좋네요, 쿠알리 메이플 버터 스콘 좀 드셔보세요

Subtitle: I made them fresh this morning.
Translation:
제가 오늘 아침에
바로 구운 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, they look a bit burned.
Translation: 오, 조금 탄 것 같아 보여요

Subtitle: But they're not. Hmm. Oh, fork, that's good.
Extra, extra!
Read all about you.
Translation: 당신에 관한 모든 걸 읽어 봐요

Subtitle: Chidi, this is the perfect hobby for you. Journalism.
Translation:
치디, 이게 당신을 위한
완벽한 취미예요 "치디 아나곤예
편집장 되다" 저널리즘

Subtitle: Well, obviously, I like to write.
Translation: 확실히, 전 글 쓰는 걸 좋아하죠

Subtitle: But I don't love deadlines. I prefer to take my time with things.
Translation:
하지만 전 마감 시간은
좋아하지 않아요 전 시간을 가지고
일하는 게 좋아요

Subtitle: Yes, I know. Uh, you never even named your dog, did you?
Translation:
네, 알아요 당신 개한테 이름을
지어준 적조차 없죠?

Subtitle: When it ran away, you posted signs saying, / "Responds to long pauses."
Translation:
개가 도망갔을 때
벽보에 이렇게 적었죠 / '긴 침묵에 반응합니다'

Subtitle: Look, Chidi, I'm just trying to find you a hobby--
Translation:
치디, 전 그냥 당신한테
취미를 찾아주려 하고 있어요...

Subtitle: The hat-- That will bring you a positive experience.
Translation:
그 모자... 이게 당신에게
긍정적인 경험을 가져다줄 거예요

Subtitle: What do you say?
I'm loving that hat on you. It would look even better on my floor.
Translation:
모자 쓴 거 맘에 들어요 우리 집 바닥에 있으면
훨씬 나을 거예요

Subtitle: What is happening now?
I suggested she be friendlier, she seems to have / slipped right into overt sexuality.
Translation:
재닛에게 좀 더 다정해지라고
요청했는데, 그녀는 / 노골적인 성적 취향에 바로
빠져버린 것 같아요

Subtitle: I got something you can slip into.
-Oh-- -Janet, no!
No, Janet.
Oh, Jianyu, darling, would you like some tea?
That nod meant no, apparently.
Well, it was nice to get out and meet all of our wonderful neighbors.
Translation:
나가서 우리의 멋진 이웃들을
만난 건 참 좋았어요

Subtitle: They all truly belong here.
Oh, yes, they do, cutie-pants. Boop!
Well, I should really be going. I have to begin / my 12 step Korean skincare regiment, but, uh, I'll see-- Oh, no, no, no.
Translation:
저는 진짜 가봐야겠어요
저는 가서 나의 / 12단계 한국식 피부관리를
시작해야 해서요 하지만 나중에... 오, 아니에요

Subtitle: Please stay and enjoy the evening tea. I'll see you soon.
Translation:
여기서 좀 더 이브닝 티를
즐기세요, 또 봐요

Subtitle: "The Diary of Tahani Al-Jamil."
Okay. Arc welding.
You could learn sculpture, you can make furniture, / you can get your hands a little greasy, you know, / and you make things.
Translation:
조각을 배울 수 있고
가구도 만들 수 있고 / 당신 손에 기름이
좀 묻을 수 있어요 / 당신 손에 기름이
좀 묻을 수 있어요 그리고 뭔가를 만드는 거죠

Subtitle: This equipment is very scary!
Don't be a baby. It can't hurt you.
Translation:
아기처럼 굴지 말아요
당신을 다치게 하지 않아요

Subtitle: Watch, I'll blowtorch your face off.
Translation:
봐요, 내가 당신 얼굴을
토치로 날려버릴 거예요

Subtitle: -Janet. -Whatever.
This whole thing is stupid.
Translation: 이 모든 게 다 바보 같아

Subtitle: Oh, brother. -I told her to be less flirty... -[metal clanking]
Translation:
그녀에게 추파를
좀 덜 던지라고 했더니

Subtitle: And now she's cruel and distant, apparently.
Translation:
그녀에게 추파를
좀 덜 던지라고 했더니 이제 잔인하고 무심해졌어요

Subtitle: I just can't get this right.
Translation:
난 이걸 바로잡을 수
없을 것 같아요

Subtitle: Thank you for trying to find me a new hobby.
Translation:
저에게 새로운 취미를
찾아주시려는 건 정말 감사해요

Subtitle: Um, but I just want to be an academic.
Translation:
하지만 전 그냥
학구적으로 살고 싶어요

Subtitle: I want to keep working on my manuscript.
Translation: 다시 제 원고를 계속 쓰고 싶어요

Subtitle: Chidi, here's the thing.
See, I read your whole book, all 3,600 pages of it.
Translation:
저는 당신의 책을 다 읽었어요
3,600페이지 모두 다를요

Subtitle: It's, um... How shall I put this?
It's a mess, dude.
Hey! She's right.
You see, Chidi, I can read the entirety / of the world's literature in about an hour.
Translation:
치디, 저는 이 세상에 있는 / 모든 책을 한 시간 정도에
다 읽을 수 있어요

Subtitle: This took me two weeks to get through.
I mean, it's so convoluted, I just kept reading / the same paragraph over and over again, / trying to figure out what the heck you were saying.
Translation:
이건 너무 난해해요
저는 계속해서 / 같은 문단을 반복해서 읽었어요
대체 당신이 뭔 말을 하는 건지 / 같은 문단을 반복해서 읽었어요
대체 당신이 뭔 말을 하는 건지 이해하려고 노력하면서 말이죠

Subtitle: -Oh, no. -I mean, on page 1,000, / you start section two with the sentence, / "Of course, the exact opposite might be true."
Translation:
- 오, 이런
- 1,000번째 페이지에서 / 이 문장과 함께 2부를 시작하죠 / '물론, 정확히 반대 상황도
옳을 수도 있다'

Subtitle: You're a brilliant guy, Chidi.
But you just kept revising and rewriting and adding words to your title.
Translation:
하지만 당신은 계속 고쳤고 다시
썼고, 제목에 단어를 추가했어요

Subtitle: I think you just twisted yourself up into a knot.
Translation:
전 당신이 자신을 비틀어서
매듭으로 만들었다고 생각해요

Subtitle: I have a very bad stomachache.
[Eleanor] Hey, man.
What's wrong?
Am I a good teacher? Am I clear? Do I make sense?
Translation:
제가 좋은 선생님인가요? 알아듣기 쉽나요?
말이 되는 말을 하나요?

Subtitle: Yeah, you're a great teacher. I'm super ethical now.
Translation: 네, 좋은 선생님이에요 저는 지금 매우 윤리적이에요

Subtitle: -What's that? -Hmm?
Nah, don't worry about it.
I stole Tahani's diary.
So I could see if her handwriting matches the note / and also read about all the mean and terrible things / she's definitely done, so I can prove she's actually evil.
Translation:
혹시 타하니의 글씨체가
쪽지랑 일치하는지 보려고요 / 그리고 타하니가 했을 게 분명한
나쁘고 끔찍한 짓을 찾아서 / 타하니가 진짜 악이라는 걸
증명할 수 있을 거예요

Subtitle: What do you think that means?
You stole Tahani's diary.
I know I broke some ethical rule, but I had good reason.
Translation:
윤리 법칙을 어긴 건 알아요
하지만 합당한 이유가 있었어요

Subtitle: Eleanor, in order to be a good person, you have to do good things.
Translation:
엘리너, 좋은 사람이 되려면
좋은 일을 해야 해요

Subtitle: And not stealing people's stuff, that is just a basic kindergarten rule.
Translation:
그리고 다른 사람의 물건을
훔치는 건 좋은 일이 아니죠 그건 유치원생도
알만한 수준이에요

Subtitle: I mean, do I also have to tell you to not throw sand?
Translation:
모래를 던지지 말라고
당신에게 말해줘야 하나요?

Subtitle: First of all, throwing sand is an excellent way to put out a vodka fire.
Translation:
첫째, 모래를 던지는 건 보드카에
붙은 불을 끄는 훌륭한 방법이죠

Subtitle: Why would you even know that?
Second of all, I know that it may not be nice, / but neither is pretending to be 100% perfect, like Tahani does.
Translation:
둘째, 저도 이게 좋은 행동이
아니란 걸 알아요 / 하지만 타하니처럼 100%
완벽한 척하는 것도 그래요

Subtitle: -She wrote that note. -No, she didn't!
Translation:
- 타하니가 그 쪽지를 썼어요
- 아니요, 그녀가 아니에요!

Subtitle: You did!
I was hoping you would come to this conclusion on your own, / but, obviously, no one here would ever threaten you.
Translation:
전 당신 스스로 이 결론에
도달하길 바라고 있었어요 / 하지만, 확실히, 여기 그 누구도
당신을 협박하지 않을 거예요

Subtitle: That note is The Good Place manifesting your own guilt.
Translation:
그 쪽지는 굿 플레이스가
당신의 죄책감을 보여준 거예요

Subtitle: Like with the plant, or when you literally made / giant shrimp fly through the air.
Translation:
저 식물도 그렇고
또 당신이 말 그대로 / 거대한 새우를 하늘을
날게 만든 거 말이에요

Subtitle: I wrote myself the note.
And as it turns out, I do belong here.
Translation:
그리고 알고 보니까
저는 여기 속해요

Subtitle: Because I'm just as good as everyone else.
No, no, no. No, you don't belong here.
And in this place, everyone is better than you.
It has been proven by an infallible formula.
Tahani might be a little British and condescending at times, / but she devoted her entire life to helping other people.
Translation:
타하니가 조금 영국적일 수 있고 가끔 잘난 체할 수도 있어요 / 하지만 그녀는 자신의 평생을
다른 사람을 돕는 데 헌신했어요

Subtitle: She's a good person. Accept that.
Hey, babe.
