I just want a soulmate.
Someone I can share my passions with, / someone who I can talk to about the ethereal colors of a Degas.
Translation:
내 열정을 나눌 수 있는 사람요 / 에드가르 드가 그림에 대해
얘기할 수 있는 사람요

Subtitle: I love Degas.
I took painting lessons as a kid, and Degas was always my inspiration.
Translation:
어릴 적 미술 수업을 들었는데
드가는 항상 내 영감이었어요

Subtitle: And do you like France as much as I do?
Well, they enslaved my country for 300 years. So, no.
Translation:
프랑스가 내 나라를
300년 동안 지배했어요 그래서 안 좋아해요

Subtitle: -But they have great museums. -Yes.
Welcome to my cafe, you two.
We have a special on soulmate muffins. Two for the price of zero.
Translation:
소울메이트 머핀 스페셜이 있어요
공짜로 두 개 드려요

Subtitle: Everything is free.
Oh, well, we're not soulmates.
-No. [laughs] -We're just...
-Soul friends. -[waitress] Oh.
[Eleanor] Hey, buddy.
I have all new fun stuff for us to do today.
Eleanor, I have huge news.
Not working actually worked.
It did what now?
After our day off, with a completely clear head, / I realized part of what makes humans so fun is that they're unpredictable.
Translation:
하루 놀고 나서
머리가 맑아지니 / 인간은 예측 불가능해서
정말 재미있다는 걸 깨달았어요

Subtitle: The chaos we've been experiencing / is exactly what would happen if a resident / behaved unpredictably.
Translation:
우리가 계속 경험했던 혼란은 / 거주인이 예측 불가능한
행동을 했을 때 / 일어날 일이었어요

Subtitle: The problem in our neighborhood, / it's not a rock or an object.
Translation: 우리 마을의 문제는 / 돌멩이나 물건이 아니에요

Subtitle: It's one of the people.
Oh! We need to celebrate.
I know, okay... [exclaims]
Paper clip shower!
So do you think we're looking for a man, / or do you think we're looking for two men?
Translation: 남자 한 명일까요? / 아니면 남자 두 명일까요?

Subtitle: Not sure.
We don't know anything about this person.
Translation:
이 사람에 대해
아는 게 없어요

Subtitle: I mean, does he or she even know that they caused all these problems?
Translation:
여자든 남자든 이 사람이
문제라는 걸 본인은 알까요?

Subtitle: No, that can't be.
I mean, what kind of monster would wreak havoc and then say nothing?
Translation:
어떤 괴물이 동네에 피해를 주고
아무 말도 안 하겠어요?

Subtitle: So this is the main place where the garbage fell from the sky.
-Janet. -Hi there.
I need a list of everyone that was here on garbage duty / during orientation.
Translation:
오리엔테이션 중에
여기 있었던 쓰레기 담당의 / 목록이 필요해요

Subtitle: Eleanor, our criminal is on this very short list.
People were flying that day too. I'll add everybody who flew overhead.
Translation:
그날 비행 중이던 사람도 있어요
당시 하늘에 있던 사람도 넣을게요

Subtitle: Eleanor, our criminal is on this much longer list.
Oh, hey, homey. Thanks for your advice.
I'm about to give Tahani the best gift ever.
Check it.
What?
She likes impressionist paintings, right?
I got her a painting of the best impressionist of all time, / Frank Caliendo.
Translation:
최고의 성대모사가의
초상화를 구했어요 / 프랭크 칼리엔도

Subtitle: He can do it all. Fat Al Pacino, fat Jerry Seinfeld, / regular John Madden.
Translation:
다 할 수 있어요
뚱뚱한 알 파치노, 제리 사인필드 / 정상 존 매든도 따라 할 수 있어요

Subtitle: "Say hello to my little friend.
Forget about it."
This is where the sinkhole opened up.
And the guest list that night was limited.
There were a total of 30 people here that night.
-[exclaiming in delight] -Only 30, huh?
Yeah! How do you pump your fist again?
Is this it?
But, 66 others passed through to take a look before it opened, / and everyone else in the neighborhood was in a close radius.
Translation:
하지만 영업 전에 66명이
지나갔어요 / 그리고 모든 주민이
가까이에 있었어요

Subtitle: Oh, boy, that... Doesn't narrow it down at all.
Feels like the end of the road.
End of the Road, Boyz II Men, karaoke.
Translation:
보이즈투맨의 '엔드 오브 더 로드'
노래방 어때요?

Subtitle: Let's go. Don't think about it too much.
Janet.
My hoodie, please.
-What's happening? -I give up.
I can't help the people I promised that I would help.
Translation:
내가 도와주겠다고 약속한
사람들을 도울 수가 없어요

Subtitle: I feel like Friends in Season 8, / out of ideas and forcing Joey and Rachel together, / even though it made no sense.
Translation:
'프렌즈' 시즌8 같아요 / 아이디어가 없으니
아무리 말이 안 돼도 / 조이와 레이철을 사귀게 했죠

Subtitle: I hope the sinkhole opens up again and swallows me whole.
Translation:
싱크홀이 다시 열려서
날 통째로 집어삼켰으면 좋겠어요

Subtitle: Paula! Hey, girl. How's the dog?
Still fat, Eleanor. Still fat.
The vet says his stomach expanded to the size of a basketball / and that it will never shrink.
Translation:
수의사 말로는
위가 농구공 크기로 늘어나서 다시 돌아오지 않을 거래요 / 다시 돌아오지 않을 거래요

Subtitle: Oh, well, that's not my fault.
How was I supposed to know he would literally eat all of the food?
Translation: 그 많은 사료를 다 먹을 줄 내가 어떻게 알았겠어요?

Subtitle: It shouldn't have been an issue.
You were supposed to be there, but you broke your promise / as soon as it wasn't convenient for you, and now I have a very bulbous dog.
Translation:
집에서 개를 봐 주기로 해 놓고
상황이 불편해지자마자 / 약속을 어겼잖아요
이제 내 개는 동그래졌어요

Subtitle: Well, you know what? You're rude.
'Cause you didn't even ask me how the Rihanna concert was.
She was very late. And a little drunk.
Translation:
좀 취한 상태로
아주 늦게 왔다고요

Subtitle: I promised to help you, and I will, however I can.
If you want to look at a million rocks like a psychopath, I'll be there.
Translation:
사이코패스처럼
돌멩이 백만 개를 보고 싶다면 나도 같이할게요

Subtitle: If you want to just lay here and cry in your hoodie, / I'm cool with that.
Translation:
후드를 입고 누워서
울고 싶다면 / 그것도 괜찮아요

Subtitle: Honestly, I don't know how I can help you, / 'cause I'm just a person and you're, like, / this super-magical Orville Redenbacher-type guy / who invented this entire universe, but I'll do my best.
Translation:
솔직히 어떻게
도와드려야 할지 모르겠어요 / 왜냐하면 난 그냥 사람이고 / 마이클은 오빌 레덴바커처럼
이 세계 전체를 개발한 / 마법의 남자이지만
최선을 다해 볼게요

Subtitle: I'm right here.
Oh, my gosh.
Of course.
How did I not see it?
Janet...
I found the answer to the problem. Call a neighborhood meeting.
Translation:
문제의 답을 찾았어요
마을 회의를 소집해요

Subtitle: Should it be festive and casual or moribund and devastating?
Translation:
편안한 축제 분위기요?
아니면 죽어가는 분위기요?

Subtitle: Moribund and devastating, please.
Great!
Hello, Jianyu, Chidi.
What's this?
I made you a art.
It's three of me.
It's ballerinas, / painted in the style of the impressionists.
Of course.
You don't say things, but you do things.
Translation:
자기는 말로 하지 않고
행동으로 해요

Subtitle: And you feel things.
Only my true soulmate could ever give me such a perfect gift.
Translation:
내 진짜 소울메이트만이
이런 완벽한 선물을 줄 수 있어요

Subtitle: Thank you!
What's going on?
Well, I did what you said.
I honored my agreement to help Michael / find the problem, and he found the problem.
Translation:
마이클이 문제를 찾는 걸
돕기로 한 약속을 지켰고 / 문제를 찾았어요

Subtitle: Oh, I'm so sorry.
After I'm gone, take down the rest of those clown paintings.
Translation:
내가 가고 나면
광대 그림 나머지 다 내려 줘요

Subtitle: But leave up the sexy mailman.
To remember me by.
Thank you all for your patience with the problems in our neighborhood.
Translation: 마을에 있었던 문제에 대해 인내심을 가져 주셔서 감사합니다

Subtitle: I have finally discovered the cause.
There was one common link among every incident.
And when I figured it out, it was a shock.
Translation:
이를 알게 되었을 때
저도 놀랐어요

Subtitle: But there's no escaping it.
The problem...
Is me.
And now, I have to leave you...
Translation: 그리고 이제 전 여러분을 떠나야 해요

Subtitle: There's no escaping it.
There's no escaping it.
The problem...
Is me.
-[all gasp] -[Michael] And now...
I have to leave you... Forever.
Michael, you can't be the problem.
Oh, but I am.
You see, architects aren't supposed to live / in the neighborhoods they design, / but I love humans, so I wanted to try.
Translation:
원래 설계자는 자신이 설계한 / 마을에 살아서는 안 되죠 / 하지만 사람들을 사랑하는 저는
시도해 보고 싶었습니다

Subtitle: I see now that was a mistake.
Translation: 그게 바로 실수였어요 제 간섭이 지금까지의

Subtitle: My meddling is the one true constant in all of our disasters.
I tried to force Jianyu into opening up, which caused a sinkhole to open up.
Translation: 저는 지안유를 강제로 설득해서 싱크홀이 생기도록 만들었고

Subtitle: I kicked a puppy into the sun, and garbage rained down.
Translation:
강아지를 하늘로 차 버려서
하늘에서 쓰레기가 내리게 했어요

Subtitle: I grossly underestimated the number of shrimp needed / for the opening-night party, / and what flew through the sky the next day, / taunting me for my failures?
Translation:
그리고 오프닝 파티에 필요한
새우의 양을 / 형편없이 낮게 계산해서 / 그다음 날 제 실패를
비웃으려고 / 하늘에 뭐가 날아다녔죠?

Subtitle: I'm sorry, everyone. I'm truly sorry.
-Janet? -[bell chimes]
Please call a train to escort me into retirement.
Translation:
내가 은퇴할 때 타고 갈
기차를 불러줘요

Subtitle: You see, the only way in and out of a neighborhood is by train, / and Janet is the only one who can operate them.
Translation:
아시다시피 이 동네를
출입하는 유일한 방법은 기차이고 / 재닛은 기차를 운영할 수 있는
유일한 사람이죠

Subtitle: Oh, my dear Janet.
-Will you be okay after I leave? -Yes.
This will not affect me in any way.
Translation:
저는 아무 영향도
받지 않을 거예요

Subtitle: Jeez, show some compassion.
Well, I can't feel sad, / but here's my best approximation of human crying.
Translation:
슬픔을 느낄 수는 없지만 / 우는 사람과 최대한 비슷하게
따라 해 볼게요

Subtitle: -Oh, Janet, that was beautiful. -Yeah.
What did you say to him? Did you make him do this somehow?
Translation: 마이클한테 뭐라고 한 거예요? 이렇게 하도록 만든 거예요?

Subtitle: Nope, this was entirely his idea.
Dude, this is good news.
Michael's gonna get a chill retirement, which, frankly, he desperately needs, / and I can finally relax.
Translation:
마이클은 그가 정말 필요로 하는
여유로운 노후를 시작할 거고 / 나도 이제 쉴 수 있어요

Subtitle: It's forking perfect.
No, it's terrible. Michael's wrong. He's not the problem.
Translation:
그 반대예요, 마이클은 틀렸어요
문제는 그가 아니라고요

Subtitle: Well, Michael did bring me here, / which was the mistake that led to all the other problems.
Translation: 어쨌든 마이클이 날 데리고 와서 / 내가 문제를 일으킨 거니까

Subtitle: So, in that sense, he is the real problem.
Ha! How do you like them ethics? I just ethics'd you in the face, Chidi!
Translation:
윤리가 이걸 어떻게 생각할지
궁금하네요 방금 내가 윤리로 당신을 눌렀어요

Subtitle: It doesn't change the fact that we weren't truthful.
Translation:
우리가 진실하지 못했다는
사실은 바뀌지 않아요

Subtitle: There's an old Chinese proverb...
"Lies are like tigers. They are bad."
-That's it? -It's more poetic in Mandarin.
Look, Michael is retiring.
He's gonna be on an angel boat somewhere, smoking moonbeam cigars.
Translation: 이제 어디 통통배에 올라타서 한가롭게 시가나 피울 거라고요

Subtitle: Now, Tahani is throwing him a good-bye party.
Let's go help out.
Sure, that will more than make up for the pain and misery and lying.
Translation:
그래요, 그거면 지금까지의
고통과 거짓말을 씻을 수 있겠죠

Subtitle: Yes, now you're getting it.
Hey, Chidi, just read your article on logical positivism... So dry.
Translation:
치디, 네가 쓴 논리적 실증주의
칼럼을 봤는데, 정말 따분했어

Subtitle: Oh, thanks, Henry.
Whoa! New boots.
Oh, yeah, just got 'em.
Saw them in the store, and I was just like, "Whoa!"
-[chuckles] -Tell the truth... Do you like 'em?
-Oh, yeah. -Not too red?
-No. -Crystals aren't too much?
Crystals are not too much.
Translation:
너무 과하지도 않아 그렇게 말하니 안심이 되네
이 신발이 그만한 가치가 있는지

Subtitle: Oh, well, that makes me feel much better 'cause I was really going back and forth / over whether they were worth the money. They were super expensive.
Translation:
그렇게 말하니 안심이 되네
이 신발이 그만한 가치가 있는지 / 계속 고민하고 있었거든
완전 비싼 신발이야

Subtitle: Yeah, well, they're, uh, amazing.
Those are the coolest boots I've ever seen in my life.
Translation:
내가 지금까지 본 중에
최고의 부츠야

Subtitle: Thanks so much, buddy.
Right. [chuckles] Bye.
My God...
What have I done?
Tonight needs to be the perfect blend of celebratory, reverential, / bittersweet, upbeat, fun, and effortless.
Translation:
오늘 밤은 축하의 분위기와
경건함, 시원섭섭함, 긍정 / 재미 그리고 자연스러움이
완벽한 조화를 이루어야 해요

Subtitle: This is #TahaniTime.
What is all this?
Oh, no, Michael, / you're not supposed to see it till it's all set up.
Translation:
안 돼요 / 다 준비될 때까지
보면 안 되는 거였는데

Subtitle: But, well... [chuckles] Welcome to your retirement party.
Translation:
이렇게 됐으니, 당신의
은퇴 기념 파티예요

Subtitle: -Hm. -Look, over there, I've even set up / a buffet of themed desserts, like retire-mint chocolate cake...
Translation:
저쪽에는 테마로 장식된
디저트 뷔페까지 차려졌어요 / 저쪽에는 테마로 장식된
디저트 뷔페까지 차려졌어요 은퇴 기념 민트
초콜릿 케이크랑

Subtitle: -Ah. -Or a, flan-voyage.
Oh, boy.
Oh, and here we have a piñata shaped like you, which is always fun.
Translation:
당신의 형상을 한 피냐타도 있죠
재미있을 거예요

Subtitle: By the way, uh, what's you're favorite color for the tablecloths?
Well, it's not perceptible by human eyes.
Translation:
사람의 눈으로는
인지할 수 없는 색상인데

Subtitle: It's called pleurigloss.
Could you describe it?
It's the color of... [sighs]
When a soldier comes home from war and sees his dog for the first time.
Translation:
전쟁에서 돌아온 군인이 그의 개를
처음 봤을 때 같은 색이에요

Subtitle: Hmm. How about blue?
Tahani, I'm so sorry. We need to cancel this party immediately.
Translation: 타하니, 정말 미안해요 이 파티는 당장 취소해야 합니다

Subtitle: [Tahani] But why?
For a being like me, retirement... Is not something fun.
Translation: 저 같은 존재에게 은퇴는 즐거운 일이 아니에요

Subtitle: What is "retirement" for you exactly?
[Michael] Well, I wasn't gonna share this so as not to upset you, / but it's, a... [sighs] An extreme form of punishment.
Translation:
들으면 언짢을까
얘기하지 않으려 했는데 / 나에게 은퇴는 극심한 형벌과도 같아요

Subtitle: We call it, "The Eternal Shriek."
My soul will be disintegrated, and each molecule will be placed / on the surface of a different burning sun.
Translation:
제 영혼이 무너지고
육신의 모든 분자는 / 타오르는 태양의 표면에
자리 잡을 거예요

Subtitle: And then my essence will be scooped out of my body / with a flaming ladle and poured over hot diamonds.
Translation:
그리고 존재의 본질은
불타는 국자로 건져 / 뜨거운 다이아몬드
위로 부어지겠죠

Subtitle: -Oh, but the diamonds sound lovely. -They're not...
-[Chidi grunts] -And then what's left of my body / will be endlessly beaten with a titanium rod, like a...
Translation:
그렇지 않아요 육체에 남은 부분은 / 티타늄 막대로 끊임없이
짓이겨질 거예요, 마치...

Subtitle: -[inhales sharply] -Like a piñata.
Yes, except you have the string around my waist, / but instead it will definitely be around my genitals.
Translation:
그래요, 다른 점이라고는
내 손목에 줄을 감는 게 아니라 / 내 생식기에 줄이
감길 거라는 사실이죠

Subtitle: -What? -Oh, Michael, I'm so sorry.
-Mm. -I was just trying to honor you.
Translation:
저는 단지 감사를
표하려고 했을 뿐이었어요

Subtitle: Please, allow me to re-conceive the event.
Of course.
All right, everyone, we're starting over.
The key word for tonight is just, "Somber."
Jianyu, my love, we're gonna have to get rid / of all of the party poppers immediately. No, not by using them.
Translation:
지안유, 파티 폭죽은 / 당장 다 없애야 해요
써서 없애라는 게 아니에요

Subtitle: No, Jianyu. Done.
He's gonna be tortured?
Dang it. I was almost handed a perfect solution / to all my problems without having to work for it at all, / and now it's gone.
Translation:
젠장, 이 문제들을 다 / 손 안 대고 완벽하게
해결할 수 있었는데 / 이제 망했어요

Subtitle: [sighs] Why do bad things always happen to mediocre people / who are lying about their identities?
Translation:
왜 항상 나쁜 일은
자기 신분을 속이는 / 보통 사람들한테만
생기는 걸까요?

Subtitle: Okay, you have two options.
You can confess and save Michael, or you can continue to lie / and condemn him to an eternity of unimaginable pain.
Translation:
고백을 하고 마이클을 구하든가
계속 거짓말을 해서 그를 / 상상도 할 수 없는
영원한 고통으로 몰고 가는 거예요

Subtitle: Or option C...
Continue to lie about myself and find a way to save Michael.
Translation:
내가 누구인지는 계속 숨기면서
마이클을 구하는 거죠

Subtitle: Can we somehow throw Tahani under the bus?
Translation:
타하니를 한 배에
태울 수는 없을까요?

Subtitle: That would be a classic "two birds with one stone" scenario.
Translation:
그러면 완전 돌멩이 하나로
두 마리 새를 잡는 건데 말이죠

Subtitle: Plus, I'd get her house. Three birds.
No, there's no way to stop this except confessing.
Translation:
솔직한 고백이 아니고는
이 상황을 멈출 수가 없어요

Subtitle: Any moment now, Michael is going to get on that train, / and we will never see him again, just like Professor Lindeman / after I asked him to reread my 3,600-page manuscript.
Translation:
곧 마이클이 저 기차에 타면 / 다시는 그를 못 볼 거예요
내가 린더만 교수님께 / 내 3,600페이지 원고를 다시
읽어달라고 부탁했을 때처럼요

Subtitle: He said he was going out for cigarettes, / but then he just left his tenured position at the Sorbonne.
Translation:
담배 피운다고 나가시더니 / 소르본 대학 종신 교수직까지
버리고 떠나셨어요

Subtitle: Great story. Janet?
-[bell chimes] -Hi, there.
Hi. So the only way out of the neighborhood is a train?
That's correct. I am the only one / who can call the train, and it needs me to operate.
Translation:
맞아요
제가 유일하게 기차를 / 부를 수 있고
운행도 하죠

Subtitle: One more question, and, um, this is a little weird, but can we, / uh, shut you down?
Translation:
질문이 하나 더 있어요, 약간
이상한 질문인데 우리가 당신을... / 꺼버릴 수 있나요?

Subtitle: Yes, great question.
There is a kill switch in a remote sector of the neighborhood / in the event that I malfunction and attempt to harm the residents.
Translation:
마을의 한적한 곳에
킬 스위치가 있어요 / 제가 오작동을 일으켜서
주민들을 위협할 때를 대비한 거죠

Subtitle: If you press it, I will be destroyed.
-Anything else? -No, that's good, thanks.
-[Janet] Okay. -Whoa. [stutters] You want to kill Janet?
Michael can't retire if he can't leave.
Translation:
마이클은 떠나지 않으면
은퇴를 할 수 없어요

Subtitle: He can't leave if there's no Janet to run the train.
Translation:
기차를 운행할 재닛이 없다면
떠날 수 없는 거예요

Subtitle: It's a perfect solution.
Janet, high five, please?
-[bell chimes] -Thanks, babe.
You cannot kill Janet.
Killing is one of the most famous moral no-nos.
Translation:
살인은 인간이 행해서는 안 될
가장 잘 알려진 행위 중 하나예요

Subtitle: Janet is a non-human object... -[scoffs] -Who was sent here to help us, / and the way she can help us is if we kill her.
Translation:
재닛은 우리를 돕기 위해 보내진
인간이 아닌 물체예요 / 그리고 우리에게 도움이 되는
방법은 재닛을 죽이는 거고요

Subtitle: We're doing one small murder-y thing for a bigger, better reason.
Translation:
더 큰 목적을 위해
작은 대가를 치르는 거예요

Subtitle: -The ends justify the means. -Do you know who said that?
Translation:
- 목적에 따라 수단은 정당화된다
- 그 말을 누가 했는지는 알아요?

Subtitle: Was it someone nice and great, like Oprah?
It was Machiavelli... -[sighs] -A very non-Oprah-like figure.
And what happens after we kill her?
We'll have to lie to everyone about what we did, / and lying is always wrong.
Translation:
또다시 우리가 한 일에 대해
사람들에게 거짓말을 해야 하죠 / 거짓말은 언제나 그른 행동이에요

Subtitle: Why? Why would -I tell Henry that I liked his boots? -[sighs]
Translation:
왜 내가 헨리에게
부츠를 좋아한다고 했지?

Subtitle: I don't like his boots. I hate his boots.
Translation:
난 그 부츠 마음에 안 들어
정말 싫어

Subtitle: Yes, I know. You've talked about it for the last two days.
Translation:
나도 알아 당신이 지난 이틀 동안
계속 얘기했잖아

Subtitle: I lied to him. You wrote your thesis on Kant.
Translation:
난 거짓말을 했어
당신은 칸트에 대한 논문을 썼지

Subtitle: He believed that lying is always morally wrong...
Translation:
칸트는 거짓말은 언제나
도덕적으로 그르다고 했어

Subtitle: No exceptions.
Yes, well, Kant was a lonely, obsessive hermit with zero friends.
Translation:
칸트는 강박에 사로잡힌
친구도 없는 고독한 은둔자였어

Subtitle: Sometimes we do thing just to be polite, / but if you really feel that strongly about it, tell him the truth.
Translation:
사람은 가끔 예의를 차리기 위해
거짓말을 해야 해 / 하지만 당신이 그렇게 불편하다면
가서 사실대로 말해

Subtitle: Also, I don't care, 'cause it's the middle of the night.
This is why everyone hates moral philosophy professors.
Translation:
이래서 사람들이
윤리학 교수들을 싫어하는 거야

Subtitle: They do?
Hey, Chidi.
-You sit in on my class today? -[stutters] Uh, I did, yeah.
Great lecture, by the way... So bleak.
Thanks, bud.
It's actually perfect that you are here. I got something for you.
Translation:
타이밍 기가 막히게 왔네
내가 널 위해 준비한 게 있어

Subtitle: Oh, my God.
You loved mine so much, I decided to get you your own pair.
Translation:
네가 정말 좋아하는 것 같아서
특별히 사 왔지

Subtitle: We can be boot brothers.
Wow. I can't accept these. They're too expensive.
Translation:
난 이거 받을 수 없어
너무 비싼 물건이잖아

Subtitle: Sure you can. Try 'em on, mate. The fact that you liked mine so much / really made me feel like I made the right choice to buy them.
Translation:
당연히 받아야지, 신어 봐
네가 좋아해 주어서 / 내가 올바른 결정을 했다는
만족감을 느꼈거든

Subtitle: After all, why should I have all the fun and boots?
Translation:
나만 이런 즐거움을
느낄 수는 없잖아?

Subtitle: -Eh? -I don't... I don't know.
Those look great.
Take 'em for a spin.
-Uh... -You're flying.
Mmm! Thanks.
[Tahani] Speeches! Time for speeches, everyone.
Michael...
-Huh. -As someone who didn't exactly have / the steadiest parental guidance, / I just want to thank you. You were always there for us.
Translation: 부모님의 꾸준한 지도를 / 받지 않았던 한 사람으로서 / 감사를 드리고 싶어요 항상 우리를 도와주셨죠

Subtitle: I shouldn't have been. I was the problem.
Translation:
그러지 말았어야 했어요
내가 바로 문제였으니

Subtitle: Yes, but...
It was also great when you weren't there.
Don't worry. Soon I won't be... Forever.
Translation:
걱정하지 말아요
곧 영원히 그렇게 될 테니

Subtitle: Because of The Eternal Shriek!
Yes, thank you, Glenn.
[Tahani] Look, what I'm trying to say is this.
Michael, you always kept us warm and safe like a bright, glowing sun.
Translation:
마이클, 당신은 항상 우리를
돌보고 보호해 주었죠 마치 밝게 빛나는 태양처럼요

Subtitle: Like the one I kicked the dog into / or the one I'm going to be burned on the surface of for eternity?
Translation:
내가 개를 걷어찬 곳 말인가요 / 아니면 내가 영원히
타오르게 될 곳 말인가요?

Subtitle: Okay, no more speeches. Speeches are over.
Michael's going to talk now.
[sighs] I'm sorry I was so grumpy.
It's just I'm sad that I have to leave / before doing all the human things that I wanted to do.
Translation:
제가 하고 싶었던
인간적인 일들을 / 뒤로 하고 떠나야 한다는
사실에 슬펐어요

Subtitle: I wanted to get my hair wet.
You know... [stutters] I wanted to pull a hamstring.
Translation:
다리 힘줄이 늘어나는 것도
경험해보고 싶었죠

Subtitle: To learn the difference between "toward" and "towards."

[Michael] I wanted to do that thing where you walk down the hallway, / and someone else is walking the other way, / and then you both lean to one side and then the other, / and then you both chuckle over your shared foible.
Translation:
복도에서 걷다가
반대쪽에서 사람이 오면 / 서로 다른 쪽으로
비키려고 하다가 / 자꾸 같은 방향으로
향하게 되어서 / 같이 웃게 되는 상황도
겪어보고 싶었죠

Subtitle: -[all chuckle] -I wanted to get a rewards card, any rewards card.
I wanted to talk briefly to someone and then say, / "Take it sleazy." [chuckles softly]
Translation:
사람들과 가볍게 대화를 하다
'그냥 마음 편히 생각해' / 라고 말해보고 싶었어요

Subtitle: I wanted to eat a saltine.
Oh! I actually have some saltines.
Here, try this.
Pretty dry...
And too salty.
Well, going out on a real low note here. Okay, bye, everyone.
Translation: 이제 정말 할 말이 없군요 모두들 잘 있어요

Subtitle: Well, take it sleazy.
You got to say it?
Yes, but then you say it back.
No, it's not organic.
Uh, Janet, how many Janets have there been?
There have been 25 generations of Janet.
Each new update of Janet gains more wisdom and social abilities.
Translation:
새로 업데이트될 때마다
지혜와 사회성이 향상되죠

Subtitle: Fun fact... The first Janet had a click wheel.
Translation:
첫 번째 재닛에는 클릭하고
돌릴 수 있는 버튼도 있었어요

Subtitle: So it's like aging for a human? You're... You're growing up?
Translation:
사람으로 치면 나이 드는 건가요?
당신도 성장하나요?

Subtitle: That's how I like to think of it, Chidi.
I can't eat, so every time there's a new version of Janet, / I like to take a piece of birthday cake and smash it around where my mouth is.
Translation:
저는 먹지 못하기 때문에
새로운 버전이 업데이트될 때마다 / 생일 케이크 한 조각을 두고 제 입 주변에 뭉개버리죠

Subtitle: Look, Janet has... Has learned and grown.
She's essentially living a life. We can't kill her.
Translation:
삶을 살고 있다고요
그녀를 죽일 순 없어요

Subtitle: Not with that attitude, we can't.
Listen, man, I'm dead, you're dead, we all died, and now we're killing her.
Translation:
당신과 나 우리 모두 죽었고
재닛도 그냥 죽이려는 거예요

Subtitle: Pay it forward.
No, that's not what that means at all. Eleanor?
Here we are.
Just press that button, and it's good-bye, Janet.
Translation:
저 버튼만 누르면 이제
재닛과는 영원히 이별이에요

Subtitle: Chidi, I can see that you're worried, and I just want to assure you, / I am not human, and I cannot feel pain.
Translation:
치디, 걱정하시는 것 같은데
제가 다시 말씀드릴게요 / 저는 사람도 아니고
고통을 느끼지도 않아요

Subtitle: Ah. Thank you. That helps.
However, I should warn you...
I am programmed with a fail-safe measure.
As you approach the kill switch, I will begin to beg for my life.
Translation:
킬 스위치에 접근하시면
제 목숨을 구걸할 거예요

Subtitle: It's just there in case of an accidental shut down, / but it will seem very real.
Translation:
돌발적인 정지를
대비하는 장치이지만 / 꽤 현실적이랍니다

Subtitle: Cool. So who's doing this, me or you?
[stutters] Oh, I think I have to.
Translation:
내가 해야 할 것 같아요 이유는 모르지만, 구경꾼은
더 나쁜 사람 같거든요

Subtitle: Um, being a bystander seems worse, somehow.
Translation:
이유는 모르지만, 구경꾼은
더 나쁜 사람 같거든요

Subtitle: Okay, here we go.
Chidi, no, no, no! Chidi, please! Please, please, please don't hurt me.
Translation:
치디! 안 돼요, 제발!
저를 해치지 마세요

Subtitle: -I don't want to die! Please, please... -[groans]
Again, I am not human. I can't die.
Translation:
저는 사람이 아니에요
죽을 수 없죠

Subtitle: I am simply an anthropomorphized vessel of knowledge / built to make your life easier.
Translation:
저는 여러분의 편리한
삶을 위해 만들어진 / 의인화된 지식의
저장고일 뿐이에요

Subtitle: Your pleading seems so real.
Oh, yes, it is a very effective fail-safe.
[groans] You want a robot killed right, you have to do it yourself.
Eleanor? Eleanor, no, no, no.
Please, wait, wait, wait, wait. Eleanor, I have kids.
I have three beautiful children...
Tyler, Emma, and little, tiny baby Phillip.
Translation:
타일러, 엠마 그리고
아직 아기인 필립이에요

Subtitle: Look at Tyler. Tyler has asthma, but he is battling it like a champ.
Translation:
보세요, 타일러는 천식이
있지만 잘 견뎌내고 있어요

Subtitle: Look at him. No, Eleanor, look at them.
[growling] Look at them! Look at them!
-[yelps] It's so realistic! -Eleanor, again, I'm not human.
Translation:
- 너무 진짜 같잖아요!
- 다시 한번 저는 인간이 아니에요

Subtitle: This is a stock photo of the crowd at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards.
Translation:
이건 니켈로디언 채널 시상식
관중석에 잡힌 아이들의 사진이죠

Subtitle: [sighs] That's right, it's not real.
-Let's just do this. -[sighs] Right.
Please, I have so much to live for. No, no, no. Please.
[stutters] We're not even near the...
Translation:
- 제발, 안 돼요
- 우리 지금 근처에도...

Subtitle: Hey, guys, what's going on? That party was lame, so I bailed.
Translation:
이게 무슨 일이에요?
파티가 지루해서 일찍 나왔다가

Subtitle: Then I saw you, so I followed you here.
-Oh, look, a button. -No, no, no!
Jianyu, no!
Oh, man, I wanted to push that button.
Not cool, dude.
Whoa. What happened to Janet?
[stutters] She's dead. I killed her.
Translation: 죽었어요, 내가 죽인 거예요 죽인 게 아니에요

Subtitle: Not killed. Remember, Janet was not a living being, so she can't be killed.
Translation:
재닛이 살아있는 생물체는
아니었으니까 죽인 건 아니죠

Subtitle: [Janet through speakers] Attention... I have been murdered.
Attention...
What do we do, Eleanor?
What do we do? Chidi, you just murdered Janet.
Translation:
이제 어떡하냐고요?
치디, 방금 재닛을 죽였잖아요

Subtitle: We have to flee your crime scene.
Run!
[Janet] I have been murdered.
-Sorry, Janet! -I have been murdered.
Attention... I have...
Attention...
I have been murdered.
Okay, dude, crash course in getting away with bad stuff.
Translation:
나쁜 짓을 하고 빠져나가는
족집게 과외를 해줄게요

Subtitle: You have to act calm and cool like you don't have a care in the world.
Translation:
일단 진정하고 이 세상에는 아무
관심도 없다는 듯 쿨하게 행동해요

Subtitle: -[Chidi grunts] -Okay?
Great.
Oh, wow. Look, it's Weekend at Bernie's, 'cause you're a dead guy in sunglasses.
Translation:
완전 '베니의 주말' 같네요 당신은 선글라스를 쓴
그 죽은 남자고

Subtitle: [laughs] We have fun, don't we, Chidi?
I've never been more stressed out in my entire life.
Translation:
내 인생에서 지금처럼
스트레스 받은 적이 없어요

Subtitle: Um, I know what you need.
Janet, can you get Chidi some weed?
Oh, that's right. You killed Janet.
[Michael] Well, Janet's been murdered.
That's a nice capper to this wonderful day.
Translation:
이렇게 아름다운 날의 마지막을
멋지게 장식하는군요

Subtitle: I don't really know what happens now / because... [sighs] Janet has never been murdered before...
Translation:
이제 어떻게 될지 모르겠습니다 / 이전에는 재닛이
살해된 적이 없었기 때문이죠 "재닛을 위한 작별 인사"

Subtitle: Only today, here on my watch, / while I was distracted with a party that Tahani was throwing for me, / which I didn't want.
Translation:
오늘, 제 마지막 날 / 타하니가 준비한 제가 원치 않았던
파티에 정신이 팔렸을 때 / 타하니가 준비한 제가 원치 않았던
파티에 정신이 팔렸을 때 이런 일이 일어났죠

Subtitle: Michael, you mustn't blame yourself.
I'm not. I'm blaming you.
[Michael] Anyway, what is there to say about Janet that hasn't already been said / by the giant Janet alarm in the sky?
Translation:
하늘에 떠 있는 거대한
재닛 알람이 해준 말 외에 / 우리가 재닛에 대해 해야 할 말이
뭐가 있을까요?

Subtitle: "I've been murdered!"
I think that says it all.
-Hello. -[all gasp]
Janet, you're alive!
Hello, Architect, please enter your four-digit pin.
Uh, what is it? Uh, what is it?
What is it? Oh, right, right, right!
It's my, uh, birth year.
I got to change that. That's too easy to guess.
[exhales] Janet... Who murdered you?
-Oh. Oh, no. -[shushing] Okay.
-Hello. -Yes, hello.
Oh, yeah.
Uh, her memory must have been wiped clean...
-[sighs] -So now she's gonna have to re-upload all the knowledge in the universe, / which will only take a few days. Okay...
Translation:
이제 우주의 모든 지식을
다시 업로드하기 위해 / 며칠이 걸릴 겁니다

Subtitle: -Hello. -Hello. [chuckles]
Hello. Hello.
Everyone, um, until I get to the bottom of this, / my retirement is officially postponed.
Translation:
제가 진상을 알아내기 전까지 / 제 은퇴는 공식적으로
보류하겠습니다

Subtitle: -[Michael] Oh, oh. -[laughs]
Hello. Hello.
You got to admit... I kind of nailed it.
All we have to do now is keep the secret forever.
J-Dog, you cool?
No, by the time I got to the piñata, all the candy was gone.
Translation:
아니요, 내가 피냐타에 갔을 때는
이미 사탕이 하나도 없었어요

Subtitle: He's not gonna tell anyone.
Chidi? Cheedster? What's, uh, happening, buddy?
You have a crazy look in your eye, and you're retreating into your shirt.
Translation:
눈빛도 이상하고 자꾸 셔츠 속으로
들어가고 있잖아요

Subtitle: You're kind of turtling.
-[telephone ringing] -[EKG machine beeping] Henry, are you all right? What happened?
I have an aneurysm. Requires emergency surgery.
Translation:
동맥류가 있어서
응급 수술을 해야 해

Subtitle: Doctors' give me a 50/50 chance.
So, if there's anything you need to say to me, / you should do it now. [chuckles]
Translation: 그러니 나한테 할 말이 있다면 / 지금이 그 기회야

Subtitle: Oh, well...
Actually, um...
They let you wear your boots in here?
They're the only things that bring me comfort.
What did you want to say to me?
Oh, uh...
Just that I'm here and I love you, man.
Translation:
내가 사랑하고 항상
여기 있을 거라고

Subtitle: I love you, too, boot brother.
Oh... Okay.
Chidi!
You didn't have to stay here all night.
Translation: 여기서 밤을 새울 필요는 없었는데 수술은 잘 된 거야?

Subtitle: So surgery went well? All clear?
Right as rain, buddy.
That is so, so, so great.
-I hate your boots. -What?
I told you that I loved your boots three years ago, / and I was lying, and that lie has haunted me ever since, / and people tried to tell me it was fine...
Translation:
삼 년 전에 내가 그 부츠
좋아한다고 했던 건 / 거짓말이었어
그 후로 나는 계속 괴로웠지 / 사람들은 괜찮다고 했어

Subtitle: Just a nice, little white lie in the form of social niceties...
Translation:
그냥 관계를 위한
작은 선의의 거짓말이라고

Subtitle: But I disagreed, and then yesterday / I thought you were gonna die, but now you're not dead, / and I can finally be honest / and say that those boots are terrible and hideous / and I hate them.
Translation:
하지만 내 생각은 달랐어
그리고 어제는 / 네가 죽는다고 생각했지만
이제 그렇지 않게 되었으니 / 난 진실을 말할 수 있어 / 그 부츠 정말 우스꽝스럽고
최악이라고 / 너무 싫어

Subtitle: This is why everyone hates moral philosophy professors.
Translation:
이래서 사람들이
윤리학 교수들을 싫어하는 거야

Subtitle: Yeah, I know. And I get it.
I don't care that she came back or that we did it for a good reason.
Translation:
재닛이 다시 소생했고 우리의
의도가 좋았다고 할지라도

Subtitle: I can't live with this lie.
Translation: 난 이 거짓을 안고 살 수 없어요

Subtitle: I'm going to confess to the murder of Janet.
What?
Dude, why?
Janet is fine.
We didn't harm her at all.
We didn't? Hey, Janet?
-[bell chimes] -[Janet] Hello.
-Hello. -[Janet] Hello.
Janet, would you please recite the English alphabet?
Janet.
She knows her A-B-Janets.
She literally knew everything in the universe, / and now she's a baby.
Translation:
이전에는 우주의 모든
지식을 가졌던 재닛이 / 지금은 아기가 됐어요

Subtitle: And even if she were okay, it would be too painful for me / to live with these lies.
Translation:
재닛이 괜찮았다고 하더라도
나는 이 거짓말을 안고 사는 게 / 너무 괴로울 거 같아요

Subtitle: What are you talking about? It is so easy to live with a lie.
Translation:
무슨 얘기를 하는 거예요?
거짓말하고 사는 건 정말 쉬워요

Subtitle: I once pretended to have a terminal illness / to meet Scott Wolf at a Sunglass Hut.
Translation:
나는 한번은 선글라스 매장에서
스캇 울프를 만나려고 / 불치병에 걸린 척 한 적도 있어요

Subtitle: Victimless crime.
Fine.
I won't say anything because I promised to help you.
Translation:
내가 도와주기로 약속했고
우리가 저지른 일들의

Subtitle: -And the moral implications... -[sighs]
Of everything that we've done are so complicated / that I may never untangle them, but I hate lying.
Translation:
다시 풀 수 없을 정도로
너무 복잡하니 / 아무 말도 하지 않을게요
하지만 난 거짓말이 싫어요

Subtitle: I always have, / and this is going to eat me up inside forever.
Translation:
지금껏 그래왔고요 / 이번 일은 영원히
나를 괴롭힐 거예요

Subtitle: You might be able to shrug this off, and forget about it, but I never will.
Translation:
당신은 가볍게 떨쳐버릴 수 있을지
모르지만, 나는 아니에요

Subtitle: Hello.
-Hi. -Hello.
Jianyu!
Michael, Janet said you wanted to speak to me.
Translation:
마이클, 재닛이 저한테
할 얘기가 있다고 하던데요

Subtitle: Well, actually, she was just drooling a lot / and saying, "Hello" over and over again, but she did point at you.
Translation:
사실 그냥 서서
안녕하세요를 / 계속 반복하고 있었지만
당신을 손가락으로 가리켰죠

Subtitle: I owe you an apology.
Oh, no. No, you don't.
No... But, uh, please continue.
You were only trying to help.
You're a wonderful person, / and if I ever do have a retirement party, / I hope you plan it.
Translation: 당신은 정말 훌륭한 사람이에요 / 그리고 내가 은퇴 파티를 한다면 / 당신에게 부탁하고 싶군요

Subtitle: Thank you for gathering, everyone. I want to keep you all updated.
Translation:
모두 모여주셔서 감사합니다
진행 상황을 말씀드리죠

Subtitle: Here's what we know.
Translation:
지금 우리가 알고 있는
사실은 이렇습니다

Subtitle: Someone slaughtered Janet.
Oh, boy.
-Oh, boy. -Okay, easy.
I assume that this horrifying act / is somehow related to the other issues we've had here.
Translation:
이 끔찍한 사실은 / 우리가 직면한 다른 문제들에
관련된 것 같습니다

Subtitle: It also means that the problems in this neighborhood / are not 100% my fault.
Translation:
또한 이것은 우리 동네의 문제가
전부 제 잘못은 / 아니라는 것을 의미합니다

Subtitle: There is something else at work here.
If anyone has any information -about any of this... -[Chidi exhales]
Translation:
누구라도 이 문제에 대한
정보를 가지고 계신다면

Subtitle: I beg you, / tell me.
Hey, I love you, man.
[Eleanor] Michael...
The problem in the neighborhood...
Is me.
I was brought to The Good Place by mistake.
Eleanor, come on in.
Eleanor, come on in.
Well, not often you get to confront your greatest failure face-to-face.
Translation:
본인의 가장 큰 실수를
대면하는 일은 드물죠

Subtitle: Good to see you, too, bud.
I am just dumbfounded as to how this happened.
Translation:
이번 일에 대해서는
할 말이 없습니다

Subtitle: Our system has never made a mistake before...
Translation:
우리 시스템은 단 한 번도
실수를 한 적이 없어요

Subtitle: It's just not possible.
And yet, here we are.
First things first...
Who are you?
Well, my name is Eleanor Shellstrop, and some of the info you had was right.
Translation:
엘리너 셸스트롭요
당신 말 중엔 맞는 것도 있어요

Subtitle: I mean, "flattened by boner pill truck / after dropping margarita mix in grocery store parking lot,"
Translation:
'마트 주차장에서' / '마가리타 믹스를 떨어뜨린 후
발기부전약 트럭에 치임'은

Subtitle: that's a very me way to die.
But all the other info was wrong.
In my defense, when I first arrived, and you said, / "You, Eleanor Shellstrop, are dead, and you're in The Good Place."
Translation:
변명처럼 들리겠지만, 제가 여기
도착했을 때 당신이 말했죠 / '엘리너 셸스트롭
당신은 죽었습니다' '당신은 굿 플레이스에 있고요'
그래서 전 그게 실수라고

Subtitle: I had no reason to think that was a mistake.
Translation:
'당신은 굿 플레이스에 있고요'
그래서 전 그게 실수라고 생각할 이유가 없었죠

Subtitle: Location and date of birth, please.
Phoenix, Arizona, October 14th, 1986.
So sorry.
Translation:
죄송해요, 사실 그건
나이 속이려고 쓰는

Subtitle: That's what I used to tell people when I lied about my age.
Translation:
죄송해요, 사실 그건
나이 속이려고 쓰는 가짜 생일이에요

Subtitle: I was born in 1982.
You lied so much, you forgot your own birthday.
Translation:
거짓말을 너무 많이 해서
진짜 생일도 잊어버렸군요

Subtitle: Not a great start, / but it should be enough for Janet to locate your file.
Translation:
좋은 시작은 아니지만 / 재닛에게 당신의 파일을
부탁할 정도는 되겠어요

Subtitle: -Janet? -[tone chimes]
-Janet... -What's that?
What's that?
[gasps] What's this?
Her memory's still being rebooted / because, oh, you know, someone murdered her.
Translation:
아직도 기억을
재시작하는 중이라 그래요 / 아직도 기억을
재시작하는 중이라 그래요 살해당했거든요

Subtitle: Janet, could you please locate the file for an Eleanor Shellstrop, born in...
Translation:
재닛, 파일 좀
찾아다 줄 수 있어요? 엘리너 셸스트롭이고

Subtitle: Phoenix, Arizona, USA.
-Sure. -[tone chimes]
Anything else?
No, Janet, this is actually a cactus.
This might take a while.
[sighs] Since Janet can't retrieve your file, I need to find another way / to determine what kind of person you were.
Translation:
재닛이 당신의 정보를
검색하지 못하니 / 당신이 어떤 사람인지 알려면
다른 방법을 써야겠군요

Subtitle: This is a quick litmus test.
Handful of questions designed to tell / whether you were fundamentally good or bad.
Translation:
기본적으로 당신이 / 좋은 사람인지 나쁜 사람인지
판단하는 시험이죠

Subtitle: Question number one.
Did you ever commit a serious crime, / such as murder, sexual harassment, arson, or otherwise?
Translation: 1번 질문, 당신은 성범죄나 방화와 같은 중범죄를 / 방화와 같은 중범죄를 저지른 적이 있습니까?

Subtitle: No.
Did you ever have a vanity license plate, / like "Mama's BMW" "Lexus for Liz" or "Boob guy"?
Translation:
자동차 번호판을
꾸민 적이 있습니까? / '엄마의 BMW', '리즈의 렉서스'
'가슴 달린 남자' 처럼요

Subtitle: No.
Did you ever reheat fish in an office microwave?
Translation:
사무실 전자레인지에서
생선을 데운 적이 있나요?

Subtitle: Ew, no.
Have you ever paid money to hear music performed by California / funk rock band The Red Hot Chili Peppers?
Translation:
캘리포니아 펑크 록 밴드 레드 핫 칠리 페퍼스의 음악을
돈 내고 들은 적 있나요? / 레드 핫 칠리 페퍼스의 음악을
돈 내고 들은 적 있나요?

Subtitle: No.
Did you ever take off your shoes and socks on a commercial airline?
Translation:
항공사 비행기에서 신발과
양말을 벗은 적이 있나요?

Subtitle: And socks? Ew, who would do that?
People who go to The Bad Place, Eleanor, that's the point.
Translation:
배드 플레이스에 가는 사람들이오
바로 그게 요점이에요, 엘리너

Subtitle: And unless I can figure out a compelling reason to keep you here, / you will spend eternity with murderers, and arsonists, / and people who take off their shoes and socks on commercial airlines.
Translation:
당신이 여기 있어야 할 이유를 못 찾는다면
평생 살인자나 방화범 / 이유를 못 찾는다면
평생 살인자나 방화범 그리고 항공사 비행기에서
신발과 양말을 / 그리고 항공사 비행기에서
신발과 양말을 벗는 사람들과
함께 살아야 해요

Subtitle: [clears throat] Janet, can I have a glass of water, please?
Translation:
재닛, 물 한 잔
마실 수 있을까요?

Subtitle: -[tone chimes] -Here you go.
Oh, gosh. [chuckles] You said, "Water?"
-Yeah. -I'm so sorry.
-[tone chimes] -There you go.
I really do have sympathy for your situation.
I mean, you thought your soul mate was a good person, / and then you learned that she's just an immoral grifter.
Translation:
소울메이트가
좋은 사람이라고 믿었는데 / 방금 그 소울메이트가
사기꾼이란 걸 안 거잖아요

Subtitle: -Tahani, please. -Am I wrong?
She lied to everyone.
She caused a giant sinkhole into which poor Glenn fell.
Translation:
엄청난 싱크홀을 만들어서
글렌도 거기 빠져버렸잖아요

Subtitle: She caused a trash storm.
She... Well, she pretended to be my friend when I really needed one.
Translation: 내가 진짜 친구가 필요했을 때 내 친구인 척까지 했어요

Subtitle: And, lest we forget, she murdered Janet.
Translation:
까먹을까 봐 얘기하는 건데
걔가 재닛을 죽였고

Subtitle: As far as I'm concerned, / the sooner she's gone, the better off we'll all be.
Translation:
내가 보기엔
걔가 빨리 떠날수록 / 내가 보기엔
걔가 빨리 떠날수록 우리한테 좋은 거예요

Subtitle: I understand that Eleanor violated our trust, / but please, when you're talking to Michael, / try to think about what she's had to go through.
Translation:
엘리너가 우리의 믿음을
저버렸단 건 알아요 / 하지만 제발
마이클이랑 얘기할 때는 / 엘리너가 겪은 일도
생각 좀 해줘요

Subtitle: All right. I will, for you.
But we've been through a lot as well.
You know, I haven't been this upset since my good friend / Taylor was rudely upstaged by my other friend, Kanye, / who was defending my best friend, Beyonce.
Translation:
내 친한 친구 테일러가
내 절친 비욘세를 편들던 / 내 다른 친구 카니에한테
인기를 빼앗겼을 때 이후로 / 이렇게 화난 적이 없어요

Subtitle: And finally, a multi-part question.

Did you ever appear on the American television program / The Bachelor or its companion shows, The Bachelorette and Bachelor in Paradise, / or post on any social media site that you were emotionally invested / in any of the relationships the contestants were pursuing?
Translation:
미국 텔레비전 프로그램
'미혼남들'이나 / 동종 프로그램 '미혼녀들'이나 '천국의 미혼남들'에
출연하거나 / 방송 참가자들 간의 연애 관계에 / 감정을 이입해서 SNS에 글을 올린 적이 있나요?

Subtitle: No.
Okay.
You did very well on the questionnaire, Eleanor. So far, so good.
Translation:
이 시험에서
성적이 괜찮네요, 엘리너 여기까진 좋아요

Subtitle: -[tone chimes] -Michael, good news.
I was able to obtain Eleanor Shellstrop's file.
[sighs] Is it actually a cactus?
I don't understand.
Translation:
- 무슨 말인지 모르겠는데요
- 전 엘리너 셸스트롭의

Subtitle: I want to see the file for Eleanor Shellstrop.
Translation:
- 무슨 말인지 모르겠는데요
- 전 엘리너 셸스트롭의 파일을 보고 싶어요

Subtitle: Is that what you have, or do you have a cactus?
-I have the file. -You're sure?
You have the file and not a cactus?
Translation:
선인장이 아닌
파일을 갖고 있는 거죠?

Subtitle: That is correct. I have Eleanor Shellstrop's file.
I do not have a cactus.
Excellent! Please, give me the file.
-Here you go. -[tone chimes]
Thank you, Janet.
-You're welcome. -[tone chimes]
Well, I say we call it a day.
I mean, I nailed the questionnaire, and you're swimming in cacti.
Translation:
이번 성적도 괜찮았고
선인장 때문에 힘드신 것 같으니

Subtitle: Can't we just chalk this up to a hilarious mistake and move on?
Translation:
그냥 재밌는 실수였다고 치고
넘어가면 안 돼요?

Subtitle: No, we can't, Eleanor.
There's no such thing as a mistake in this realm.
Translation:
이 영역에서
실수 같은 건 없어요

Subtitle: And yet, you are, somehow, a mistake.
Translation:
그럼에도 불구하고
어찌 된 일인지 당신은 실수라고요

Subtitle: I mean, you're a giant chunk of spinach in the teeth of the universe.
Translation:
우주의 잇새에 낀
큰 시금치 덩어리예요

Subtitle: I need to understand every facet of this disaster.
Tell me a lie about yourself.
Any lie. I love the opera.
And now a truth.
I love Women's MMA.
We don't like to use this.
We've never really had a call for it before you, but in the interest of time.
Translation:
당신 전에는 이게
필요하지 않았어요 하지만 지금은
필요한 것 같네요

Subtitle: Eleanor, did you murder Janet?
No, I did not.
Do you know who did?
Yes.
Will you tell me who it was?
No.
I assume it was one of your friends, / and I admire you for protecting him or her.
Translation:
당신의 친구 중 하나일 것 같은데 / 친구를 보호하려는
그 마음은 칭찬해요

Subtitle: But, Eleanor, in The Good Place, / there's no room for bad people or bad actions.
Translation:
하지만 엘리너, 굿 플레이스에서는 / 나쁜 사람이나 나쁜 행동을
위한 공간은 없어요

Subtitle: So anyone involved in the murder of Janet / will be reviewed and judged, / and there will be consequences.
Translation:
그러니 재닛의 살인과
관련된 그 사람은 / 검토를 거쳐 판결을 받을 거고 / 그에 따른 대가도
치르게 될 거예요

Subtitle: Tahani, come on in.
Chidi.
Impostor who soiled our paradise with her moral turpitude.
'Sup?
Thank you for confessing, I don't know what I would have done if you hadn't--
Translation:
자수해줘서 고마워요
당신 아니었으면 - 어떡할지 정말...
- 알았어요, 나 멋져요

Subtitle: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. I'm amazing. Bad news.
Michael knows I didn't kill Janet, / which means it's only a matter of time before he finds out that you did / and that you did it because you were trying to stop Bonehead Jones over here.
Translation:
나쁜 소식이 있어요
내가 안 그런 거 마이클도 알아요 / 그러니까 당신이
이 멍청한 약쟁이 막으려다가 / 재닛을 죽였다는 걸 알아내는 건
시간 문제라는 뜻이죠

Subtitle: Hey, homies!
Then he'll figure out that Jianyu's also a phony, and, here's the real dong-buster, / Michael said anybody who did anything bad might have to go...
Translation:
그러면 지안유도 가짜라는 게
탄로 날 거고 더 큰 문제는 / 마이클이 나쁜 일과 연관된
사람은 누구든 보내버리겠다고...

Subtitle: Oh...
Which means Jianyu's gone, you might be gone, / and all three of us are royally forking forked!
Translation:
- 젠장...
- 그럼 지안유도 가고 당신도 가야 하니까 / 우리 셋은 완전 끝나는 거라고요!

Subtitle: This is terrible. What am I supposed to do if he asks me?
Translation:
망했다, 마이클이 나한테 물으면
뭐라고 해야 하죠?

Subtitle: I don't know. Kant would say that lying in any scenario is wrong, / so if Michael asks you if you killed Janet, you should say yes.
Translation:
몰라요, 칸트는 어떤 상황이든
거짓말은 잘못된 방법이라 했죠 / 그러니 마이클이 당신이
재닛을 죽였냐고 물어보면 그랬다고 해야 될 거예요

Subtitle: On the other hand, snitches do get stitches.
That is true. I read that once on the back of my boy Peanut's tricep.
Translation:
맞아요, 내 친구 피넛이
팔에 그런 문신을 했어요

Subtitle: You just casually cited Immanuel Kant.
Yeah, I know we're in a miserable bind here, / but this might be the proudest day of my life.
Translation:
그래요, 우리가 여기서
비참하게 엮인 건 알지만 / 이건 내 인생에서 가장
자랑스러운 날이 될 거예요

Subtitle: No offense, but that's a real bummer of a life.
Translation:
비웃는 건 아닌데
그게 자랑이라니 실망이네요

Subtitle: Tahani, I'll get right to the crux of the matter.
Did you murder Janet?
Absolutely not.
Now, you spent a lot of time with Eleanor.
Why do you think that is?
Well, people are just drawn to me.
You know, one of my shyest friends, I won't say his name, / to preserve his privacy, but he found my presence so comforting / that he asked me to co-host his TV show Anderson Cooper 360.
Translation:
사생활 보호를 위해
실명은 말 안 하겠지만 / 제 친구 중 부끄러움을
가장 많이 타는 친구는 제 존재만으로도
안정감을 느껴서 / 제 존재만으로도
안정감을 느껴서 자기 방송 공동 진행을
부탁하기도 했어요

Subtitle: Given what you learned about Eleanor, do you think she deserves to be here?
Translation:
지금까지 겪어본 바로는 엘리너가
여기 있는 게 정당한 일인가요?

Subtitle: Well...
You know, if it were up to me, I might find a way to look past her, um...
Translation:
만약 제가 결정해야 한다면 그녀의 과거를
살펴보려고 할 거예요

Subtitle: Deficiencies. But it's not up to me, is it?
Translation:
결점 같은 거요
하지만 제가 정하는 거 아니죠?

Subtitle: There are some criteria that she unfortunately / just didn't meet in her time on Earth.
Translation:
지구에 살면서 했던 일 중
안타깝게도 여기 조건에 / 부합하지 않는 게
있을 수도 있잖아요

Subtitle: So you think that I should send her to The Bad Place?
Translation:
그녀를 배드 플레이스로
보내야 한다고 생각하는 거죠?

Subtitle: Well, I didn't say that, / but is her staying here unfair to those who earned their place?
Translation:
그렇게 말하지 않았지만 / 걔가 여기서 머무르는 건
누군가에겐 불공평한 거 아닌가요?

Subtitle: It sounds like you want her to leave.
Translation:
엘리너가 여길 떠나기를
바라는 것 같군요

Subtitle: Well, is it not she who wants us to leave her?
Translation: 우리가 떠나는 게 엘리너의 바람 아닐까요?

Subtitle: Thank you, Tahani. You've been a big help.
Listen up, genius.
He's gonna call you in there in a second.
Don't worry, I got you. I'll just tell Michael / you're the bomb and that you got a dope soul and hella ethics.
Translation:
걱정 마요, 잘할게요
마이클한테 당신 진짜 대박이고 / 영혼도 쩔고
도덕심도 지린다고 할 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, boy. No, don't say any of that.
Michael has a lie detector in there. It's a glowing cube.
Translation:
거짓말 탐지기가 있어요
빛나는 네모 상자예요

Subtitle: Like the AllSpark? From Transformers?
Sure, just like the AllSpark from Transformers, / and he'll know instantly if you're lying about anything / so only smiles and nods, got it?
Translation:
네, '트랜스포머'의
올스파크처럼 생겼어요 / 거짓말하면 마이클이
바로 알아차릴 테니 / 그냥 웃으면서
고개만 끄덕여요, 알았죠?

Subtitle: Wise, sage, centered Jianyu.
I seek your wisdom in this moment of crisis.
Translation:
이 위기의 순간에
당신의 현명함을 갖고 싶네요

Subtitle: What to do with Eleanor?
Should I let her stay? Should I send her away?
Translation: 여기 머물게 둬야 하나요? 보내야 할까요?

Subtitle: You think I should send her away?
No, I should let her stay?
Or no, I shouldn't let her stay because she doesn't belong here?
Translation:
여기 있으면 안 되는 사람이니
보내야 한다고요?

Subtitle: Or no, I shouldn't let her stay even though she does belong here?
Translation:
여기 있어도 되는 사람이지만
보내야 한다고요?

Subtitle: Oh, Jianyu, I wish I had your wisdom.
Your devotion to the noble truths has given you something / that I don't have, clarity.
Translation:
숭고한 진리에 헌신하는 그 모습은
저에게 없는 뭔가를 느끼게 하네요 / 명료성 말이에요

Subtitle: It was Buddha who said, / "If a man lives a pure life.
Translation:
'순결한 삶을 사는 사람은' / '어떤 것도 그를
무너뜨리지 못한다'고

Subtitle: "Nothing can destroy him."
I'm not a man, and I've lived no life, / so will this destroy me?
Translation: 전 사람이 아니고 삶이 없으니 / 무너지게 되는 걸까요?

Subtitle: Oh, of course.
A cactus on its own intends no harm.
Translation:
선인장 그 자체는
해칠 의도가 없어요

Subtitle: It's only when we interfere that it becomes dangerous.
Translation:
우리가 끼어드는 순간
선인장이 위험한 존재가 되는 거죠

Subtitle: I need to remember my own agency here. Oh, thank you, Jianyu.
You're free to go.
Oh, yes, of course. Help yourself. I've got plenty of those.
Translation:
아, 그럼요, 가져가세요
전 많이 있으니까요

Subtitle: Chidi, come on in.
-[tone chimes] -Hi, there. I have Eleanor's file.
Janet, if you hand me a cactus, -I swear I will lose my mind. -[tone chimes]
Translation:
재닛, 또 선인장 주시면
진짜 미쳐버릴 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, yes!
All right, here we go. Eleanor, come back in.
Chidi, you stay here.
This file contains a compendium / of all of the highest impact events from your life.
Translation:
이 파일은 당신의 인생에서 / 가장 큰 사건들에 관한
개요서예요

Subtitle: That's the biggest positive and negative point swings.
Translation:
가장 큰 사건들에 관한
개요서예요 가장 긍정적인 일과
부정적인 일을 담았죠

Subtitle: So "Little Julie," who's that?
Julie is my cousin's daughter.
Her mom is kind of a mess, so I used to take her / to the mall sometimes and bought her churro dogs.
Translation:
제 사촌이 좀 엉망이라
제가 가끔 줄리를 / 쇼핑몰에 데려가서
츄로도그를 사주곤 했어요

Subtitle: It's a hot dog, but the bun is two churros.
Translation:
핫도그인데 빵 대신
츄로스로 되어 있고

Subtitle: And it's tied together with a Slim Jim.
It's an Arizona delicacy.
Oh, sounds awful, but it's very nice that you made that girl happy.
Translation:
맛없을 것 같지만
아이를 기쁘게 해줬으니 좋군요

Subtitle: So what's this "Kool Threadz, / "Glendale, Arizona's Premiere T-Shirt Emporium"?
Translation: 그럼 이건 뭔가요? / 애리조나 글렌데일 티셔츠 매장

Subtitle: Uh... Can we skip around and circle back?
Translation:
그건 건너뛰고
하던 얘기 마저 할까요?

Subtitle: How about I tell you more about those churro dogs?
Translation:
츄로도그에 대해서
더 얘기하는 건 어때요?

Subtitle: They came with unlimited ranch dressing.
Let's hear about the t-shirts, please.
[squeals] Okay.
I'll tell you, but it doesn't make me look great, / so don't judge me.
Translation:
얘기할게요, 하지만 제가
좋게 보이진 않을 테니 / 그거로 평가하시면 안 돼요

Subtitle: That's literally the purpose of this entire exercise.
Translation:
그게 이 모든 과정의
진짜 목적이에요

Subtitle: Okay, to understand this, / you have to know about my roommate, Madison.
Translation:
이 일을 이해하려면 / 이 일을 이해하려면 제 룸메이트 매디슨을
아셔야 해요

Subtitle: She was terrible.
[Eleanor] Hey, Mads.
Translation:
매디슨, 오늘 저녁에
짜증 나는 회식에 가야 하는데

Subtitle: Um, I have to go to this stupid work party tonight.
Translation:
매디슨, 오늘 저녁에
짜증 나는 회식에 가야 하는데 네 분홍색 드레스
빌려 입어도 돼?

Subtitle: Can I borrow your peach dress?
Translation:
네 분홍색 드레스
빌려 입어도 돼?

Subtitle: Ooh, that's a hard no, babe.
That dress is like twice your salary.
All right, I gotta go to the DMV and pick up my vanity plates.
Translation: 그럼 난 차 번호판 받으러 간다

Subtitle: Ciao, bitches.
[sighs] Well, that's not great, / but I assume you confessed and paid to fix it.
Translation:
음, 좋지 않네요 / 하지만 그걸 고백하고
수선비를 물어 준 거죠?

Subtitle: Not exactly.
Hey, losers, I'm going out. Can you zip me?
Translation:
멍청이들아, 나 나간다
지퍼 좀 올려줄래?

Subtitle: Dude, that dress is hella ripped.
-What? -[laughing]
Oh, that stupid dry cleaner!
Well, that's the risk you take when you keep your clothes clean.
Translation:
옷 깨끗하게 잘 입으려면
그 정도는 - 감수해야지
- 우리 엄만 변호사야

Subtitle: My mom's a lawyer. Those asswipes are gonna pay.
Translation:
- 감수해야지
- 우리 엄만 변호사야 이놈들 꼭
대가를 치르게 할 거야

Subtitle: She sued for $900 for the dress and $80,000,000 in emotional distress.
Translation:
옷값 900달러에 정신적
피해 보상 8천만 달러를 요구해서

Subtitle: The legal fees drove the dry cleaner out of business.
Translation:
그걸 감당하지 못한 세탁소가
문을 닫아버렸죠

Subtitle: Oh, boy.
Wait, this story's about t-shirts.
There's more, isn't there?
A little.
Check this out.
Somebody put the dry cleaners' story online, and it went viral.
Translation:
누가 세탁소 얘길 올렸는데
완전 퍼졌어

Subtitle: Madison's famous.
The "Dress Bitch"? Yikes.
[snickers] Serves her right.
Madison is psycho. She totally overreacted.
Translation:
매디슨 얘 완전 싸이코야
과민 반응한 거라고

Subtitle: This is her fault.
Yeah, her fault. That works.
You guys, what is happening?
Someone egged my Lexus, / and I have like 40,000 tweets calling me the "Dress Bitch"?
Translation:
누가 내 차에 계란을 던졌어 / 날 드레스녀라고 부르는
트윗만 4만 개를 받았다고

Subtitle: Over a loser dry cleaner man?
Why is everyone so jealous of me? This is a trash city, full of idiots.
Translation:
왜 다들 날 질투하는 거야? 여긴 멍청이로 가득 찬
쓰레기 도시야

Subtitle: -The "Dress Bitch" is so catchy. -Yeah.
I mean, someone could totally make t-shirts.
Translation:
- 맞아
- 누군가 이걸로 티셔츠를 만들 수도 있겠다

Subtitle: [gasps] Oh...
No, no. No. No.
Do not tell me that you made t-shirts that said...
That and then sold them for a profit?
Wish I could tell you that, bud. [sighs] I really do.
Girl, check it out! They're here.
Wait a second. Is this insane? I mean, should we be doing this?
Translation: 잠깐만, 이거 너무한 거 아닌가? 우리 진짜 이래도 되는 거야?

Subtitle: Dude, Madison brought this on herself, okay?
She's a nightmare of a person to everybody.
Plus, we already have a ton of pre-orders.
Here is your first cut of the profits.
Holy mama!
I can't believe you sold the t-shirts.
Translation:
그 셔츠를 팔았다니
믿을 수가 없네요

Subtitle: Does it help if they basically sold themselves?
Translation:
딱히 광고한 적은 없는데
그러면 좀 괜찮을까요?

Subtitle: I think you know it does not.
What did you do with the money?
Yeah. [sighs] I was hoping you wouldn't ask me that.
Thanks, babe.
Next question.
Eleanor.
Given what you know about the people who've been brought here, / the lives they've led, / do you think you belong in The Good Place?
Translation:
여기 온 사람들과
그들의 인생을 / 보았을 때 / 당신은 굿 플레이스에
속한다고 생각하나요?

Subtitle: No, I don't.
[Trevor] Yello, Bad Place. What's up, dummy?
This is Michael, the architect from Good Place Neighborhood 12358W.
Translation:
저는 굿 플레이스
12358W 지역의 설계자 마이클입니다

Subtitle: I'm guessing you've been looking for someone called Eleanor Shellstrop.
Translation:
그곳에서 엘리너 셸스트롭이라는
사람을 찾고 있을 것 같은데

Subtitle: She's here. Come and get her.
[Alexis] What is this?
What is that smell? Ew.
[Good Place woman] Get out of here!
Hello, Trevor.
Hey, there he is. Good to see you again, Mikey.
Translation:
저기 오셨네
다시 보니 좋네, 마이키

Subtitle: Hey, think fast, I brought you something.
Oh, nuts, thank you. Oh!
Oh, flaming snake ate all the nuts you brought me.
Translation:
불타는 뱀이
땅콩을 다 먹어 치웠네요

Subtitle: Argh. You're too nice to humiliate.
Oh, hello.
Hi, you look like a piece of crap, are, are you Eleanor?
Translation:
너 진짜 쓰레기 같은데
네가 엘리너야?

Subtitle: Dude, you're like a legend in The Bad Place.
You're... Check this out.
-Huh? -[all] "Dress Bitch"!
It's pretty great, right?
Trevor...
Do you know what caused this mistake? 'Cause I cannot figure it out.
Translation:
어쩌다 이렇게 됐는지 알아요?
난 도저히 모르겠네요

Subtitle: No, we're stumped, but, don't sweat it, champ.
Translation:
아니, 우리도 난감하지만
이제 애쓸 것 없어

Subtitle: She's definitely one of ours.
So we'll just roll on out, and you can get back to, / putting rainbows up your butt or whatever you do here. Okay?
Translation:
우린 이제 가볼 테니
넌 이만 돌아가 / 무지개똥을 싸든지 말든지
하시라고, 알았지?

Subtitle: [claps twice] Let's hit it, sweetheart. We got a long ride.
Translation:
자기는 나랑 같이 가자
갈 길이 멀어

Subtitle: What? Right now?
Trevor, for decency's sake, let her have some good-byes.
Translation:
트레버, 그래도
작별 인사는 하게 해줘요

Subtitle: [groans] God, good people are the worst.
Okay, uh, 30 minutes. We gotta get back for The Bachelor.
I'm gonna be pissed if I miss the Rose Ceremony.
Translation:
장미 세리머니를 못 보게 되면
정말 화낼 거야

Subtitle: I just want to say, once more, for the record, / that this whole good/bad system is bull-shirt.
Translation:
한 번 더 말해두고 싶은데 / 굿 플레이스, 배드 플레이스로
나누는 건 정말 거지 같아요

Subtitle: There should be a medium place for people like me / who kind of sucked, but in, like, a fun, chill way.
Translation:
나 같이 좀 별로여도
재밌고 멋진 사람을 위한 / 미디엄 플레이스도
있어야 되는 거 아닌가?

Subtitle: I agree. [chuckles softly]
I'm sorry I dragged you into this.
And that I never did laundry.
And that I waited until you were / about to do yours then secretly tossed mine / into the basket to trick you into doing it.
Translation:
당신이 빨래할 때까지 기다렸다가 / 내 걸 몰래 당신 바구니에 넣어서 / 내 것까지 하게 만든 것도
정말 미안해요

Subtitle: You didn't trick me. I repeatedly asked you to stop.
Just know you did everything you could to help me.
Translation:
나 도와주려고
최선을 다한 거 알아요

Subtitle: You're a really good fake soul mate.
What are you guys doing here?
Well, we only thought it was only proper to see you off.
Translation:
배웅은 제대로
해야 할 것 같았어요

Subtitle: It's the neighborly thing to do.
You guys came to say good-bye because you're my friends.
Translation:
우린 친구니까
작별 인사 하러 온 거네요

Subtitle: Well, I... Suppose some part of me / possibly has a sense of casual kinship with you.
Translation:
내 일부분이 그래도 / 당신과 친밀감을
느꼈던 것 같아요

Subtitle: Much as one might be fond of a street cat.
Thanks, Tahani.
Sorry about everything.
I'm really glad we're friends.
Oh, hey, dum-dum. You ready to go?
Oh, you must be Chidi.
Trying to improve her. Bold plan, bro.
Translation:
엘리너를 착하게 만들려 했지
꿈이 컸어

Subtitle: Well, actually, she learned a great deal / -in a very short amount of time-- -Oh, really? Really?
Translation:
사실 엘리너는
짧은 시간 안에 / - 많은 걸 배워...
- 그래? 정말?

Subtitle: I don't care. [claps] All right, let's hit it.
Oh, also, you should smile more. You have such a pretty smile.
Translation:
그리고 좀 더 웃어봐
웃는 게 예쁘니까

Subtitle: Love you, babe. Can't wait to torture you.
This is the 3:18 to The Bad Place, / making thousands of stops for literally no reason.
Translation:
3시 18분에 출발하는
배드 플레이스행 열차입니다 / 아무 이유 없이
엄청나게 멈출 겁니다

Subtitle: Now, you'll notice it's very hot in here, and it will get one degree hotter / every time you think about how hot it is.
Translation: 열차 안은 무척 덥습니다 그리고 덥다고 생각할 때마다 / 1도씩 올라갈 겁니다

Subtitle: You just thought about it.
-Michael... -Oh, hi, Chidi.
Want some pizza?
Bad Place crew delivered 100 of these to my office.
Translation:
배드 플레이스 사람들이 여기로
피자 100판을 주문했어요

Subtitle: All Hawaiian, the worst pizza.
Michael, I murdered Janet.
I knew about Eleanor from the beginning.

I've been trying to help her become a better person, / and when she found out that your retirement meant / that you would be tortured, she immediately tried / to find a way to prevent it. Eleanor is learning.
Translation:
나은 사람이 되도록
제가 도와줬으니까요 / 당신이 은퇴하면
고문당할 걸 알고 나선 / 그걸 막을 방법을
생각하던 사람이라고요 / 배우는 중이에요

Subtitle: She's just doing it after she died.
I did enjoy her company.
But, this is not Little League.
Translation:
하지만 이건
꼬마 야구 대회가 아니에요

Subtitle: There is no award for "Most Improved Player," Chidi.
Translation:
가장 성장한 선수에게
상을 주는 그런 게 아니라고요

Subtitle: Well, maybe there should be.
One final note, the dining car is at the very back of the train.
Translation:
마지막 공지예요, 식당 칸은
기차의 가장 끝에 있습니다

Subtitle: It serves only room-temperature Manhattan clam chowder, / and also, it's closed.
Translation:
실온 보관된 맨해튼
조개 수프만 제공하는데 / 문을 닫았어요

Subtitle: Okay, here we go.
-[Michael] Stop this train! -[train squeals to a stop]
Dude, what the fork?
You're not leaving. Not with her.
Not yet. Come on.
[Trevor] Wait, you want to keep her?
Bro, that's our girl. We agreed on this.
No, what we agreed on was that this was a mistake.
Translation:
아뇨, 착오가 있었다는 데만
동의한 거죠

Subtitle: Trevor, we're in unchartered territory here.
Translation:
트레버, 지금 이 일은
영역이 분명하지 않아요

Subtitle: Until we can sort this out, she stays with us.
Translation:
이 사태가 정리될 때까지
우리가 데리고 있겠습니다

Subtitle: All right, fine, but until this is resolved, / we're keeping the other Eleanor.
Translation:
그래, 좋아
하지만 해결될 때까지 / 우린 다른 엘리너를
데리고 있겠어

Subtitle: Fine. What? I'm sorry...
-The other Eleanor? -Yeah, the real Eleanor.
The one that was supposed to be here / but got sent down to us instead? She's on the train.
Translation:
여기 있어야 했지만
우리한테 보내진 엘리너 말이야 / 여기 있어야 했지만
우리한테 보내진 엘리너 말이야 기차 안에 있어

Subtitle: Eleanor, come on out.
Hey, ding-dongs. We figured out what's happened here.
Hey, ding-dongs. We figured out what's happened here.
You two are both named Eleanor Shellstrop.
Translation:
두 사람 모두 이름이
엘리너 셸스트롭이야

Subtitle: The day you died, you were both in Phoenix, Arizona, / shopping at the same grocery store.
Translation:
둘 다 애리조나주 피닉스의
식료품점에서 / 쇼핑을 하다가 죽었지

Subtitle: The "real" Eleanor was attending a conference / on the death penalty, and you stopped by to pick up / food for a local homeless shelter.
Translation:
진짜 엘리너는 사형 제도에 관한
콘퍼런스에 참석 중이었고 / 지역 노숙자 보호소에 전달할 / 식료품을 사고 있었어요

Subtitle: And Fake Eleanor was there buying margarita mix / and a magazine called, "Celebrity Baby Plastic Surgery Disasters."
Translation:
그리고 가짜 엘리너는
마가리타 믹스와 / '셀러브리티 베이비 성형 참사'
잡지를 사고 있었고요

Subtitle: Incredibly, you both died in the same 10,000th of a second, / in the same traffic accident, because Real Eleanor / was trying to save Fake Eleanor's life / by pushing you out of the way of the truck.
Translation:
놀랍게도 두 사람은
같은 교통사고로 인해 / 정확히 같은 순간에 사망했죠
진짜 엘리너가 가짜 엘리너를 / 트럭에 치이지 않게 / 구하려고 하다가 말이에요

Subtitle: I guess you really botched that one, eh?
I did, and I am so, so sorry.
It's all good.
So, how did you not realize you had the wrong Eleanor?
Translation:
그러면 잘못된 엘리너라는 걸
어떻게 몰랐던 거죠?

Subtitle: Oh, we don't know what people look like, / only names and profiles. On Earth, they're just dots on a map.
Translation:
우리는 사람들이 어떻게
생겼는지는 모릅니다 이름과 인적 사항밖에 모르죠 / 이름과 인적 사항밖에 모르죠 지도상의 점일 뿐이에요

Subtitle: Whatever, we got our wires crossed, / we picked up the wrong dot, blah, blah, blah, blah, / Point is, there are two Eleanors.
Translation:
어찌 되었든 오류로 인해서 / 잘못된 점을 골랐고
어쩌고저쩌고... / 문제는 엘리너가
2명이었다는 거야

Subtitle: The nice, boring one is yours. The trash bag is ours.
Translation:
착하고 재미없는 건 당신 몫
쓰레기 봉지는 우리 몫

Subtitle: -Eh-- -So, trash bag, let's go.
Let's hit it. And, also...
I'm still waiting on that smile, gorgeous.
Translation:
아직 웃는 것도 못 봤네
웃어봐, 예쁜이

Subtitle: -[Michael] Trevor. -Where's that smile?
Translation:
- 미소 한번 보여줘
- 트레버, 협상 어때요?

Subtitle: Trevor, how about we negotiate? Give you something else?
Translation:
- 미소 한번 보여줘
- 트레버, 협상 어때요? 뭔가 좋은 게 있을지 모르죠

Subtitle: What in the world could you have that we would want?
Translation:
우리가 원하는 게
과연 여기 있을까?

Subtitle: All right, how about a unicorn?
Right? I bet you don't have one of those.
No, that is true, yeah.
-[laughs] -Might be fun to skin it alive, eat its raw flesh, / maybe break off the horn, grind it up, snort it.
Translation:
산 채로 가죽을 벗겨서
회를 뜨고 / 뿔도 부러뜨려 갈아서
코로 흡입하면 좋겠군

Subtitle: Okay, let's keep talking. Yeah.
Fake Eleanor, a word?
It's just me, man. You can just say, "Eleanor."
Translation:
저 혼자 있으니
그냥 엘리너라고 불러요

Subtitle: Sorry, it just makes things easier.
Look, I'm not even sure how it would work for you to stay here / now that we know there's a "real" Eleanor, / but in the meantime, stay on your toes.
Translation:
이제 진짜 엘리너에 대해
알게 되었으니 / 당신이 여기 계속 있는 게
가능할지 모르겠지만 / 당신이 여기 계속 있는 게
가능할지 모르겠지만 그동안은 조신하게 있어요
트레버한테 넘어가지 말고요

Subtitle: Don't let Trevor get inside your head.
Translation:
그동안은 조신하게 있어요
트레버한테 넘어가지 말고요

Subtitle: Can I ask you something?
Why are you helping me?
Well, Chidi made a very good argument on your behalf, / but it's more than that. I truly believe that The Good Place is where you belong.
Translation:
치디가 당신의 입장을
잘 대변해 주기도 했지만 / 무엇보다 나는 이곳이
당신이 있을 곳이라고 믿어요

Subtitle: You're part of our team.
Hi! Oh, you must be the new student Eleanor Shellstrop.
I'm Gloria, the senior class secretary.
Cool.
Well, welcome to Adobe High, home of the Scorpi-otes!
Translation:
아도비 고등학교에 온 걸 환영해
스콜피요테가 마스코트지!

Subtitle: Half the school wanted to be the Scorpions, / half wanted to be the Coyotes, so we compromised.
Translation:
학생 절반은 학교 마스코트로
스콜피온을 원했고 / 다른 절반은 코요테를 원해서
양쪽 의견을 모두 수렴했어

Subtitle: Why don't I give you a tour after lunch?
Yeah, no thanks, mop-top.
Uh, sorry?
Don't need your help, / don't wanna sign your yearbook in, like, gel pen, / don't wanna bedazzle our college essays, or whatever.
Translation:
네 도움 필요 없어 / 네 졸업 앨범에 젤 펜으로
사인하고 싶지도 않고 / 네 대학 에세이 읽고
감동하고 싶지도 않아

Subtitle: I'm here for like six months, and I'm gonna fly solo.
Translation: 6개월만 있으면 졸업이니까 난 혼자 다닐 거야

Subtitle: Beat it, Gloria. She is, like, such a dork.
She, like, loves this school so much.
Why don't you come sit with us? We'll teach you which guys are cute / and which teachers are secretly pervs--
Translation: 이쪽으로 와서 우리랑 앉을래? 남자애들 누가 귀여운지 / 변태 선생은 누구인지 알려줄게

Subtitle: Yeah, that's a hard pass as well.
I don't wanna get chunky highlights, / make fun of nerds, and steal your mom's flavored vodka.
Translation:
나는 머리에 하이라이트 넣고 / 멍청한 애들 놀리면서
엄마 보드카나 훔치고 싶지는 않아

Subtitle: I get your whole "mean girl" thing, and I'm all set with it, thanks.
Translation:
날라리 놀이하는 건 알겠는데
난 관심 없어, 고마워

Subtitle: In fact...
Listen up, everyone.
I'm Eleanor, I'm new here, and as a blanket statement for everyone, / I don't wanna be a part of whatever little group you've formed / because they're all equally lame.
Translation:
나는 새로 온 엘리너야
모두에게 확실히 말해두자면 "스콜피요테" 나는 너희가 만들어 놓은
무리에는 전혀 관심이 없어 / 나는 너희가 만들어 놓은
무리에는 전혀 관심이 없어 어차피 따분한 건
다 마찬가지니까 / 어차피 따분한 건
다 마찬가지니까

Subtitle: Everybody cool? Great.
Hey, that was really cool, the way you told all those posers--
Translation:
아까 진짜 굉장했어 - 센 척하는 애들한테...
- 됐어

Subtitle: No.
[Tahani] Michael, welcome. How can I help you?
Well... If I'm going to save Fake Eleanor, / I need some help negotiating. I don't even know what to offer.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너를 살리려면 / 협상을 해야 하는데
뭘 제안해야 할지 모르겠어요

Subtitle: I mean, what do you get somebody who wants to eat a unicorn?
Translation:
유니콘을 먹겠다는 사람에게
뭘 제안해야 하죠?

Subtitle: A unicorn bib, yes! No, no, uh, unicorn holders, / you know, like, like corn holders, but for unicorns?
Translation:
유니콘 앞치마! 아니지
유니콘용 손잡이 / 옥수수 먹을 때 쓰는 것처럼요
그걸 유니콘용으로?

Subtitle: Perhaps, it'd be better / if we just move away from the unicorn thing altogether.
Translation: 유니콘은 아예 잊는 게 / 더 나을 것 같아요

Subtitle: [sighs] No, you're right, you're right.
And anyway, there's a bigger problem.
The Bad Place Crew, they're all terrible bullies, / and they outnumber me. They even have their own Bad Janet. I'll show you.
Translation:
배드 플레이스 사람들은
다 고약하고 / 머릿수도 훨씬 많죠
나쁜 재닛도 있어요, 보여드릴게요

Subtitle: Bad Janet?
-[tone sounds] -What?
Bad Janet, uh, where is the nearest café?
Translation:
나쁜 재닛, 가장 가까운
카페가 어디죠?

Subtitle: Oh, um, that's a good question.
It's up your mom's butt, you fat dink.
Translation:
네 엄마 방뎅이 속에 있어
모자란 자식

Subtitle: -[tone sounds] -What is even the purpose of a Janet who behaves in such a manner?
Translation:
저런 재닛이 필요한 이유가
도대체 뭘까요?

Subtitle: Unclear, but the... The point is / I never have to deal with negative emotion of any sort.
Translation:
그거야 모르죠, 중요한 건
내가 부정적 감정을 / 그거야 모르죠, 중요한 건
내가 부정적 감정을 겪어보질 못해서
도움이 필요해요, 타하니

Subtitle: I could use some backup, Tahani.
Oh, Michael, of course. Why don't you just bring them all here?
Translation:
물론 도와드릴게요
여기로 모두 데리고 오면 어때요?

Subtitle: Surely, this magnificent house will placate them.
Translation:
이렇게 아름다운 집에서는
평안을 얻을 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, perfect, perfect. I'll be right back.
[Eleanor] Well, here's... Your house.
It's beautiful, I love Icelandic primitive design.
Translation:
정말 아름답네요
고대 북유럽 디자인 정말 좋아해요

Subtitle: I kind of wish it had a clown nook, oh!
There it is.
Here's the bedroom. It's kind of hard to get up / on this dumb ledge though, it's like--
Translation:
여기가 침실이에요 / 이 턱을 올라가는 게
좀 짜증 나는데...

Subtitle: You have got to be forking kidding me.
Hey, Fake Eleanor, we used this same clown painting / to decorate the room you were supposed to live in down there.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너
배드 플레이스의 너희 집에도 / 똑같은 광대 그림으로 장식했어

Subtitle: I swear to Bieber.
Wait, what was your house like?
Well, I was living in what I assume is Eleanor's worst nightmare.
Translation:
아마도 엘리너가 가장
싫어하는 환경이었던 것 같아요

Subtitle: Every day was basically one endless baby shower / for a woman I didn't know.
Translation:
매일 베이비 샤워가
끊이지 않았는데 / 제가 알지도 못하는
사람의 베이비 샤워였죠

Subtitle: But also, somehow, I had to organize it.
Translation:
제가 알지도 못하는
사람의 베이비 샤워였죠 그걸 제가 주관해야 했어요

Subtitle: And, if I didn't remember everyone's name, I got a very strong electric shock.
Translation: 참석한 사람 이름을 못 외우면 엄청 센 전기 충격을 받았어요

Subtitle: Yep, that was my pitch.
And, then at night, it was pretty classic torture.
Uh, flying piranhas, lava monsters, college improv, / and there was always jazz music playing.
Translation:
날아다니는 피라냐나 용암 괴물
대학생 즉흥 코미디 같은 거 / 그리고 항상 재즈 음악이 나와요

Subtitle: Ugh, I hate jazz.
Every jazz song is, like, 40 minutes long. It's like, we get it.
You can blow on a trumpet. Wrap it up, Elton John.
Translation:
트럼펫 잘 부는 거 알겠으니까
이제 그만하라고, 엘튼 존

Subtitle: Famously a piano player.
I don't mean to be a bother, but could I possibly get some water / and whatever food doesn't turn to spiders in your mouth?
Translation:
실례가 되지 않는다면 물하고
입안에서 거미로 변하지 않는 아무 음식이나 얻을 수 있을까요? / 아무 음식이나 얻을 수 있을까요?

Subtitle: Oh, of course, so sorry. Let's get some dinner.
Translation:
네, 물론이죠
이제 저녁 먹도록 해요

Subtitle: Yeah, we'll all go. Perfect double date.
Two losers, a trash bag, and a demon.
Translation:
루저 둘과
쓰레기 봉지, 악마가 함께

Subtitle: Let's hit it.
All right, Michael, we're going to ply them with delicious food and drink, / and then we're going to subtly segue into negotiation.
Translation: 먼저 완벽한 음료수와 음식으로 감동시키고 나서 / 감동시키고 나서 자연스럽게 넘어가요

Subtitle: They're sure to be in a good mood. Everything is absolutely beautiful.
Translation: 다들 기분이 좋아 보이네요 모든 게 정말 아름답군요

Subtitle: This sucks, dude.
Yeah, this food, uh, blows.
Yo, Good Janet.
-[tone sounds] -Hi, there.
Oh, gimme some jalapeño poppers.
Sure, quick question, what is a "jalapeño"?
Also, what is a "poppers"? Also, what is "jalapeño poppers"?
Oops! Sorry, guys. See, in the confusion, / Janet got rebooted, so she hasn't quite uploaded / all of the info she usually knows.
Translation:
죄송합니다, 착오로 인해서 / 재닛이 재부팅되었어요
그래서 전에 알던 것도 / 모르는 경우가 종종 있죠

Subtitle: That's hilarious.
She's almost as stupid as people.
Oh, hey now, come on. Let's not insult people, please.
Translation:
우리 모두
인간은 모욕하지 말기로 해요

Subtitle: [imitating Michael] I'm Michael, I love idiot humans!
I got to admit, that does sound like me.
"I got to admit, that does sound like me."
Oh, nailed it again.
Go get me a drink.
Yes, of course.
Ah, man, this is gonna make a primo dump later on.
Translation:
이걸 먹고 나면
화장실에서 금똥을 싸겠어

Subtitle: Well, that looks delicious. What is that?
Oh, it's Tom Yum Goong soup. It reminds me of when I was in Thailand / rescuing victims of human trafficking.
Translation:
아, 똠얌꿍 수프예요
이걸 먹으면 태국에서 인신매매 희생자들을
구조할 때가 생각나죠 / 인신매매 희생자들을
구조할 때가 생각나죠

Subtitle: Oh, that sounds so good. I mean, the soup, not the...
Human trafficking.
Oh, and I think your grilled eggplant looks so good.
Translation:
그쪽 구운 가지도
정말 맛있어 보이는데요

Subtitle: Should we...
-[both] Splitsies? -Yeah!
I can't believe you thought you could pretend to be Real Eleanor.
Translation:
네가 진짜 흉내를 내고
살 수 있을 줄 알았어?

Subtitle: She's like a perfect ball of light, and you're like a... Wet pile of mulch.
Translation:
저쪽은 환한 불빛 같고
넌... 젖은 거름 더미 같잖아

Subtitle: Someone made a person out of wet mulch and leaves / and, like, dead slugs, and that's you.
Translation:
누군가 젖은 거름이나
죽은 달팽이 같은 쓰레기로 / 사람을 만들었다면 그게 너야

Subtitle: Whatever, it's easy when you're just born perfect.
Translation:
금수저로 태어났을 텐데
어려운 게 뭐가 있었겠어요?

Subtitle: My parents were both dirt bags who split up when I was eight.
Translation:
우리 부모는 둘 다 형편없었고
내가 8살 때 이혼했어요

Subtitle: I don't mean to eavesdrop, / but did you say your parents got a divorce?
Translation: 몰래 들으려고 한 건 아닌데 / 부모님이 이혼하셨다고요?

Subtitle: Yeah, and that kind of thing really changes a person.
Translation:
네, 사람들은 그런 일로
많은 변화를 경험하죠

Subtitle: I mean, that trauma... It can explain away / a lot of behavior.
Translation:
그 트라우마가
한 사람의 행동 방식에 / 영향을 미치기도 하거든요

Subtitle: Oh, of course.
Your parents are still together, I guess.
Oh, actually, I'm not sure. I never met my birth parents.
Translation:
사실 저는 몰라요
친부모님을 만난 적이 없거든요

Subtitle: They put me in an empty fish tank / and abandoned me at a train station in Bangladesh.
Translation:
그분들은 저를 빈 어항에 담아서 / 방글라데시의 기차역에
버리고 가셨죠

Subtitle: -[groans] -Luckily, I was found / and adopted by a very nice couple, the Shellstrops...
Translation:
운 좋게도 누군가 저를 발견했고 / 셸스트롭이라는 아주
훌륭한 가정에 입양이 되었어요

Subtitle: Oh, thank God.
But then they died when I was four...
-Bird flu. -That's awful.
Translation:
제가 4살 때 조류 독감으로
돌아가셨어요 - 엄청나군요
- 고아원은 불에 탔고

Subtitle: Anyway, orphanage burned down, yadda, yadda, yadda.
Translation:
- 엄청나군요
- 고아원은 불에 탔고 저는 미국으로 와서

Subtitle: Made my way to America, yadda, yadda, yadda.
Learned English from watching Seinfeld, / put myself through law school, and here I am.
Translation:
'사인필드'를 보며 영어를 배워 / 로스쿨에 들어가서
지금의 제가 되었죠

Subtitle: Huh. And, I'm sorry, what...
What is it you said happened to you?
The same thing that happens to half of all kids in America? [laughs]
And for you to have gone through all that, and to end up where you did, it is just...
Translation: 그런 일을 겪고도 이렇게 훌륭하게 성장했다니...

Subtitle: It's just amazing.
Oh, man, these horn-dogs are vibing like mofos.
Translation:
이 둘 지금 완전히
정신을 못 차리네

Subtitle: Am I right, Fake Eleanor?
Please, stop calling me that.
Oh, you got it, third wheel. [laughs]
Yeah, that wine's no good. I'm sending it back.
Hey, Janet.
You look sad.
People keep asking me questions that I don't know the answers to.
Translation:
사람들이 내가 모르는 것들을
자꾸 물어보네요

Subtitle: That was my whole life on Earth.
You know, it doesn't matter if you know things.
All that matters is what's in your heart.
Thanks, Jianyu. I mean, it does matter if I know things, / because I'm an informational delivery system, / and I don't have a heart, but thanks.
Translation:
고마워요, 지안유
정보 전송 시스템으로서 / 제가 무엇을 아는지가
중요하긴 해요 / 그리고 전 마음도 없고요
그래도 고마워요

Subtitle: Jianyu, I know usually you ask me questions, / but can I ask you a question?
Translation:
지안유, 보통은 당신이
제게 질문을 하지만 제가 질문을 해도 될까요? / 제가 질문을 해도 될까요?

Subtitle: -Sure. -What are jalapeño poppers?
Oh, I know this one!
Okay, they're deep fried jalapeños filled with cheese.
Translation:
치즈를 채워 넣고 튀긴
할라페뇨 고추예요

Subtitle: One time, at a Buffalo Wild Wings in Jacksonville, / but the nice one, not the one above the gas station, / I ate 50 of them in two minutes.
Translation:
예전에 잭슨빌에서
버펄로 와일드 윙을 갔었어요 주유소에 있는 허접한 데 말고
정말 근사한 곳으로요 / 주유소에 있는 허접한 데 말고
정말 근사한 곳으로요 / 2분 만에 50개를 먹어치웠죠

Subtitle: Everyone at the hospital was so impressed.
Got it. Thanks, Jianyu.
You're welcome.
Why did you do that?
Because you're the only person here that's nice to me.
Okay.
Anyone up for a little, uh, icebreaker?
You know, I once did trust falls with Barry Diller, / and it was the beginning of a lifelong friendship.
Translation:
한번은 베리 딜러와
트러스트 폴을 했는데 / 그때 평생의 우정이 시작되었죠

Subtitle: And then, once we trust each other, then we can discuss / making a deal for Fake Eleanor.
Translation:
우리도 서로 신뢰한다면
가짜 엘리너에 대한 / 협상을 시작할 수 있을 거예요

Subtitle: This sucks. How do you guys eat without listening to hard-core porn?
Translation:
재미없어, 포르노 없이
어떻게 음식을 먹는 거지?

Subtitle: Oh, come on, this is The Good Place, you can do anything you want.
Translation:
이곳은 굿 플레이스입니다
원하는 건 뭐든 할 수 있어요

Subtitle: What about throwing a rager and totally trashing this place?
Translation:
그러면 여기를 한번
박살 내보는 건 어때?

Subtitle: Woo-hoo. Yeah, I'd be into that.
We could totally go to town.
You know, I actually don't think that's such a good idea.
Let's party!
♪ Who let the dogs out? ♪
Oh, my God!
So, um, Chidi tells me that he's teaching you about ethics.
Yeah, actually, we've had some interesting / and in-depth classes. He taught me about Plato / -and Socrates, Immanuel Kant-- -Yeah, cool, shut up.
Translation:
네, 꽤 흥미롭고
깊이 있는 시간이었죠 / 플라톤과 소크라테스도 배우고 / - 임마누엘 칸트도...
- 이만 닥치고

Subtitle: Let's cut to the chase here. You two go to Poundtown?
Translation:
본론으로 들어가지
둘은 재미 좀 보나?

Subtitle: Poundtown, bro. You two bang it out?
She hot for teach? Did you pork the dork?
C'mon, girl, dish me dem dirty deets.
I assure you, our relationship was "teacher-student," nothing more.
Chidi, you don't have to explain anything to me.
Whatever happened before I arrived is none of my business.
Translation:
제가 오기 전에 있었던 일은
저와 관계없는 일이니까요

Subtitle: Hey, I'd love to see the rest of the neighborhood.
Um, yes, it's incredible.
There's an amazing library, / there's a beautiful, piranha-free lake.
Translation:
훌륭한 도서관도 있고
피라냐가 없는 / 훌륭한 도서관도 있고
피라냐가 없는 아름다운 호수도 있죠

Subtitle: [chuckles] Well, please, show me everything.
Translation: 아름다운 호수도 있죠 전부 보고 싶어요

Subtitle: You ready, Eleanor?
I've seen it all already. You guys go ahead.
Translation:
저는 모두 봤으니
두 분 가보세요

Subtitle: You'd rather be alone with him?
Fire in the hole. Watch your heads, ladies.
My dudes tend to boomerang around the room.
Translation:
내 발톱 친구들이
사방으로 튀고 난리네

Subtitle: Yeah, I mean, I don't need to walk around and nerd out about old books. I'm good.
Translation:
오래된 책들이나 찾아
일부러 돌아다니면서 시간 낭비할 생각은 없어요

Subtitle: Okay.
Hey, a bunch of us are gonna go see Spider-Man 2 tonight.
Translation:
오늘 애들이랑 나가서 '스파이더맨 2' 볼 건데
같이 갈래?

Subtitle: Do you want to come?
They made a second Spider-Man?
What is there left to say?
Sure, whatever, I'm in.
Cool, okay, well, I'll get tickets / for the eight of us, and you can just pay me back in cash.
Translation: 그럼 내가 표 8장 예매할게 / 그럼 내가 표 8장 예매할게 나중에 나한테 현금으로 줘

Subtitle: So, you can get all the points on your credit card, / and the rest of us get screwed?
Translation: 너 혼자서 신용 카드 포인트 다 챙기려고? / 신용 카드 포인트 다 챙기려고?

Subtitle: -No way. -No, it's just so / we can all get tickets before they sell out.
Translation:
- 그건 안 되지
- 그게 아니라 / 매진되기 전에
다 사려고 그러는 거잖아

Subtitle: Do you want to buy them?
So you guys can never pay me back, and I'll be out like 80 bucks? Nice try.
Translation:
그럼 너흰 절대 안 갚고
나 혼자 손해 보라고? 시도는 좋았지만
내 표는 내가 사겠어

Subtitle: I'll buy my own ticket.
Translation:
시도는 좋았지만
내 표는 내가 사겠어

Subtitle: The rest of the group can do whatever they want.
Where did she end up?
Bought it with points, baby. My points.
I think I need to find a new place to live.
Translation: 나 이사 가야 할 것 같아

Subtitle: -[electronic music playing] -Oh... No, no, no, no.
Don't... Don't...
[chuckles] All right.
Want a bump?
No, thank you, I don't use cocaine.
Oh, it's not cocaine, idiot. We're snorting time.
Translation:
코카인 아니야, 머저리
시간을 흡입하는 거야

Subtitle: Sorry... you're snorting the concept of time?
Yeah, it'll fork you up.
Yo, monk dude, you know how to tap a keg?
Translation:
거기, 스님
맥주통 딸 줄 아나?

Subtitle: -Karaoke time! -[Dana] Whoo!
Dana, baby, what do you wanna do?
Okay, Mussolini's speech? Ooh, the Mel Gibson rant?
Translation:
무솔리니 연설? 아니면
멜 깁슨 불평하는 거?

Subtitle: -That's a classic. -Classic...
Ooh! Let's do the Nixon tapes.
Translation:
- 고전이지
- 그래 - 닉슨 도청 테이프로 하자!
- 좋아!

Subtitle: -That's my jam! -Yeah!
[Nixon's voice] "What you always have to remember about the Irish is they get mean.
"Virtually every Irish I've known gets mean when he drinks."
Translation:
'내가 아는 모든 아일랜드 사람은
술을 마시면 고약해지지'

Subtitle: Michael, tell them to stop.
Oh, I think I made it pretty clear that I don't approve.
Translation:
용납하지 않겠다는 의견은
충분히 표현한 것 같아요

Subtitle: -Hey, idiot. Dance. -You got it.
[Nixon's voice] "Oh, it's about damn time that the Jew in America realizes / he's an American first and a Jew second."
Translation:
'미국에 있는 유대인들은
미국인들이 먼저고' / '유대인은 그다음이라는 걸
이제 인정해야 해'

Subtitle: [laughs] I lighted him on fire, and he never spoke again.
Translation:
내가 몸에 불을 붙였더니
다시는 말을 못 했지

Subtitle: You know, maybe I'm not as great as Real Eleanor, / but I'm better than I used to be.
Translation:
진짜 엘리너만큼은 아니더라도 / 난 이전의 나보다
훨씬 나아졌어요

Subtitle: I'm medium-good.
Why haven't you forkers invented a medium place?
Translation: 난 중간 정도는 좋은 사람이라고요 미디엄 플레이스는 왜 없어요?

Subtitle: Look, I know you've been trying to become a "better person,"
Translation:
네가 '더 나은 사람'이 되려고
노력한 건 알겠어

Subtitle: I mean, you didn't want to get caught. I get it.
But, I read your file... You don't belong here.
Translation:
하지만 네 파일을 봤는데
넌 여기 어울리지 않아

Subtitle: I mean, she spent her weekends breaking up dog fighting rings.
Translation:
저 엘리너는 투견장 문을
닫으려고 몇 주 동안 노력했어

Subtitle: You once saw a meter maid writing you a ticket, / and you barked like a dog till she ran away.
Translation:
너는 주차 단속원이
네 차에 티켓 끊는 거 보고 / 그 사람이 도망갈 때까지
개처럼 짖어댔잖아

Subtitle: I mean, honestly, you'll be happier in The Bad Place.
Translation:
너는 배드 플레이스가
더 잘 맞을 거야

Subtitle: I mean, don't get me wrong, you'll be miserable.
We will torture you, but you'll also be happier.
Translation:
우리가 고문도 할 거니까
하지만 더 행복할 거라고

Subtitle: Because you won't have to keep trying to fit in somewhere / you just don't belong.
Translation:
왜냐하면 어울리지 않는
장소에 맞추려고 / 더는 노력하지 않아도 되니까

Subtitle: All right!
Let's go.
Okay, hold on, I have to ask, is this thing gonna happen?
Translation:
좋았어, 잠깐
우리는 어떻게 안 될까?

Subtitle: -You and me? -Ew, no, gross.
Okay, you know I had to ask, babe.
[Michael] Oh, Tahani, I'm so sorry.
I will obviously clean all of this up.
I don't care about the house, Michael.
I'm just upset that you let them walk all over you.
Translation:
이 사람들이 맘대로 하는데도
그냥 두면 어떡해요

Subtitle: I know... They're the only thing in the Universe that scares me.
Translation:
내가 무서워하는 건
전 우주에 이 사람들뿐이에요

Subtitle: I know what I have to do.
I just have to be... More accommodating.
Offer them everything they want, give in to all of their demands, / and then they'll have to respect me.
Translation: 원하는 요구들 모두 들어주고 / 그러면 날 존경할 거예요

Subtitle: No, you need to stand up for yourself.
Translation:
아니에요, 자신을 위해
더 당당해져야 해요

Subtitle: I'm going to tell you the same thing that I told / Mark Zuckerberg right before he ousted Eduardo Saverin.
Translation:
에두아르도 세브린을
해고하기 전에 / 내가 마크 저커버그에게
해준 얘기를 그대로 해줄게요

Subtitle: You are smart, you are capable, and the time has come to hit "unfriend."
Translation:
당신은 똑똑하고 능력 있으니
이제 '친구 끊기'를 누르고 '더 페이스북'이 아닌
그냥 '페이스북'이라고 해요
