Subtitle: I also told Mark to lose the "the". Just "Facebook."
That was me.
Oh, my head.
Here, drink this.
How am I hung over? I thought there were no hangovers here.
Translation:
나 왜 이러죠?
여긴 숙취가 없는 줄 알았는데

Subtitle: Well, The Bad Place Crew requested that the hangover filter be turned off.
Translation:
배드 플레이스 사람들이
숙취 필터를 꺼달라고 했어요 자기들은 그게 좋다고

Subtitle: They like them.
So, Michael said we're meeting at Tahani's place in an hour / for a negotiation session. We'll walk over together?
Translation:
마이클이 1시간 후에
타하니 집에 모여서 / 협상을 진행하자고 했어요
같이 걸어갈래요?

Subtitle: You don't have to come, man. I'm good.
Just hang out with Real Eleanor and name constellations / after each other, or whatever it is nerds do.
Translation:
진짜 엘리너랑 다니면서
별자리에 서로의 이름을 붙이거나 / 다른 따분한 일을 하면서
놀든가 해요

Subtitle: I'm fine on my own.
Yeah, Eleanor, just because we have a new guest in the house / doesn't mean I'm not still gonna be there for you.
Translation:
엘리너, 새로운 손님이
왔다고 해서 / 내가 당신을
응원하지 않는 건 아니에요

Subtitle: I'm in this. We're a team.
So, you've been temping for us for a year now, / and we want to bring you aboard permanently.
Translation:
지난 1년간 임시직으로
우리와 일해줬는데 / 이제 정직원으로
함께하고 싶어요

Subtitle: We think you'd be a great addition to the team.
Translation: 우리 팀에 잘 어울리실 것 같네요

Subtitle: Yeah... No. I'm good.
You're turning it down?
I just don't think I'm really one of you guys.
Translation:
제가 여기 어울리는 것
같지가 않아서요

Subtitle: You're all obsessed with this place, man.
You love working here and talking about working here, / and you all hang out like some kind of cult.
Translation:
대화도 온통 일에 관한
얘기뿐이고 / 무슨 종교 집단처럼
밖에서도 어울려 다니고요

Subtitle: We hang out after work because we're friends.
Translation:
일 끝나고 만나는 건
친구기 때문에 그런 거예요

Subtitle: I know. It's weird.
If this is how you really feel, I think I have to fire you.
Translation:
그게 솔직한 의견이라면
해고해야 할 것 같군요

Subtitle: Severance pay. Love it.
Good looking out, boss.
Peace!
You need me to lie to old people / and scare them into buying fake allergy medicine.
Translation:
늙은이들을 거짓말로 위협해서 / 알레르기약을 사도록
만들라는 거죠

Subtitle: I get it, man. Which one's my desk?
That one, over there.
All you gotta do is hit your minimal sales target every week.
Cool. And you guys don't have any lame, mandatory office hangouts, right?
Translation:
좋아요, 여기서는 지루한 강제 회식 같은 건
없는 거죠?

Subtitle: Hell no.
Some people go out for a drink after work, / and I like to run the occasional group drill / to see how fast we can shred evidence, but that's it.
Translation:
가끔 퇴근 후에 나가서
한잔하는 사람들이 있고 / 때가 되면 증거를
얼마나 빨리 없애는지 / 점검하는 훈련이 있지만
그것뿐이죠

Subtitle: Most days, you'll be able to avoid even talking to another person here.
Translation:
대부분은 다른 사람들과
얘기할 일조차 없을 거예요

Subtitle: Perfect. Happy to be a part of the not-team.
Translation:
이런 콩가루 집단에
참여하게 되어 기쁘네요

Subtitle: It'll be a pleasure not hanging out with you.
Translation:
함께 어울릴 필요 없어서
정말 다행입니다

Subtitle: All right, let's begin negotiations.
Now, we would like to discuss various trades that we could--
Oh, yeah, we're not negotiating.
See, Fake Eleanor and I, we bro-ed down pretty hard last night.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너와 나는 어젯밤
서로에 대한 믿음을 확인했거든

Subtitle: -We hooked up. -No, we didn't.
Yeah, but who are they gonna believe... me or a woman? [laughs]
Translation:
이 사람들이 내 말을 믿을까?
여자 말을 믿을까?

Subtitle: Point is, she knows that she doesn't belong here, and she's giving up.
Translation:
아무튼 저 여자도 알아 자기가 여기 안 어울리는 거
이제 포기할 거야

Subtitle: Is this true, Fake Eleanor? Are you giving up?
Translation:
그게 사실인가요? 가짜 엘리너 양
포기하는 거예요?

Subtitle: Yeah, of course she is. She knows this place isn't for her.
Translation:
당연하지, 여기가
자기 자리 아닌 거 알아

Subtitle: Let's go, ding-dong. Come on.
No, I'm not leaving.
Oh, come on, sweetheart, we've been through this.
You know you don't belong here.
You're right. I don't...
But, I want to.
I used to never want to be a part of any group, / but I'm a different person now, / because of the person who helped me, / and I want to be like him.
Translation:
이전에는 한 번도 어디에
속하고 싶지 않았었지만 / 지금은 달라요
날 도와줬던 누군가로 인해 / 지금은 달라요
날 도와줬던 누군가로 인해 지금은 그 사람처럼
되고 싶다고요 / 지금은 그 사람처럼
되고 싶다고요

Subtitle: I want to be like all the people who are here.
You can, Eleanor.
Thanks, Real Eleanor.
Hey, if you two aren't gonna make out, just shut up.
Translation:
둘이 사귀려는 거 아니라면
그만 닥치시지

Subtitle: Look, if you don't come with us, / we're gonna have to turn this matter over to Shawn.
Translation: 나랑 같이 안 갈 거면 / 이제 숀에게 가는 수밖에 없어

Subtitle: Oh, oh, no! Shawn, really?
Who's Shawn?
He's the wise, eternal Judge who sits on high, / has the final say on all disputes between our two realms.
Translation:
우리 두 세계 사이의
모든 분쟁을 해결하는 / 현명하고 고매하신
영원의 판사님이시죠

Subtitle: And his name is Shawn?
Okay, look, I don't want Shawn involved either.
So, how about you blow us away with an offer, so we can end this.
Translation:
그러니까 놀라 자빠질 만한
제안을 해봐

Subtitle: Okay...
Here's my offer.
You get nothing!
We're not letting Fake Eleanor go, and we're not giving you anything.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너도 여기 있을 거고
아무것도 주지 않을 겁니다

Subtitle: Get him, Michael!
You can summon every evil creature you have, / every weapon in your arsenal, every four-headed flying bear.
Translation:
당신이 어떤 악마를 소환하든
어떤 무기를 가져오든 / 머리가 넷 달린
날아다니는 곰을 데려오든... 거긴 그런 게 있대요
우린 포기하지 않을 거예요

Subtitle: They have them down there. But, we are not giving up.
Translation:
거긴 그런 게 있대요
우린 포기하지 않을 거예요 엘리너는 굿 플레이스에

Subtitle: I believe that Eleanor belongs in The Good Place.
Translation:
엘리너는 굿 플레이스에 어울리는 사람이라고 생각하니까
내가 틀렸다면

Subtitle: If I'm wrong, you can take her to The Bad Place / and punish her all you want, just really go to town on her.
Translation:
어울리는 사람이라고 생각하니까
내가 틀렸다면 당신이 그녀를 배드 플레이스로
데리고 가서 / 당신이 그녀를 배드 플레이스로
데리고 가서 맘대로 벌을 줘도 좋아요

Subtitle: Gah, gah, gah. Easy, buddy, easy.
But, she's staying here.
Now, all of you...
Get the fork out of my neighborhood.
[chuckles] You're on borrowed time, Fake Eleanor.
Enjoy it while it lasts. Let's roll, dummies.
Let's get one drink for the road.
-[Dana] Bye. -[Alexis] Did you guys hear any of that?
Translation:
- 안녕
- 방금 저 사람 얘기 들었어?

Subtitle: Oh, my...
-[Tahani] Bravo, Michael, really. -[applauding]
Hello, Jianyu.
You got sloppy. I found your junk food all over the house, / and then, last night, / you knew how to tap a keg.
Translation:
많이 풀어졌네요
아까 불량 식품도 찾았어요 사방에 널렸더라고요
그리고 어젯밤에 보니까 / 사방에 널렸더라고요
그리고 어젯밤에 보니까 / 맥주통 따는 법도 알던데

Subtitle: So, I thought I would come in here
Translation:
맥주통 따는 법도 알던데 그래서 내가
'명상실'을 좀 조사하다가

Subtitle: and investigate your little "meditation" den.
And, what I found was this.
Now, I don't know who you are, / but I do know that you're not a Buddhist monk.
Translation: 당신이 누군지는 모르지만 / 스님이 아니라는 건 알고 있어요

Subtitle: [Jianyu] Number five is number one. Number seven is number two.
[Jianyu] Number five is number one. Number seven is number two.
Number three and number four are tied for number three.
What are you talking about?
I'm ranking my favorite Fast and the Furious movies.
You said you wanted to know who I am, / and this is the best way to get to know me.
Translation:
내가 누군지 알고 싶다고 했잖아요
날 알고 싶다면 / 내가 누군지 알고 싶다고 했잖아요
날 알고 싶다면 이 방법이 최고거든요

Subtitle: No, it isn't.
You could tell me your real name, for starters.
My name is Jason Mendoza. I'm from Florida / and I'm a professional, amateur deejay.
Translation:
내 이름은 제이슨 멘도사예요 플로리다에서 왔고
전문 아마추어 DJ죠 / 플로리다에서 왔고
전문 아마추어 DJ죠

Subtitle: -And, is that a family member? -I wish.
Translation:
저 사람은 가족이에요? 그랬으면 좋겠지만
쟨 아리아나 그란데예요

Subtitle: That's Ariana Grande, the sexiest woman alive.
Translation:
그랬으면 좋겠지만
쟨 아리아나 그란데예요 지구에서 가장 섹시한 여자

Subtitle: You wish that you were related to a woman you want to have sex with.
Translation:
섹스를 하고 싶은 사람이랑
가족이었으면 좋겠다고요?

Subtitle: You know what? It'd be one thing if you just weren't a Buddhist monk, / but you're barely even a regular, functioning person.
Translation:
스님이 아닌 건 그렇다 쳐도 / 하다못해 평범하게
제 기능을 하는 사람도 아니네요

Subtitle: How did you get here?
I don't know, but, please, dawg, you can't tell Michael about me.
Translation:
몰라요, 하지만 부탁이에요 마이클한테
내 얘긴 하지 말아줘요

Subtitle: You have some nerve asking me for favors / when you have spent weeks deceiving me, making a fool out of me, / and bringing snack food into my house.
Translation:
몇 주 동안 날 속이면서 / 바보로 만들고
내 집에서 이런 거나 먹으면서 그런 부탁까지 하다니
진짜 뻔뻔하네요 / 그런 부탁까지 하다니
진짜 뻔뻔하네요

Subtitle: Disgusting!
Oh, Ariana, we're really in it now.
Shawn, the judge, could show up at any moment, / so we need to have a rock-solid argument / for why Fake Eleanor should not be sent to The Bad Place.
Translation:
숀 판사님이
언제든 나타날 수 있으니 / 왜 가짜 엘리너가
배드 플레이스로 가면 안 되는지 / 왜 가짜 엘리너가
배드 플레이스로 가면 안 되는지 완벽한 논거를 준비해야 해요

Subtitle: -Should be fun. -That's the spirit!
Don't even think about the fact / that our slightest misstep could cause Fake Eleanor / to suffer for eternity.
Translation:
우리의 사소한 실수 하나가 / 가짜 엘리너를 영원한
고통에 처하게 할 수 있단 건 / 생각조차 하지 맙시다

Subtitle: That's all I'm thinking about now.
Yep, shouldn't have said that. Regretted it immediately.
Translation:
그 말은 하지 말 걸 그랬네요
바로 후회했어요

Subtitle: Bambadjan was a human rights advocate, / so he and Real Eleanor will build a sort of legal argument.
Translation:
밤바잔은 인권 변호사였으니 / 진짜 엘리너와 함께
법적인 부분을 맡을 겁니다

Subtitle: Um... [clears throat] Could you please just say, "Eleanor?"
And maybe point to whichever one of us you're addressing?
Well, actually, the fake/real distinction helps me.
Translation:
사실 가짜, 진짜로
구분하는 게 도움이 되거든요

Subtitle: Oh, does it, Bambadjan?
Now, I know a fair amount about your time on Earth.
Translation:
지구에서의 당신 삶에 대해선
충분히 알았으니

Subtitle: Why don't you tell me about your time here?
Anything that might help your case.
Translation:
이 사건에 도움을
줄 만한 건 뭐든지요

Subtitle: Well, in the first 24 hours, I caused the world to erupt into chaos, / and then I caused a garbage storm.
Translation:
처음 24시간 동안
저는 이 세상을 혼돈 속으로 몰아넣고
쓰레기 폭풍을 일으켰죠 / 혼돈 속으로 몰아넣고
쓰레기 폭풍을 일으켰죠

Subtitle: It was kind of a rough start, / but things calmed down after Chidi started helping me / learn about ethics.
Translation:
시작이 좋진 않았지만 / 치디한테 윤리에 대해
배우기 시작하면서 / 상황이 진정됐어요

Subtitle: Okay, tell me about that.
Translation: 그럼 그 얘기를 좀 더 해보죠

Subtitle: Well, I studied with Chidi every day, and then Chidi got sick of me, / so I did some nice stuff to make him feel better.
Translation:
매일 치디와 공부를 했는데
치디가 저한테 질려버려서 / 치디의 기분이 나아질
뭔가 멋진 일을 했어요

Subtitle: And later, I confessed because Chidi / was being tortured by guilt, and I just felt awful, / seeing his little, nerdy face all contorted.
Translation:
근데 나중에
그 착해빠진 얼굴이 / 죄책감으로 일그러진 걸 보니
마음이 좋지 않아서 / 그냥 사실대로 털어놨어요

Subtitle: "Oh, Eleanor, / "I have a stomach ache because of what you did." [laughs]
Translation:
엘리너 / 당신이 한 짓 때문에
배가 너무 아프네요

Subtitle: He is such a dork.
You know, uh, a lot of death row inmates feel regret about things they never said, / admissions of guilt, or anger, or love.
Translation:
사형수들은 보통
말 못 한 게 후회된다고들 해요 죄나 분노, 혹은...
사랑을 고백하지 못해서요 / 죄나 분노, 혹은...
사랑을 고백하지 못해서요

Subtitle: Are you making a move on me?
It's fine. I just didn't see it coming.
-Uh... -Well, hooking up with someone / with the exact same name, it is kind of a fun, narcissistic fantasy--
Translation:
이름이 똑같은 사람과 엮이는 건 / 재밌는 자아도취적
환상 같긴 한데...

Subtitle: No, no, Eleanor, I'm talking--
-I could be into it. -Mmm. No, I'm talking about you and Chidi.
Translation:
- 할 수 있을 것 같아요
- 치디와 당신 얘길 하는 거예요

Subtitle: Now, ordinarily, you having feelings for my soul mate / -would be a conflict of interest-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Translation:
내 소울메이트에 당신이 관심을 보이면
이해 상충이긴 하지만... / 당신이 관심을 보이면
이해 상충이긴 하지만...

Subtitle: You think I'm into Chidi?
Yes, Eleanor, I do.
Because you are.
You mentioned his name nine times in the last ten minutes.
Nobody asked you, Bambadjan.
I'm not sure what will work with Shawn, but we should have all our bases covered.
Translation:
숀한테 어떤 게
먹힐지 모르겠지만 모든 가능성을 따져봐야 해요

Subtitle: Shall we start with the Greeks, / or would you prefer the modern British masters?
Translation:
그리스부터 시작할까요? / 아니면 현대 영국의 대가를
선호하나요?

Subtitle: Chidi?
I'm sorry, choices are hard for me when I'm under pressure.
I know that, buddy, but we're short of time here, / and it's kind of important for Eleanor.
Translation:
그건 저도 압니다만
시간이 없네요 / 그리고 엘리너에게
중요한 일이니까요

Subtitle: Right, which is why I can't take this lightly. What if I screw up?
Translation:
네, 그래서 그냥 가볍게
여기지 못하는 거예요 제가 망치면 어떡해요?

Subtitle: Listen, I don't need the Chidi who once had a panic attack / during Rock-Paper-Scissors because there were, and I quote, / "just too many variables."
Translation:
가위바위보를 하다가
공황 발작을 겪었을 때의 모습은 / 필요 없어요
그때 이렇게 말했죠? / '변수가 너무 많아요'

Subtitle: I need the Chidi who stormed in here and told me to stop / Eleanor's train without thinking of consequences.
Translation:
지금 필요한 건 엘리너의 기차를 멈추기 위해
결과는 생각하지 않고 여기로 뛰어들어왔던
그때의 치디라고요 / 여기로 뛰어들어왔던
그때의 치디라고요

Subtitle: Oh, boy, now I'm nervous about that decision.
Retroactively? I mean, how do you even?
I don't know.
Okay, we have so many big choices to make. Let's start small.
Translation:
알겠어요, 우리에겐
선택해야 할 게 많아요 사소한 것부터 시작해보죠

Subtitle: Do you want to use a dry erase board or the regular pen and paper?
Translation: 화이트보드를 쓸까요? 아니면 그냥 종이와 펜을 쓸까요?

Subtitle: Just pick.
[Uzo] Chidi, just pick!
Come on, Chidi, pick someone.
Don't pressure me, Uzo. I have to consider all the factors.
Translation:
부담 주지 마, 우조
고려할 게 많단 말이야 경기 전략과 친구들의 정신력

Subtitle: Athletic strategies, / the fragile egos of my classmates, and gender politics.
Translation: 경기 전략과 친구들의 정신력 / 또 성별에 따른 선택도 고려해야지

Subtitle: Should I pick a girl / as a gesture towards women's equality, or is that pandering?
Translation:
여성 평등을 지지한다는 의미로
여자를 골라야 하나? / 여성 평등을 지지한다는 의미로
여자를 골라야 하나? 아니면 그게 더 정치적인가?

Subtitle: Or do I think it's pandering / because of my limited male point of view? I'm vexed, Uzo, vexed.
Translation:
내가 남자 입장에서만 보느라 / 내가 남자 입장에서만 보느라 그게 정치적이라고 생각하는 걸까?
나 정말 곤란해

Subtitle: You're always vexed. Just pick.
Okay, fine, I choose Tokunbo.
You can't draft the teacher. Pick a kid.
-[kid] Come on, Chidi. Just pick someone. -[all clamoring]
Congratulations, Chidi. You filibustered recess.
Translation:
축하해, 치디
너 때문에 쉬는 시간 끝났잖아

Subtitle: No, no, no, you're wrong.
There are way more things I hate about Chidi than like about him.
Translation:
치디에 관해 좋아하는 점보다
싫어하는 게 더 많다고요

Subtitle: Like what?
[scoffs] His stupid Clark Kent glasses, his extensive turtleneck collection, / oh, and he loves ethics so much.
Translation:
범생이 안경
목 늘어난 터틀넥 스웨터 / 그리고 치디는
윤리를 참 좋아해요

Subtitle: He once talked about John Rawls for two hours. I timed it.
Translation:
그리고 치디는
윤리를 참 좋아해요 존 롤스 얘기만 2시간을 한 적도
있어요, 내가 시간 재봤거든요

Subtitle: And, he only stopped because he saw me timing him.
Translation:
제가 시간 재는 걸 보고
멈추더라고요

Subtitle: Granted, he laughed, and kind of made fun of himself, / it was a nice moment, but still.
Translation:
그리고 당연히 웃으면서
자기가 한 짓을 창피해했죠 / 재밌기는 했지만 그래도 별로예요

Subtitle: He always twitches his eyebrows when he says "absolutism,"
Translation:
'절대론'이라는 단어를 말할 땐 눈썹을 씰룩거리고
제가 무식한 말을 할 때마다

Subtitle: and he tilts his head whenever I say anything ignorant, / but he never makes fun of me, which is nice.
Translation:
눈썹을 씰룩거리고
제가 무식한 말을 할 때마다 머리를 갸우뚱해요 / 하지만 날 놀리지 않는 건
정말 좋아요

Subtitle: He's also incredibly patient, and kind, and surprisingly jacked, / and, oh, fork, I'm in love with Chidi.
Translation:
인내심도 많고 친절하고 몸도 얼마나 좋은지 몰라요
이런, 젠장 / 몸도 얼마나 좋은지 몰라요
이런, 젠장 내가 치디를 좋아하나 봐요

Subtitle: Let's take a little break.
I know this is awkward, / but as your advocate, and, I hope, friend, / I think you should tell Chidi how you feel.
Translation:
이 상황이 좀 이상하지만 / 당신의 변호인으로서
그리고 친구로서 바라건대 / 치디에게 그 감정을
얘기하는 게 좋을 것 같아요

Subtitle: Would a hug make you feel better?
No, I don't think that it would--
Oh, too late, you're getting one.
Thanks, Bambadjan, that does make me feel better.
Translation:
늦었어요, 이미 안고 있어요 고마워요, 밤바잔
정말 기분이 나아지네요

Subtitle: [Tahani] Yet another lie.
Translation:
이것도 거짓말이네요
당신이 그린 게 아니잖아요

Subtitle: You didn't paint this. You got Janet to do it.
Translation:
이것도 거짓말이네요
당신이 그린 게 아니잖아요 재닛한테 시켰죠?

Subtitle: No, no, no, Chidi did it.
I got you an awesome painting, but then he switched it / to this one because he said you'd like it more, / and he made me memorize stuff to say to you / so you wouldn't be so sad.
Translation:
당신 주려고 좋은 그림 구했는데
치디가 이거로 바꿔버렸어요 / 당신이 이걸 더 좋아할 거라면서 / 그리고 당신이 슬퍼하지 않게 / 그리고 당신이 슬퍼하지 않게 위로의 말도 외우게 했고

Subtitle: This is all his fault. You should yell at him.
Translation:
이건 다 치디의 잘못이에요
치디한테 화내야 해요

Subtitle: Chidi helped you make me happy.
Translation:
나 기분 좋게 하라고
도와준 거잖아요

Subtitle: It's almost as if he was trying to--
Oh...
Translation: 이건 완전 치디가 날... 어머, 이런

Subtitle: Oh, my.
Of course.
This is the cool painting I made.
This guy's famous. I mean, who even are those ladies?
Translation:
이 사람 유명해요
저 여자들은 누군지도 모르잖아요

Subtitle: Yeah, it would be easier to sort out the issue of dry erase versus paper / if I could write down the pros and cons for each, / but, of course, / I would have to use one of them to write down the pros and cons / for them, which is problematic.
Translation:
화이트보드와 종이의
문제점에 대한 장단점을 적어보면
더 쉬울 거예요 / 장단점을 적어보면
더 쉬울 거예요 하지만 당연히
장단점을 적으려면 / 하지만 당연히
장단점을 적으려면 / 둘 중 하나를 골라서
써야 하니까 / 그게 또 문제가 되죠

Subtitle: Wow.
[claps] Ethics team, how's it going?
-Terribly. -Cool.
Well, you guys are kind of my last hope, so that's not great.
Translation:
두 분이 내 마지막 희망인데
썩 좋은 소식은 아니군요

Subtitle: Hey, do you mind if I borrow Professor Stomach Ache here for a second?
Translation: 맨날 배 아프다는 이 사람 좀 빌려 가도 될까요?

Subtitle: Please, take him for an hour, take all the time you want.
[Eleanor] Okay, sit down, maybe.
I dated many annoying guys, okay?
Translation:
전 이상한 남자들
정말 많이 만나봤어요

Subtitle: They would call me all times of the day / "just to talk" or ask me if I'd taken cash out of their wallets, stupid stuff.
Translation:
시도 때도 없이 전화해서
'그냥 얘기'나 하자든가 / 내가 자기 지갑에서
돈을 빼갔냐고 물어보곤 했었죠

Subtitle: And, when I stopped having fun with them, I'd leave.
Usually, wouldn't even call or anything. I'd just bounce.
Translation:
그러다 재미없어지면
난 그냥 떠났어요 전화 한 통 없이 말이에요

Subtitle: Gotta go spend that money you stole.
Point is, you are way more of a buzz kill than any of those dudes.
Okay, thanks for this conversation.
But, somehow, I never want to leave you.
Translation: 하지만 왠지 모르게 당신은 절대 떠나기 싫어요

Subtitle: I want to stay in The Good Place because of you.
Translation:
당신 때문에
굿 플레이스에 남고 싶다고요

Subtitle: Because I love you.
I think.
No, I'm pretty sure. Yeah, I love you.
Oh, that's embarrassing. [chuckles] I feel so itchy. Sorry.
Don't say anything. I just needed to get that off my chest.
Translation:
아무 말도 하지 마요 그냥 내 마음을
털어놓고 싶었어요

Subtitle: Okay, I'm gonna go. Catch you later, silly billy.
Translation:
그럼 이제 가볼게요
이따가 봐요, 멍충이

Subtitle: Ugh! Love has made me a nerd.
Translation:
그럼 이제 가볼게요
이따가 봐요, 멍충이 사랑이 날 찌질이로 만들었어

Subtitle: Bye.
Jianyu's a fake.
He's not supposed to be here. Just like your "soul mate."
Translation:
여기 있으면 안 돼요
당신 가짜 소울메이트처럼요

Subtitle: More importantly, you did the ballerina painting / 'cause you were trying to protect my feelings, / because you love me.
Translation:
중요한 건 당신이
발레리나 그림을 그렸다는 거예요 / 내 기분 상하지 않도록요 / 날 사랑하니까

Subtitle: Oh, Chidi, don't you see?
Translation:
치디, 모르겠어요?
이게 바로 이곳에 생긴

Subtitle: This is the real mistake that was made in our neighborhood.
Translation:
치디, 모르겠어요?
이게 바로 이곳에 생긴 진짜 실수였던 거라고요

Subtitle: You and I are soul mates. It makes so much sense.
-Oh, but-- -No, Chidi, true love is rare, / like a desert flower betwixt two oases, / but true love's also very simple.
Translation:
- 하지만...
- 치디, 진정한 사랑은 드물어요 / 사막의 두 오아시스 사이에 핀
꽃처럼요 / 하지만 진정한 사랑은
간단하기도 해요

Subtitle: And, right now, I'm just a girl, towering over a boy, / asking him to admit he loves me.
Translation:
난 그저 한 소녀일 뿐이에요 소년을 내려다보며 / 나에 대한 사랑을 인정하라고
부탁하는 소녀라고요

Subtitle: I feel like her confession of love / was a lot better than mine. Can I get a do-over?
Translation:
타하니의 사랑 고백이 / 내 고백보다 더 낫네요
나도 다시 해도 돼요?

Subtitle: I need to step outside... For some air, / and I will not be back for many days.
Translation:
잠깐 좀 나가야겠어요
바람 좀 쐬러 / 나 한동안 안 돌아올 거예요

Subtitle: Dude, you can't just run away. You have to...
It looks calm now, but the storm is imminent. We're--
Translation:
지금은 잠잠해 보이지만
곧 폭풍이 오겠습니다 "잭 지츄
기상학자"

Subtitle: What's up, Carson Daly? My name is Jason.
I wanna give a shout-out to all my homies up in Jacksonville.
I am not Carson Daly. I'm a weather reporter.
A hurricane is coming. You need to seek shelter.
-I'm on TV! -Okay.
Translation:
대피소를 찾아야 해요 - 나 방송 탔다!
- 됐어요

Subtitle: Hey, Janet?
Hi, there. What are you watching?
My greatest accomplishment ever.
I'm trying to cheer myself up because I'm sad.
Translation:
지금 너무 슬퍼서
기분을 좀 달래고 있어요

Subtitle: I think I might be in big trouble.
Can you bring me something that will make me not sad?
Translation:
날 안 슬프게 만들 것 좀
가져다줄래요?

Subtitle: Let me think.
Sorry that took so long.
-Here you go. -Oh, dang.
Translation: 오래 걸려서 미안해요, 여기요 이건 내가 제일 좋아하는

Subtitle: Are these from my favorite restaurant, Stupid Nick's Wing Dump?
Translation:
멍청한 닉의 윙 덤프에서 파는
닭 날개네요?

Subtitle: Stupid Nick's closed down because a pelican fell in the flash fryer.
Translation:
멍청한 닉은 문을 닫았어요
펠리컨이 튀김기에 떨어져서요 하지만 못생긴 닉의 고기라는

Subtitle: But, he opened a new place, called Ugly Nick's Meat Trench.
Translation: 하지만 못생긴 닉의 고기라는 새 식당이 문을 열었어요

Subtitle: These are an exact replica of that recipe.
Translation:
이건 멍청한 닉과
똑같은 조리법으로 만든 거고요

Subtitle: Why are you so nice to me?
Well, you were very nice to me while I was rebooting.
Also, I'm programmed to be nice to everyone.
Janet? I just realized something.
I love you.
Okay.
I have one more question for you.
So, you also love Chidi, and you just told him, / just now, right before I did?
Translation:
그러니까 치디를 사랑한다고
방금 고백했다고요? / 지금? 내 고백 바로 전에? 당신은 치디가 당신 좋아한다고
한 거지만, 아무튼 그래요

Subtitle: Technically, you told him that he loves you, but yes.
Translation:
당신은 치디가 당신 좋아한다고
한 거지만, 아무튼 그래요

Subtitle: This isn't ideal.
We must remain civil.
He's simply going to have to pick one of us, / and the loser will just have to accept her fate, with grace and equanimity.
Translation:
치디가 우리 둘 중
한 명을 선택할 거고 패자는 그냥 그 운명을
받아들이면 돼요 / 패자는 그냥 그 운명을
받아들이면 돼요 품위와 평정심을
유지하면서 말이죠

Subtitle: Maybe if you lose.
If he doesn't pick me, I'mma start throwing stuff.
Translation:
치디가 날 선택하지 않는다면
난 물건을 집어 던질 거예요

Subtitle: Classy as always.
I suppose you knew that Jianyu was a fake, didn't you?
Yes, I did.
Figured you two charlatans would sniff each other out / like two mangy rats sharing a pizza crust in a sewer--
Translation:
하수구에 떨어진
피자 끝부분이나 나눠 먹는 / 더러운 쥐새끼들처럼 사기나 치고...

Subtitle: Okay... No.
We're not gonna do this.
We are not gonna be those women who fight over a guy, / and find any excuse to rip each other apart.
Translation:
남자 하나를 두고 싸우면서
서로 헐뜯을 것만 찾아대는 / 그런 여자들이 될 순 없어요

Subtitle: I am not going to apologize for being angry.
Translation: 내가 화낸 건 사과 안 할 거예요

Subtitle: You knew that my soul mate was lying to me.
Translation:
내 소울메이트가
거짓말하는 거 알고 있었잖아요

Subtitle: Yes, I did, and I'm very sorry.
Listen, you and I have a weird, complicated, forked-up friendship, / but it's our friendship, / and I care about it. Let's do something fun.
Translation:
우리 우정은 이상하고 복잡하고 아주 개판이지만
그래도 그게 우리 우정이고 / 아주 개판이지만
그래도 그게 우리 우정이고 / 나에게는 소중해요 같이 재밌는 걸 해봐요

Subtitle: What would make you feel happy, right now?
Translation:
지금 당장 뭘 하면
기분이 좋아질까요?

Subtitle: You have a fine home, Deirdre.
I absolutely adore your chaise.
[Deirdre] I don't know bugger all about a chaise--
Translation: 전 그런 건 전혀 몰라요 이걸 변기로 쓰고 있었지 뭐예요

Subtitle: I been using this as a bloody toilet, I have.
-What's this show called, again? -[laughs] It's Deirdre and Margaret.
It ran for 16 years on the BBC. They did nearly 30 episodes.
It's about two women from very different worlds / who become friends, sort of like us.
Translation:
완전히 다른 세상에서 온
두 여자가 친구가 되는 내용이에요 / 우리처럼요

Subtitle: Oh, Deirdre, no! That's priceless art!
Translation:
데어드리, 안 돼요
이거 비싼 작품이라고요

Subtitle: I thought it was fruit, innit?
Deirdre.
-I take it the moron is me? -Well, it's not a direct parallel.
Translation: 저 멍청이가 나라는 뜻이죠? 완전히 똑같지는 않아요

Subtitle: Okay, we did your thing. Now, it's my turn.
Translation:
좋아요
당신이 좋아하는 걸 했으니 이제는 내 차례예요

Subtitle: Are you ready to take our bonding to the next level?
Translation:
우리의 우정을
한 단계 발전시켜 볼까요?

Subtitle: Oh, good, you're back.
I, uh... I know we're short on time, / but I need your help with a personal dilemma.
Translation:
네, 시간이 없는 건 알지만 / 개인적인 고민이 있어서
도움이 필요해요

Subtitle: This is about Fake Eleanor and Real Eleanor.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너와 진짜 엘리너에
관련된 일인가요?

Subtitle: Yes. Which person is my soul mate?
Real Eleanor, that's what the system determined.
-Okay. -Of course, / the system did screw up by letting Fake Eleanor in.
Translation:
- 알겠습니다
- 하지만 / 그 시스템이 가짜 엘리너를
데려오기도 했죠

Subtitle: You know, it's interesting. Fake Eleanor being selected accidentally / and then you bonding with her could have shifted the formula.
Translation:
재미있네요 실수로 가짜 엘리너가 선택된 후 / 둘이 친해진 거라면
공식이 바뀌었을 수도 있어요

Subtitle: But, it's one of those two people.
Well, I... I don't know.
I mean, the system might be so screwed up at this point, / that maybe you don't belong to either Eleanor.
Translation:
글쎄, 모르겠어요
시스템 오류가 심각하다면 지금 상황에선 누구와도
안 이뤄질 수도 있어요 / 지금 상황에선 누구와도
안 이뤄질 수도 있어요

Subtitle: -You is spreading... -What?
Your indecisiveness is infecting me like a virus.
Oh, Chidi, this could send us down a very dangerous path.
Translation:
치디, 이러다 아주 위험한 길로
빠질 수도 있어요

Subtitle: If you can't make a choice, this whole neighborhood could fall apart.
Translation:
당신이 결정을 못 내리면 굿 플레이스 전체가
무너져 내릴 거라고요

Subtitle: Okay, getting close here.
Just mulling the ethical ramifications of various soups.
Translation:
좋아요, 거의 다 됐어요 다양한 수프의 윤리적 영향을
숙고하는 중이에요

Subtitle: Oh, same old Chidi.
I can come back for a fifth time.
Yeah, you know, maybe that's smart.
-How are you? Uzo, it's been too long. -It has, it has.
Translation:
어떻게 지냈어, 우조?
진짜 오랜만이야 그렇지, 너도 알다시피

Subtitle: Look, as you know, Ellen and I are engaged.
Translation:
그렇지, 너도 알다시피 나 엘렌과 약혼했잖아
넌 내 가장 오랜 친구고

Subtitle: You're my oldest friend, and I love you like a brother, / and that's why I'd like you to not be my best man.
Translation:
나 엘렌과 약혼했잖아
넌 내 가장 오랜 친구고 널 내 형제처럼 사랑해 / 그래서 내 들러리는
네가 안 맡았으면 해

Subtitle: -Sorry? -Look, if you were my best man, / you'd have to plan the bachelor party, decide what to say in your toast, / handle problems that pop up the day of.
Translation:
- 뭐라고?
- 네가 내 들러리가 되면 / 총각 파티도 계획해야 할 거고 건배사에서 어떤 말을 할지
정해야 하고 / 당일 생기는 문제도
네가 처리해야 해

Subtitle: It would drive you up the wall.
Well, Uzo, this isn't choosing soccer teams on a playground.
Translation:
우조, 이건 운동장에서
축구팀 고르는 게 아니잖아

Subtitle: When some thing's important to me, I can make a decision. Watch.
Translation:
나한테 중요한 일이라면
나도 결정할 수 있어

Subtitle: Uh, excuse me, excuse me.
I have decided I would like / -to unequivocally order the pumpkin soup. -Perfect.
Translation:
저 결정했어요 / 저 결정했어요 정확하고 분명하게
호박 수프를 주문할게요 알겠습니다

Subtitle: You kind of want to change your order.
Yeah, I don't know what I was thinking.
Translation:
그래, 나도 내가
무슨 생각이었는지 모르겠다

Subtitle: -Yeah. -Excuse me, risotto. Risotto?
[Tahani] As much as I'm enjoying this, / shouldn't we be working on your case to try and stay here?
Translation:
이것도 재밌기는 한데 / 여기 계속 있으려면
해결책을 찾아야 하지 않아요?

Subtitle: Honestly, how am I gonna help them? They are much smarter than me.
Translation:
솔직히 내가
무슨 도움이 되겠어요? 그들이 훨씬 똑똑하잖아요
하지만 머리 꾸미는 건

Subtitle: Now, hair extensions? This is where I shine.
Translation:
그들이 훨씬 똑똑하잖아요
하지만 머리 꾸미는 건

Subtitle: You were already at almost-maximum hotness, / but now you look like a sexy, tan Rapunzel.
Translation:
내가 훨씬 잘해요 당신은 이미 거의 최고로
섹시하지만 / 이제는 태닝한 라푼젤 같잖아요

Subtitle: [sighs] The dream.
And, how exactly did you learn how to do this?
When I was 14, I had to make myself look older to get a job.
Translation:
14살 때 일자리 구하려고
늙어 보여야 했거든요

Subtitle: These were the ones I used, and they are real cheap.
Translation:
이 방법을 주로 썼죠
돈이 많이 안 들거든요

Subtitle: You're gonna want to stay away from open flames, / and altercations at outlet malls.
Translation: 앞으로 불이 있는 곳이나 / 싸움 난 곳은 피해요

Subtitle: Hey...
I'm really sorry that I didn't tell you about Jianyu, / and that you got saddled with him.
Translation:
지안유에 대해
얘기 안 한 거 미안해요 / 지안유에 대해
얘기 안 한 거 미안해요 그리고 지안유를 떠넘긴 것도요

Subtitle: Yes, that is regrettable, but...
I forgive you.
Maybe you two are soul mates.
Holy shirt. Maybe we are.
I know it seems crazy, but think about it, / Jianyu is a hot dummy, definitely my type.
Translation:
미친 소리 같지만 생각해봐요 / 섹시하고 멍청하잖아요
완전 내 스타일이에요

Subtitle: We both love to dance, we were both banned / from public transit systems in our cities.
Translation:
우리 둘 다 춤추는 걸 좋아하고
각자 살던 곳에서 / 대중교통 블랙 리스트에 올랐어요

Subtitle: I think this is the answer!
People come in pairs here, and if the system paired us up, / then maybe somehow I do belong here with him.
Translation:
여긴 쌍으로 오는 곳이잖아요
우리가 쌍으로 엮였다면 / 지안유와 같이
굿 플레이스에 있어야 하나 봐요

Subtitle: Hi, there.
Jason and I are getting married in ten minutes, / and you're invited.
Translation:
제이슨과 제가
10분 후에 결혼해요 두 분도 초대할게요 / 두 분도 초대할게요 "일정 비워 놓으세요"

Subtitle: Here, we've got your soul mate options, / Eleanor, Real Eleanor, / and a theoretical third person.
Translation:
여기 당신의
소울메이트 옵션이 있어요 / 엘리너 진짜 엘리너, 그리고
이론상의 세 번째 인물 / 진짜 엘리너, 그리고
이론상의 세 번째 인물

Subtitle: Let's call her strawberry mango twist.
Translation:
이 사람을...
딸기 망고 트위스트라고 합시다

Subtitle: Okay, close your eyes.
Think about each of the women.
Open your eyes.
-The answer is Real Eleanor. -How do you know?
I don't, but the minute I said that, / you knew instinctively whether it felt right.
Translation:
몰라요, 하지만 제가
그걸 말한 순간 / 당신은 직감적으로
이게 옳단 걸 알았잖아요

Subtitle: Well, hang on, let me think about that.
-Because it-- -No, no.
No more thinking, Chidi. Just do something.
Translation:
더 이상 생각하지 마요, 치디
그냥 뭐든 해요

Subtitle: Indecision caused you so much agony in your life, / right up to the very end.
Translation:
망설임은 당신의 인생에
많은 고통만 줬어요 / 마지막 순간까지도요

Subtitle: I had a little trouble writing my speech.
Translation:
건배사를 쓰는 데
문제가 좀 있었어

Subtitle: Um, I wrote 11 different versions.
Wedding's in 20 minutes, buddy.
Oh, boy, I mean, these run about 55 minutes a piece.
I'm really hot!
Is this air-conditioner even working?
[Uzo] Yes, it is.
You're just having a literal meltdown.
Translation:
말 그대로 녹아버려서 그래
옷도 아직 안 입었고

Subtitle: Also, you're not dressed yet, and we haven't picked up the rings.
Translation:
말 그대로 녹아버려서 그래
옷도 아직 안 입었고 우린 반지도 못 골랐다고

Subtitle: Okay, well, there's an issue there.
Uh, involving what I consider to be unfair labor practices / on the part of the jeweler.
Translation: 부당 노동 행위로 보이는 / 문제가 있었어 총각 파티도 못 했고 말이야

Subtitle: And we never had a bachelor party / because you could never settle on a location or time.
Translation:
총각 파티도 못 했고 말이야 / 네가 장소랑 시간을
못 정했으니까

Subtitle: I'm sorry.
You were right. This is too much for me.
Translation: 미안해, 네가 맞았어 이건 나한테 힘든 일이야

Subtitle: You should just leave me here and go get married.
Yeah, here's the thing, bud, / my wedding isn't for another month.
Translation: 그래, 잘 들어봐 / 결혼식은 다음 달이야

Subtitle: This was a test to see if you could handle being my best man, / and, just as I predicted, you failed, miserably.
Translation:
이건 네가 잘할 수 있을지
확인하려는 시험이었어 / 내 예상대로 넌
비참하게 실패했고

Subtitle: Oh, no. No, I mean, I'm relieved, but this is embarrassing.
Translation: 이런, 그래도 안심이다 하지만 좀 당황스럽네

Subtitle: It's okay, bud.
Obviously, I prepared for this. Let's just go have a nice night.
Translation: 난 다 예상했거든 오늘은 그냥 놀자

Subtitle: I'll buy you a beer.
Thirty minutes, Chidi?
We have been trying to pick a bar for 30 minutes.
It is literally impossible to be your friend.
You're incapable of making a single decision.
Translation:
뭐 하나 결정하는 것도
제대로 못 하잖아

Subtitle: Look, I know I can be indecisive, / but what's the harm in taking a few extra minutes / to find the perfect--
Translation:
내가 우유부단할 때도 있지만 / 완벽한 것을 찾으려고
몇 분 더 고민하는 게 / 뭐가 그렇게...

Subtitle: Chidi?
You're right. I just need to make a decision.
Translation:
당신이 맞아요
전 결정을 내려야 해요

Subtitle: I'm gonna look each of these women in the eye, trust my gut, / and figure out how I feel.
Translation:
이 여자들을 직접 만나
눈을 보면서 직감으로 / 제 감정을 알아낼게요

Subtitle: You're kidding. That worked?
Great! Go do it!
[Jianyu] Ladies and gentlemen, let's get ready to marry!
Translation:
신사 숙녀 여러분
결혼할 준비 합시다

Subtitle: Yo, check it.
[Eleanor] This is great.
At different moments during our time here, / we both thought that Tragic Mike over here was our one true love, / and now he is marrying whatever Janet is.
Translation:
여기 있는 동안
서로 다른 때에 / 우리 둘 다 저 인간이
진정한 사랑인 줄 알았는데 / 이젠 재닛이라는 저 물건과
결혼을 하다니

Subtitle: I suppose you're right. It is a bit strange.
I'd like to read a poem.
Janet, my digital queen / Janet, we can dare to dream / Send nude pics of your heart to me.
Translation:
'재닛, 나의 디지털 여왕님' / '재닛, 우린
꿈을 꿀 수 있어요' / '당신 심장 누드 사진을
보내주세요'

Subtitle: -[chokes] -Jacksonville Jaguars rule!
Jason, when I was rebooted, and I lost all my knowledge, / I was confused and disoriented, but you were always kind to me.
Translation:
제이슨, 난 재부팅되면서
모든 지식을 잃었어요 / 정말 혼란스러웠지만 당신은 항상 친절했어요

Subtitle: And, according to the central theme / of 231,600 songs, movies, poems, and novels / that I researched for these vows in the last three seconds, / that's what love's all about.
Translation:
지금 3초 동안
이 서약을 위해 조사한 / 지금 3초 동안
이 서약을 위해 조사한 231,600개의 노래, 영화
시, 그리고 소설의 / 중심 주제에 따르면 / 그게 사랑의 전부예요

Subtitle: Does anybody here object to this marriage?
-Yes, it is a terrible idea. -Of course we do. How could we not object?
-Overruled. Jason? -Mmm-hmm.
-Do you want me to be your wife? -Yeah.
-I want you to be my husband. -Tight.
So, by the power vested in me, by me, I now pronounce us husband and wife.
Translation:
- 좋아요
- 그럼 제 권한으로 우리는 이제 남편과 아내가
되었음을 선언합니다

Subtitle: We did it!
Can I kiss you, or will I be electrocuted?
Only one way to find out.
Whoo! Get some! Got get it, girl!
-I'm just going with it now. -[chuckles]
[Tahani] It's funny.
Translation:
지안유가 내 소울메이트가
아니란 걸 알고는

Subtitle: I was devastated when I found out that he wasn't my soul mate, / but now I think I've dodged a bullet.
Translation:
지안유가 내 소울메이트가
아니란 걸 알고는 가슴이 미어지는 것 같았는데
이제 보니 / 그게 천만다행이네요

Subtitle: He's a simple man.
I once watched him eat electrical tape right off the roll.
Translation:
지안유가 절연 테이프를
먹는 것도 봤어요

Subtitle: He thought it was a Fruit by the Foot that had gone bad.
Translation:
과일 맛 테이프가
상한 줄 알았대요

Subtitle: Thank you for being such a great friend to me today.
Translation:
오늘 좋은 친구가 되어줘서
정말 고마워요

Subtitle: Of course, hot stuff. I got your back.
Eleanor, hey, I just wanted to see if you'd talked to Chidi.
Uh, yeah, I did.
I mean, you don't have to tell me what you said.
Translation:
무슨 말을 했는지는
얘기할 필요 없어요

Subtitle: I just wanted to see if you're okay.
Translation:
그냥 당신이 괜찮은지
보러 온 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, man, you are a good person.
I swear, if I had known you and Tahani and Chidi on Earth, / I might have for real gotten into The Good Place.
Translation:
맹세하는데, 지구에서 당신과
타하니, 치디를 알았더라면 / 전 정말 굿 플레이스에
올 수 있었을지도 몰라요

Subtitle: Oh! Hey, it's my three favorite yogurts.
Translation:
이런 3가지 맛 요거트가 전부
여기 있었네요

Subtitle: Hey, um, about what happened earlier...
I've been kind of all over the place today.
Translation:
오늘 나한테 굉장히
많은 일이 있었어요

Subtitle: An hour ago, I thought Jianyu was my soul mate, / and the fact that that kind of made sense / means you and I could never be meant for each other.
Translation:
1시간 전엔 지안유가
내 소울메이트라고 생각했죠 / 꽤 그럴싸하기도 했고요 / 그 말은 우린
함께할 운명이 아니라는 뜻이죠

Subtitle: Plus, Jianyu's married to Janet now.
Okay.
What?
I do love you, but I think more / in a best friend, afterlife-savior kind of way.
Translation:
나 당신 정말 사랑해요 / 하지만 사후에 날 구해준
좋은 친구라는 의미에서죠

Subtitle: I'm not so much "hot for teacher"
as I am eternally grateful for "semi-cute, surprisingly ripped teacher."
Translation: 조금 귀여운 몸짱 선생님께 평생 감사하며 사는 스타일이에요

Subtitle: Chidi, I also have to apologize.
It's just that when I found out that Jianyu wasn't my soul mate, / I desperately needed something to keep me afloat, / and, well, you were the nearest lifeboat, as it were.
Translation:
지안유가 내 소울메이트가
아니란 걸 깨달았을 때 / 정말 나를 붙잡아 줄
무언가가 필요했어요 / 하필 당신이 가장 가까이 있던
구명정이었던 셈이고요

Subtitle: And, yes, we do have the sort of connection / that only two highly-educated, sophisticates could have, / but it's not true love.
Translation:
물론 교양 있는 두 고학력자가 / 공통점을 느꼈을 수는 있죠 / 하지만 그건 진정한
사랑이 아니에요

Subtitle: True love is what Janet and Jianyu have.
Yeah. What?
Oh, we would love to stay and chat, but we need to find Michael.
Translation:
계속 얘기하고 싶지만
마이클을 찾아야 해요

Subtitle: Eleanor, I think I figured out a way for you to stay.
Translation:
엘리너, 당신이
여기 있을 방법이 생각났어요

Subtitle: [gasps] Really? I'll come, too.
Now, I'm about to show you some very sensitive information.
Translation:
이제 여러분께 아주 민감한
정보를 보여드릴게요

Subtitle: Now, I'm about to show you some very sensitive information.
Translation:
이제 여러분께 아주 민감한
정보를 보여드릴게요

Subtitle: The final point totals each of you achieved / for all your actions on Earth.
Translation:
지구에서 여러분의
행동으로 얻어낸 / 점수의 총합입니다

Subtitle: Whoa, your point total was crazy high, Eleanor.
Translation:
"엘리너 셸스트롭
치디 아나곤예, 타하니 알자밀" 당신 총점 정말
미친 듯이 높네요, 엘리너

Subtitle: [laughs] Oh, sorry, "Crazy High Eleanor" was my nickname in college.
Translation:
죄송해요, '미친 약쟁이 엘리너'
제 대학 시절 별명이었어요

Subtitle: I accidentally saw these point totals when Michael / was fixing the sinkhole. It gave me an idea.
Translation:
우연히 마이클이
싱크홀을 막았을 때 / 점수를 보고
아이디어를 얻었어요

Subtitle: We will apply the formula to Eleanor's actions here / in The Good Place, and if you earn enough new points, / then we could argue that you should stay here.
Translation:
엘리너가 굿 플레이스에서 한 일을
공식에 적용하는 거예요 / 만약 그 새 점수가 충분하다면 우린 당신이 여기 있어야 한다고
주장할 수 있을 거예요 / 우린 당신이 여기 있어야 한다고
주장할 수 있을 거예요

Subtitle: -Would that work? -[Michael] Don't know, / never had to prove someone belonged here before.
Translation:
- 그게 먹힐까요?
- 모르죠 / 이전에는 누가 이곳에 속하는 걸
증명해야 했던 적이 없었어요

Subtitle: But the judge will be here soon, and this is the best way to build our case.
Translation:
하지만 판사님이 곧 올 테니
이 방법이 최선이에요

Subtitle: Now, the average point total / for a resident here is roughly 1.2 million.
Translation: 이곳 거주자들의 평균 점수는 / 대략 120만 점이에요

Subtitle: Right now, based on everything that you did on Earth, / you have -4,008.
Translation:
당신이 지구에서 했던
모든 행동을 점수화하면 / - 4,008점이네요

Subtitle: That's not great, / but I'm gonna do nice things / for every goober in this place until my point total is so high / I can rub it in all their smug faces.
Translation:
좋지는 않네요 / 하지만 난 여기에 있는
모든 멍청이들을 위해 / 선한 일을 할 거예요, 그래서
내 점수가 아주 높아지게 되면 / 그걸 그들의 우쭐해 하는
얼굴에 대고 문질러 줄 거예요

Subtitle: -[beeps] -You just lost five points.
-Hello! -Hi, how are you?
There has to be something bigger I can do than holding the door and waving.
Translation:
문 잡아주고 인사하는 것보다
더 큰 일을 할 수 있을 거 같아요

Subtitle: There's no way every Walmart greeter is in The Good Place.
Translation:
모든 월마트 문지기가 모두
굿 플레이스에 오는 건 아니잖아요

Subtitle: "Walmart"?
It's a place regular people go.

-You haven't heard of it. -Look, I know this is tedious, / but holding a door for someone is three points, / and if you do it for everyone in the neighborhood, / then that's almost 1,000 points for just a start.
Translation:
- 들어본 적 없을 거예요
- 나도 이게 지루한 거 알아요 / 하지만 누군가를 위해
문을 잡아주면 3점이에요 / 그리고 이 지역에 있는
모두를 위해 이 일을 한다면 / 1,000점 가까이 벌 수 있어요
시작으론 나쁘지 않죠

Subtitle: Besides, all the big-ticket items are impossible, I'm afraid.
Translation:
게다가, 안타깝지만 높은 점수를
주는 항목은 불가능한 것들이에요

Subtitle: It's not as if you could, / you know, "sacrifice your life to save others"
Translation:
당신이 할 수 있는 일이 아니에요 / '다른 사람을 구하기 위해
당신의 생명을 희생하라'든지

Subtitle: or "change the consciousness of a nation."
Translation:
'한 국가의 국민 의식을 바꿔라'
같은 거예요

Subtitle: Both of which I did, by the way. Such fun.
Translation:
참고로, 난 둘 다 해냈어요
너무 재미있었죠

Subtitle: Have a wonderful day.
This is pointless!
The ticker isn't even going up, and everyone's giving me the stink eye.
Translation:
측정기는 올라가지도 않았어요
다들 나를 째려보고 있고요

Subtitle: Eleanor, everyone hates you.
Well, fork you too.
No, this is good.
Now that we know, we can actually do something about it.
Translation:
이제 우리가 아니까, 이거로
뭔가를 해낼 수 있어요

Subtitle: And I am an expert at mediating conflict, / like when my friends Scary, Sporty, Posh, and Baby / had an issue with my other friend, Archbishop Desmond Tutu.
Translation:
그리고 난 분쟁 조정 전문가예요 / 내 친구 스캐리, 스포티
포시 그리고 베이비가 / 다른 친구 대주교 데스먼드 투투와
문제가 있던 때 같이 말이죠

Subtitle: Yeah, I don't know what I love more / about our morning hard-boiled egg routine, the eggs or the routine.
Translation:
그래요, 우린 매일 아침 식사로
항상 삶은 달걀을 먹는데 / 삶은 달걀이 더 좋은지
아침 식사가 더 좋은지 모르겠어요

Subtitle: [chuckles] Um, actually, this morning, there's a little surprise in yours.
Translation:
삶은 달걀이 더 좋은지
아침 식사가 더 좋은지 모르겠어요 사실 오늘 아침엔
당신 거를 보면 약간 놀랄 거예요

Subtitle: "I love you." How cute.
I love you too, egg.
Oh, no. No, Chidi, that's me saying that to you.
Translation:
오, 아니, 치디, 그건 내가
당신한테 하는 말이에요

Subtitle: I love you.
Well, that is something.
I know you've gone through a lot, / and now I'm throwing this at you, but I just...
Translation:
당신이 많은 일을 겪은 걸 알아요 / 그리고 지금 나도 당신한테
이러고 있고요, 하지만 난...

Subtitle: I had to tell you how I feel.
I love you. No need to respond.
Translation: 사랑해요, 아무 대답 안 해도 돼요

Subtitle: -Great. -Well, at some point, / you'll respond, right?
Translation:
- 좋아요
- 그래도 언젠가는 / 당신도 대답해줄 거죠?

Subtitle: I just meant no rush.
You wanna talk about eggs again?
Mmm... This isn't right.
I'm sorry, I've never kissed anyone before.
Translation:
미안해요, 전 누구와도
키스해본 적이 없어서요

Subtitle: Is one tongue okay? I can add more tongues.
Translation:
혀 하나로 괜찮나요?
혀를 더 만들 수도 있어요

Subtitle: No, that's not it.
We're married now, but we still haven't told your dad.
Translation:
우린 이제 결혼했는데 아직
당신 아빠한테 알리지 않았어요

Subtitle: Once again, Michael is not my dad, and we shouldn't tell him.
Translation:
다시 말하지만, 마이클은 아빠가
아니에요, 그에게 말하면 안 돼요

Subtitle: If Michael finds out that we're married, / then he'll know you're not Tahani's soulmate, / and then he'll know that you're really Jason and not Jianyu.
Translation:
만약 마이클이 우리가
결혼한 걸 알게 되면 / 당신이 타하니의 소울메이트가
아니라는 것도 알게 될 거고 / 그러면 당신이 지안유가 아닌
제이슨이라는 것도 알게 될 거예요

Subtitle: He'd send you to The Bad Place.
Translation:
마이클이 당신을
배드 플레이스로 보낼 거라고요

Subtitle: Hmm, I don't want to lose you, girl.
-I'm not a girl. -But also, / I'm tired of living a lie. We gotta go public.
Translation:
- 전 여자가 아니에요
- 게다가 / 난 거짓말하는 것도 싫증 났어요
사람들에게 알려야 해요

Subtitle: I hate all this hiding.
I want us to have the life we deserve.
Translation:
난 우리가 누려야 할
삶을 누리고 싶어요

Subtitle: Pillboi, let's talk big picture.
Translation: 필보이, 더 큰 그림을 얘기해 보자

Subtitle: You know I love Jacksonville.
J-town.
It's easily one of the top ten swamp cities / in northeastern Florida, but if we're gonna make it / in the DJ game, we gotta get to Miami.
Translation:
거기가 10위 안에 드는
플로리다 북동부의 / 늪지 도시인 건 맞지만
DJ로 성공하기 위해서는 / 우린 마이애미로 가야만 해

Subtitle: Oh, yeah, but Miami's expensive.
We just don't got that skrilla, B.
I mean, I got ten bucks to my name, / and I spent eight of it on this burrito, / and the other two on guac.
Translation: 내 말은 나한테 10달러 있었는데 / 이 부리토에 8달러를 썼고 / 나머지 2달러를 과카몰리에 썼어

Subtitle: I know what we gotta do.
Translation: 난 우리가 뭘 해야 하는지 알아

Subtitle: We're gonna rob this restaurant.
Great idea!
But what if we get caught?
Then we'll just get married, so that no one can testify against us.
Translation:
우리가 결혼하면 돼, 그럼 누구도
우리한테 불리한 증언 못 할 거야

Subtitle: Dope!
Yo... I got diarrhea, I'll be right back.
Translation: 이봐 설사할 거 같아, 금방 다녀올게

Subtitle: Me too. I'll race you.
[both laughing] Best friends!
Thank you all for participating in our focus group for Fake Eleanor.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너 포커스 그룹에
참여해 줘서 고마워요

Subtitle: Think of this as an open forum / for you to air any and all grievances that you may carry against her.
Translation: 이걸 공개 토론회라고 생각하고 / 그녀에 대해 가지고 있는 모든 불만을 털어놓으세요

Subtitle: I was flying on the second day, and when you caused the trash storm, / I crashed into a rotting turkey carcass, and it exploded.
Translation:
난 둘째 날에
하늘을 날고 있었어요 그리고 당신이 그 쓰레기 폭풍을
일으켰을 때 / 난 썩어가는 칠면조 사체에
충돌했고 그건 폭발까지 했어요

Subtitle: -Oh, dear. -All this / cartilage and bone got tangled up in my hair, / and its skin was all over my skin.
Translation:
- 오, 저런
- 이 모든 / 연골과 뼈가 내 머리카락에 엉켰고 / 칠면조 살은 제 피부를 뒤덮었죠

Subtitle: I didn't know where I ended and the turkey carcass began.
Translation:
내가 어디에 떨어졌는지, 칠면조
시체가 어디서 왔는지도 몰랐어요

Subtitle: Well, if it makes you feel any better, your skin looks amazing.
Translation:
이 말이 위로될지 모르겠지만
당신 피부 엄청 좋아 보여요

Subtitle: My cafe got destroyed by the giant frog, / then I reopened it and it fell into the sinkhole.
Translation:
제 카페는 거대한
개구리 때문에 무너졌고 / 그런 후에 다시 개장했는데
싱크홀에 빠져 버렸어요

Subtitle: Just like me. I fell in, too.
Who else feels that Eleanor has ruined / every moment of your existence since you arrived?
Translation:
이곳에 온 이후로 엘리너가 / 당신의 삶을 망가뜨렸다고
느낀 분들 또 있으세요?

Subtitle: Excellent. I must confer with Eleanor for a tick, / so please, just enjoy the lemonade and cookies.
Translation:
훌륭해요, 잠시 엘리너와
얘기를 해야겠어요 / 그동안 레모네이드와
쿠키를 좀 들고 계세요

Subtitle: It seems everyone's problem with me is me.
Translation:
보니까, 내가 모두의
문제인 거 같네요

Subtitle: Yes, it would appear that way.
The last moment they were happy was at my party.
Translation:
저 사람들이 행복했던
마지막 순간은 내 파티였어요

Subtitle: We have to recreate that party.
Translation: 우린 그 파티를 다시 해야 해요

Subtitle: We have to take them back to that night before I started / affecting the neighborhood, and give them a fresh start.
Translation:
내가 이 지역에 영향을 주기 전의
그 밤으로 사람들을 되돌려 놓고 / 새로운 시작을 할 수 있게
해야 해요

Subtitle: Yes, of course.
We must throw the perfect party, / or else you'll be tortured by demons forever.
Translation:
완벽한 파티를 열어야만 해요 / 그러지 않으면 당신은 영원히
악마한테 고통받게 될 거예요

Subtitle: This will be the fourth most important party I have ever thrown.
Translation:
내가 주최했던 파티 중
4번째로 중요한 파티가 될 거예요

Subtitle: Janet, there you are.
Some residents are complaining that you're not responding...
Translation:
당신이 응답하지 않는다고
일부 주민들이 불평을...

Subtitle: I'm sorry, what's going on?
Is that a wedding ring?
Yes.
I'm married.
-To whom? -Sorry, my protocol forbids me / from telling you any private information about any resident.
Translation:
- 누구하고 결혼했죠?
- 죄송해요, 제 프로그램이 / 당신에게 거주민의 개인 정보를
말하는 걸 금지하고 있어서요

Subtitle: Is it that person?
Translation:
그게 저 사람인가요?
지안유인가요, 결혼반지를 끼고

Subtitle: Jianyu, the man standing right there, also wearing a wedding band?
Translation:
그게 저 사람인가요?
지안유인가요, 결혼반지를 끼고 바로 저기 서 있는 사람요?

Subtitle: Dad...
We need to talk.
I just want to make sure that I have this right.
Translation:
제가 제대로 이해한 건지
확인하고 싶어요

Subtitle: Uh, Jianyu is not a Taiwanese monk, / but rather someone named Jason Mendoza, / a failed DJ from Jacksonville, Florida.
Translation:
지안유는 타이완
수도승이 아니라 / 제이슨 멘도사라는 이름을
가진 사람이라는 거죠 / 플로리다 주의 잭슨빌에서 온
실패한 DJ고요

Subtitle: I wasn't a failed DJ, / I was pre-successful.
Translation: 전 실패한 DJ가 아니었어요 / 성공하기 전의 DJ였죠

Subtitle: And you two are married.
Hells yeah, homey. We love each other.
She makes the bass drop...
In my heart.
And Jason is a person who was near me, / and then he asked me to marry him, / and there is nothing in my protocol / that specifically barred that from happening.
Translation:
그리고 내 옆에는 제이슨이 있었죠 / 그런 후에 나한테 청혼을 했어요 / 그리고 제 프로그램에는 특별히 / 이런 일이 일어나는 걸
금지하는 건 없어요

Subtitle: -So I agreed. -Love you too, babe.
Janet.
Please tell me how this could have happened.
Translation:
어떻게 이런 일이 일어날 수
있었는지 나한테 말해줘요

Subtitle: Unclear. As you know, each time I am updated, / I accrue new knowledge and abilities.
Translation:
명확하지 않아요, 아시다시피
제가 업데이트될 때마다 / 전 새로운 지식과 능력을 얻어요

Subtitle: My suspicion is that when I was rebooted, I bonded with Jason in a way / that I have never bonded with anyone before.
Translation:
아마 제가 재시동되었을 때
제이슨과 연결된 게 아닌가 해요 / 예전엔 그 누구와도 연결되지
않았던 방법으로 말이에요

Subtitle: I seem to have gained a new understanding of love.
Translation:
사랑에 대해 새로운
지식을 얻은 것 같아요

Subtitle: I also learned how to do this.
I will speak to you later. Go to your void.
-Okay. -[tone chimes]
-No, Janet, come back! -[tone chimes]
-Hi there. -Go.
-Sure thing. -[tone chimes]
-No! -Stop doing that.
-[tone chimes] -Me?
-Go! -Goodbye.
-Janet, come back. -I love you.
I love you too!
That is Sachveer, / and his problem with me is...
Translation: 이 사람은 사치비어고 / 나 때문에 일어난 일은...

Subtitle: Oh, one of the giraffes tried to hump him.
Translation:
기린 중 하나가
이 사람이랑 교미하려 했어요

Subtitle: [snickers] It's gonna be hard to keep a straight face tonight.
Translation:
오늘 밤에 얼굴 똑바로
보기 힘들겠는 걸요

Subtitle: Hey, can I ask your advice on something?
Are you sure, dude?
Isn't there someone else better you could ask, / like literally anyone else?
Translation:
조언을 구할 더 나은
사람이 있지 않나요? / 말 그대로 누구든지?

Subtitle: Well, it's a sensitive matter, and you... You do know me pretty well.
Translation:
이건 민감한 문제예요
그리고 당신은... 날 잘 알잖아요 그래서 문제는, 진짜 엘리너가
날 사랑한다고 했어요

Subtitle: So, here it is. Real Eleanor said she loves me.
Translation:
그래서 문제는, 진짜 엘리너가
날 사랑한다고 했어요

Subtitle: Hey, man, nice pull. She's a great person.
I don't know what to do.
I mean, we are soulmates, so I probably do love her, / but then again, how do I know if my motivation is correct?
Translation:
내 말은, 우린 소울메이트예요
그래서 아마 그녀를 사랑할 거예요 / 하지만 그렇다면 내 동기가
옳다는 걸 내가 어떻게 알까요?

Subtitle: Maybe I think I'm supposed to love her, / but if I tell her that I love her for the wrong reasons, it won't mean anything.
Translation:
내가 엘리너를 사랑해야
한다고 생각할 수도 있지만 / 잘못된 이유로 그녀를 사랑한다고
말하면, 아무 의미가 없잖아요

Subtitle: You have a tendency to over-think things.
Translation:
당신은 너무 생각이
지나친 경향이 있어요

Subtitle: Turn off that giant brain, and just say you love her too.
Translation:
그 거대한 뇌를 좀 멈추고
그냥 당신도 사랑한다고 해요

Subtitle: -You think? -If this were some / random person you hooked up with at a Diamondbacks game / in the parking lot behind the port-a-potties--
Translation:
- 그렇게 생각해요?
- 만약 이 사람이 그냥 / 다이아몬드백스 경기에 갔다가
간이 화장실 뒤의 주차장에서 / 처음 만나 시간을 보낸 아무나라면

Subtitle: Not based on a real example... I would say keep mulling, / but this is your soulmate.
Translation:
진짜 있었던 일은 아니지만
심사숙고하라고 할 거예요 / 하지만 이 사람은
당신의 소울 메이트예요

Subtitle: She's universe-approved.
Tell her you love her.
Hey, your score just went up 20 points.
Yeah, 'cause I give great advice.
Translation:
그래요, 내가 좋은
조언을 했기 때문이에요

Subtitle: Now maybe you'll finally listen to me and take off those glasses.
Translation:
이제 당신이 드디어 내 말을 듣고
그 안경을 벗을 것 같군요

Subtitle: We are in the afterlife, dummy, nature's Lasik.
Translation:
우린 사후 세계에 있어요, 바보 씨
자연이 해준 라식이라고요

Subtitle: Okay. I think I figured this out.
Translation:
좋아요, 이게 어떻게 된 건지
알아낸 거 같군요

Subtitle: There is a real Jianyu, a Taiwanese monk / who took an oath of silence at the age of eight.
Translation:
진짜 타이완 수도승
지안유가 있어요 / 8살에 침묵 서약을 했네요

Subtitle: But, three months ago, / he went into such a deep meditative state that he registered as dead, / and when you died at that exact same moment, / our system mistook you for him...
Translation:
하지만 3달 전에 / 너무 깊은 명상에 들어가서
사망한 거로 등록이 됐어요 / 그리고 바로 그때 당신이 죽었고 / 우리 시스템이 당신을
지안유로 오인한 거예요

Subtitle: Perhaps because you share the exact same IQ.
Translation:
아마도 당신이 정확히 똑같은
IQ를 가졌기 때문일 거예요

Subtitle: -Cool. -No, not cool.
He stopped learning at the age of seven.
Okay. So, now, this is sort of a quick litmus test, / basic questions designed to tell whether you were / fundamentally good or bad.
Translation:
좋아요, 이제 이건 일종의
빠른 리트머스 테스트예요 / 당신이 근본적으로
좋은 사람인지 나쁜 사람인지 / 알 수 있도록 만들어진
기본적인 질문들이에요

Subtitle: Number one. Did you ever commit a serious crime?
Translation:
첫 번째 질문, 당신은 중한 범죄를
저지른 적이 있나요?

Subtitle: Yes. I blew up a guy's speedboat after he sued me.
Translation:
네, 어떤 사람이 날 고소해서
그의 쾌속정을 폭파했어요

Subtitle: -[beeps] -And...
I stole an old lady's fake leg once on a dare.
Translation:
한 번 도전 삼아 어떤 할머니의
의족을 훔친 적이 있어요

Subtitle: Did you ever have a personalized license plate?
Translation:
당신은 맞춤 번호판을
가져 본 적이 있나요?

Subtitle: Yeah, dawg. "I love butts".
Have you ever paid money to hear music performed / by California funk-rock band the Red Hot Chili Peppers?
Translation:
음악을 듣기 위해
돈을 쓴 적이 있나요? / 캘리포니아의 펑크 록 밴드인
레드 핫 칠리 페퍼스의

Subtitle: Yo, the Chilis?
-I saw them in concert like 50 times. -[beeps]
I once got arrested trying to steal Flea's bass guitar.
Translation:
한번은 플리의 베이스 기타를
훔치려다가 체포된 적도 있죠

Subtitle: Oh, that was another serious crime I committed.
Translation:
오, 이건 내가 저지른
또 하나의 중한 범죄였어요

Subtitle: -I should have mentioned that earlier. -[beeps]
Is it just me, or am I acing this test?
Translation:
나만 그런가요? 아니면 내가
이 시험을 잘 치고 있는 건가요?

Subtitle: Oh, this is bad.
Oh, this is so, so bad.
Oh, I thought I had everything under control / when I found Eleanor, but somehow, you are...
Translation:
난 모든 게 내 통제하에
있다고 생각했어요 / 내가 엘리너를 찾았을 때는 말이죠
하지만 어쩐지 당신은

Subtitle: You're so much worse.
No, don't... Don't touch...
How does that still work?
Everything's gonna be fine, homey. I promise.
I don't know, B. What if it doesn't work?
Translation:
나도 모르겠어
이게 안 되면 어떻게 하지?

Subtitle: Hey, we thought of everything, except for an alibi / and an escape route, but we'll figure it out as we go.
Translation:
이봐, 우린 모든 걸 준비했어
알리바이하고 도주로를 / 빼곤 말이야, 하지만
하다 보면 알게 될 거야

Subtitle: You don't wanna over-think these things.
Translation:
이런 걸 가지고 너무
깊게 생각하지 마

Subtitle: -I'm kinda freaking out here. -Pillboi, I got you.
Translation:
- 나 지금 미칠 것 같아
- 필보이, 내가 있잖아

Subtitle: This plan is foolproof.
And when it's over, we can finally have the lives we deserve.
Translation:
그리고 이게 끝나면, 우린 마침내
우리가 누려야 할 삶을 살 수 있어

Subtitle: Di Giorno!
[in fake accent] I am a safe installer here to install-a da safe.
Translation:
여기 금고를 설치하러 온
금고 설치기사예요

Subtitle: So just-a point to where the guacamole money is, / and I'll install-a the safe in the, how you say, place?
Translation:
그러니까 과카몰리 판 돈이
어디 있는지 가리켜만 줘요 / 그럼 제가 이 금고를 설치할게요
뭐라고 하죠? 그 장소에 말이죠

Subtitle: Yeah, hi, we're being robbed.
J, they're on to us, man.
His hat's a golf ball, and he's a got a terrible mustache.
Translation:
골프공 패턴 모자를 쓰고
끔찍한 콧수염이 있어요

Subtitle: We need to get married now.
I do, for always and forever.
I do!
Eleanor, for an utter novice, you have thrown a lovely party.
Translation:
엘리너, 완전 초보치고는
멋진 파티를 열었네요

Subtitle: Well, thanks, but it's not working.
Not one more point.
What the fork?
[Tahani] Oh, look, Michael's here. He can help.
Translation:
봐요, 마이클이 왔어요
그가 도와줄 수 있을 거예요

Subtitle: Michael. Would you do us the honor of saying a few words?
Translation:
마이클, 우리에게 몇 마디
해주시면 큰 영광일 거예요

Subtitle: I don't know that I'm in the right frame of mind.
Please, they'll listen to you. Just pay me a few compliments.
Translation:
부탁이에요, 사람들이
당신 말은 들을 거예요 그냥 제 칭찬 조금 해주세요

Subtitle: You know, I'm great, heart of a champion, basically your muse, you get it.
Translation:
난 대단하고 챔피언의 마음을
가진 당신의 뮤즈라고요, 알겠죠

Subtitle: Attention, everyone. Michael would like to say a few words.
Translation:
모두 주목해주세요, 마이클이
몇 마디 하고자 합니다

Subtitle: Hello, everyone. Good to see you all here, / mingling around with your various secrets.
Translation:
안녕하세요, 여기서 여러분을
보니까 다들 반가워요 / 여러분의 다양한 비밀과
함께 어우러져서 말이죠

Subtitle: Who really knows which of you are who you say you are.
Translation:
당신이 주장하는 당신이
진짜인지 어떻게 알까요?

Subtitle: No way to know unless I pull your skeletons out, right?
Translation:
내가 여러분 뼈를 끄집어내지 않는
이상 알 수가 없어요, 그렇죠?

Subtitle: Okay.
Take her easy.
Yes. Well said.
Now, we shall hear from tonight's featured guest.
Translation:
이제 오늘 밤 특별 손님의
말을 들어볼까요?

Subtitle: She's kind, she's humble, / she's the Walmart of friends.
Did I use that word right?
Eleanor Shellstrop.
Hi, everyone, I'm Eleanor. Uh... Original flavor, not new and improved.
Translation:
안녕하세요, 여러분
엘리너입니다 원래 그대로예요, 새롭거나
개량되지 않았죠

Subtitle: I know a lot of bad stuff has happened because of me, / but I never meant to hurt you.
Translation:
저 때문에 많은 나쁜 일이
일어난 거 알아요 / 하지만 결코 여러분을
다치게 할 의도는 아니었어요

Subtitle: So, if I caused you any harm, / I'm truly sorry.
Translation:
그래서 만약 제가
어떤 손해를 끼쳤다면 / 진심으로 사과드릴게요

Subtitle: That's nice, Eleanor, but I still crashed into a turkey carcass.
Translation:
친절하시네요, 하지만 내가 칠면조
사체와 충돌한 사실은 그대로예요

Subtitle: And I fell into a sinkhole.
And my dog got kicked into the sun.
Translation:
그리고 내 개는 차여서
태양 속으로 날아갔죠

Subtitle: What can you possibly say to us that'll make up for your actions?
Translation:
당신의 행동을 만회하기 위해
무슨 말을 할 수 있겠어요?

Subtitle: Pobody's nerfect?
"Pobody's nerfect"? That's hilarious.
Like "nobody's perfect," but the letters switched.
-That's very funny. -It's nerfect!
Eleanor, great job tonight.
Have you checked the, uh, ticker? I could really use some good news.
Translation:
측정기는 확인했어요?
좋은 소식이 너무 간절해요

Subtitle: Okay.
[groans] Come on.
Well, the nightmare continues. The nightmare continues.
How did this not work?
There's no way to increase my point total / because everything I'm doing is out of self-preservation.
Translation:
내 총점을 올릴 방법이 없어요 / 내가 하는 모든 일은 자기보호를
위한 일이기 때문이에요

Subtitle: I don't understand. My motivation is corrupt.
Translation:
- 이해가 안 돼요
- 내 동기가 순수하지 않아요

Subtitle: Even when I do nice things, I'm only doing them / so I can get something out of it, / the ability to stay here, / which means none of this had any real moral value.
Translation:
내가 좋은 일을 할 때조차도
내가 그걸 하는 유일한 이유는 / 거기서 뭔가를 얻을 수 있기를
바라기 때문이에요 / 여기에 남는 거요 / 그 말은 지금까지 한 건
진짜 도덕적 가치가 없단 의미예요

Subtitle: It doesn't count.
Holy shirt.
I know what I have to do.
Okay, I am almost done with these personalized / "I'm sorry" notes to everyone in the neighborhood.
Translation:
좋아요, 거의 다 됐어요
난 이 지역 모든 사람에게 / 각 사람에게 맞춰서 쓴
사과편지를 보낼 거예요

Subtitle: I need you guys to deliver everyone their notes, / along with those T-shirts.
Translation:
여러분이 모두에게
이 편지들을 전달해줘요 / 이 티셔츠를 입고요

Subtitle: Well, granted, these are hilarious but how is this going to help?
Translation:
이게 웃긴다는 건 인정해요 "사람한 완벽은 없다" 하지만 이게 어떻게
도움이 된다는 거예요?

Subtitle: Just trust me.
I'm gonna get the points.
Oh, good morning, Dad. Where you been?
Oh, just walking around, contemplating my failure, / wishing for the sweet release of eternal extinction.
Translation:
아, 그냥 산책 좀 했어요
내 실패를 생각하면서 / 영원한 죽음의 달콤한
해방감을 소망하면서요

Subtitle: -Cool. -[sighs]
Hey...
Why don't you want me to see Janet?
Translation:
왜 제가 재닛 만나는 걸
싫어하세요?

Subtitle: I'm a good guy.
All I want is to give Janet the life she deserves.
Translation:
제가 원하는 건 그저 재닛이
누려야 할 삶을 주는 것이에요

Subtitle: Janet is not built for human life, / and I'm not sure you're much of a provider.
Translation:
재닛은 인간의 삶을 누리라고
만들어진 게 아니에요 / 그리고 당신이 그걸 줄 수 있는
사람인지 모르겠어요

Subtitle: Do you even remember how you died?
No, not really. It's a little fuzzy.
Translation:
아뇨, 잘 안 나요
조금 희미해요

Subtitle: You and your friend Pillboi were trying to rob a restaurant.
Translation:
당신이랑 당신 친구 필보이가
식당을 털려고 했죠

Subtitle: Pillboi!
And then the cops showed up.
So the plan was to pretend to install a safe / with your friend hiding inside it.
Translation:
그래서 그 계획이란 게
당신 친구가 안에 숨어있는 / 금고를 설치하는 척
하려 했단 거군요

Subtitle: He pops out, steals the money from the restaurant, / gets back in the safe, then you come in and uninstall it.
Translation:
그럼 그 친구가 튀어나와서
식당에 있는 돈을 훔치고 / 다시 금고 안으로 들어가면
당신이 들어와 그걸 해체하죠

Subtitle: I refuse to discuss my Fifth Amendment rights / until I concur with your attorney.
Translation:
난 나의 묵비권에 대해
논의하길 거부합니다 / 내가 당신의 변호사와
합의할 때까지 말이에요

Subtitle: Sure.
Look, we found your buddy's plans.
Translation:
그런데, 우린 당신 친구의
계획을 알아냈어요

Subtitle: We know he was the... Brains.
You were just an accomplice.
If you get lucky, you might get probation.
Translation:
당신은 운이 좋다면
보호 관찰로 끝날 겁니다

Subtitle: -Jason going to jail? -No, man.
Jason's dead. He suffocated in that safe.
There were no airholes.
Plus he did a bunch of whippits while he was in there, / which couldn't have helped.
Translation:
게다가 그 안에서
웃음 가스를 너무 마셨어요 / 그건 전혀 도움이 안 됐죠

Subtitle: At least he died doing what he loved...
Translation:
최소한 제이슨은 자기가
좋아하는 걸 하면서 죽었네요...

Subtitle: A bunch of whippits.
Now he's never gonna get the life he truly deserved.
Translation:
이제 제이슨은 진정 자기가
누렸어야 할 삶을 못 얻겠군요

Subtitle: Meh, I think he got roughly what he deserved.
Translation:
난 그가 필요한 만큼은
누렸다고 생각해요

Subtitle: I suffocated to death in a safe?
I'm a moron.
Hey, Janet?
-[tone chimes] -Hey, there.
-Janet, you need to leave me. -Why?
Translation:
- 재닛, 당신은 날 떠나야 해요
- 왜요?

Subtitle: You're the smartest girl in the world...
-I'm not a girl. -...and your dad is an angel.
Translation:
- 난 여자가 아니에요
- 그리고 당신 아빠는 천사고

Subtitle: I mean, what a family.
I'm just a dope who died in a safe with a snorkel...
Translation:
난 그저 금고에서 죽은 멍청이죠
스노클을 하고 말이에요...

Subtitle: Who's only now realizing why that didn't work.
You should be with someone better. I don't deserve you.
Translation:
당신은 더 나은 사람과
함께 해야 해요 난 당신과 어울리지 않아요

Subtitle: Jason, you are all that I care about, / possibly because I did not have the capacity to care / about anything before you.
Translation:
제이슨, 난 당신 외에 다른 것엔
관심이 없어요 / 아마도 당신이 오기 전엔
내가 그 어떤 것에도 / 관심을 가질 능력이
없었기 때문이겠죠

Subtitle: I love you.
Also, interesting sidenote, I think I might hate things now, too.
Translation:
또 흥미로운 사실은, 이젠 뭔가를
싫어할 수도 있는 것 같아요

Subtitle: So far, it's genocide, and leggings as pants.
Translation:
지금까지는, 집단 학살과
바지처럼 입는 레깅스가 싫어요

Subtitle: This is nuts! Just weighing in over here.
Translation: 이건 미친 짓이에요 그냥 정신 나갔어요

Subtitle: This is bonkers.
Okay, I have to go reboot Janet.
-Why? -It's the only thing / I can think of to do to get rid of this glitch.
Translation:
- 왜요?
- 이렇게 하는 게 / 이 결함을 없애기 위해 생각할 수
있는 유일한 방법이에요

Subtitle: Yo, who you calling a glitch?
It means "error," Jason, which is what this is.
Translation:
그건 '오류'라는 뜻이에요, 제이슨
이게 바로 오류죠

Subtitle: Oh, really? Is it an error to act unpredictably and behave in ways / that run counter to how you were programmed to behave?
Translation:
정말요? 예측하지 못한
행동을 하고 프로그램된 행동에 / 반하는 방식으로 행동하는 게
오류라고요?

Subtitle: Yes.
Now, you two sit tight.
I'm gonna go murder Janet, and I'll be right back.
Look on the bright side.
When you're rebooted, / I can teach you all the Dorito flavors again.
Translation:
당신이 재시동되면 / 내가 도리토스 모든 맛을
다시 가르쳐줄 수 있어요

Subtitle: No. I'm not starting over.
Translation:
아뇨, 난 다시 시작하지
않을 거예요

Subtitle: What if he reboots me, and we fall out of love?
Translation:
마이클이 날 재시동했는데
우리가 사랑하지 않으면 어떡하죠?

Subtitle: We have to get out of here right now.
Translation: 우린 지금 당장 여길 떠나야 해요

Subtitle: Where do you suppose she is?
I hope she's okay.
You know, the more I work on her case, the more I think she truly belongs here.
Translation:
엘리너 경우를 보면 볼수록 그녀가
여기 속한다는 생각이 더 들어요

Subtitle: I'm... I'm sorry that I haven't been able to say...
Translation:
미안해요
난 그 말을 할 수 없었어요

Subtitle: What you want me to say, because I do want to say it.
Translation:
당신이 내게서 듣고 싶은 말요
내가 자발적으로 하길 바라는 말

Subtitle: What's holding you back?
Honestly, my biggest fear is just making sure / that my motivation for saying it...
Translation:
솔직히 말하면
나의 가장 큰 두려움은 / 그 말을 하는 나의 동기가...

Subtitle: Chidi?
-Wow. -How did she suddenly--
Her motivation changed.
She couldn't earn enough points by apologizing to everyone here / because she was only doing it to earn enough points to stay here.
Translation:
여기 있는 모두에게 사과만 해서는
충분한 점수를 얻을 수 없었어요 / 여기 있기 위해 충분한 점수를
버는 것만이 목적이었으니까요

Subtitle: But she did earn enough points, / which means that she's decided not to stay here, / -which means-- -That she's leaving.
Translation:
하지만 그녀는 충분한
점수를 벌었어요 / 그 말은 엘리너가 여기 머물지
않기로 결정했다는 거고 / - 그 말은...
- 엘리너가 떠나고 있다는 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, hey, Janet. I was just about to call you / to ask you to get me a train to The Bad Place.
Translation:
재닛, 지금 막 부르려고 했어요 / 배드 플레이스로 가는 기차에
데려다줄 수 있나 부탁하려고요

Subtitle: -Whoa, what? -You have to be a good person / to stay here, and I can't become a good person unless I leave.
Translation:
- 뭐라고요?
- 내가 좋은 사람이 돼야만 / 여기 있을 수 있어요, 내가 떠나지
않으면 좋은 사람이 될 수 없어요

Subtitle: You don't belong here, Jason doesn't belong here, / and now that I can think and feel, I don't belong here either.
Translation:
당신은 여기 속하지 않고
제이슨도 여기 속하지 않아요 / 그리고 이제 나도 여기
속하지 않은 것 같아요

Subtitle: Where are you going with this?
There is a woman named Mindy St. Claire who lives in a neutral zone by herself.
Translation:
민디 세인트 클레어라는 여자가
혼자 중립 지역에 살아요

Subtitle: It's neither a Good Place nor a Bad Place.
Translation:
굿 플레이스도
배드 플레이스도 아닌 곳이죠

Subtitle: A Medium Place?
Dude, that's where I belong. I've been saying that since day one.
Translation:
거기가 내가 있을 곳이에요
내가 첫날부터 그 말을 했다고요

Subtitle: It's where Jason and I are going.
Would you like to come with us to Mindy's house?
Yeah! Let's go hang with Mindy.
That sounds great. Love her, huge fan.
Translation:
완전 좋아요, 그녀가 좋아요
민디의 열성 팬이에요

Subtitle: -Call the train. -Look, there it is now.
I did not call that train.
That train belongs to Shawn, the judge, who's coming here to judge you.
Translation:
저건 숀의 기차예요, 판사죠
당신을 재판하러 오는 거예요

Subtitle: Can you make that train go to Mindy's house?
Translation:
저 기차를 민디의 집으로
가게 할 수 있나요?

Subtitle: -Yep. -Then we have to go right now.
Translation:
- 네
- 우리 지금 당장 가야 해요

Subtitle: I just have to run home real quick and hit "save"
Translation:
집에 진짜 빨리 뛰어가서
하고 있던 미식축구 게임

Subtitle: on the Madden game I was playing because Blake Bortles / has, like, 300 yards passing in the first half--
Translation:
저장하고 오면 안 될까요?
왜냐면 블레이크 보틀스가 / 전반전에 300야드 패스를...

Subtitle: Shawn? Ooh.
-Michael. -Sorry I wasn't here to greet you.
I had something I needed to tend to, but it can wait, it can wait.
Translation:
처리해야 할 일이 있었어요
하지만 나중에 해도 돼요

Subtitle: Okay, I've hacked into the mainframe.
-[sighs] -Kidding. [chuckles]
I can't hack into the mainframe. Technically, I am the mainframe.
Translation:
메인 시스템은 해킹할 수 없어요
기술적으로 내가 메인 시스템이죠

Subtitle: Would you just hurry up?
I'm here to rule on the fate of Fake Eleanor Shellstrop.
Translation:
난 가짜 엘리너 셸스트롭의
운명을 판결하러 왔어요

Subtitle: Yes, yes. Um, I think we have a rock-solid case for Fake Eleanor.
Translation:
네, 우린 가짜 엘리너에 유리한
탄탄한 논거가 있다고 생각해요

Subtitle: I truly believe she's a good person.
Translation:
저는 진정으로 엘리너가
좋은 사람이라고 믿습니다

Subtitle: Are you sure?
Because I believe she's stealing my train.
Translation:
왜냐면 엘리너가 제 기차를
훔치고 있거든요

Subtitle: I'm sorry, Michael.
Sorry, everyone.
Well...
♪ And now, the end is near ♪
♪ And now, the end is near ♪
-Ow! What the hell? -Walk it off, Lululemon.
♪ I'll say it clear ♪
Translation:
"세일 '마지막 기회, 유효 기간
조금 지난 칵테일새우, 99센트'"

Subtitle: ♪ Of which I'm certain ♪
♪ A life that's full ♪
Translation:
"'셀러브리티 베이비 성형 참사'
망가진 아기 얼굴"

Subtitle: ♪ I've traveled each... ♪
[scoffs] "Live every day like it's your last..."
Bite me. I'ma live forever, bitch.
Ma'am? It's, uh, $132.21.
-So, big plans this weekend? -Yep.
Translation: 이번 주말에 큰 계획 있나 봐요 네

Subtitle: I'm gonna sit alone in my house watching wedding fails on YouTube, / drinking margaritas through a Twizzlers straw / until I pass out on top of my vibrator.
Translation:
집에서 혼자 자위 기구 위에서 유튜브에서 실패한
결혼식이나 보면서 / 유튜브에서 실패한
결혼식이나 보면서 정신을 잃을 때까지 트위즐러
빨대로 마가리타나 마시려고요 / 정신을 잃을 때까지 트위즐러
빨대로 마가리타나 마시려고요

Subtitle: Hi, there. Do you have a second to talk about the environment?
No. Buzz off, whale-humper.
You know, I see you here all the time, / and you're always mean to me, and it really hurts my feelings.
Translation:
"청정에너지 운동가" 저기요, 여기서
매번 당신을 볼 때마다 / 저한테 못되게 구시는데
정말 상처받네요

Subtitle: It does? Because the minute you're out of my line of sight, / I literally forget you exist.
Translation:
그래요? 왜냐면 당신이 제 눈앞에서만 사라지면 당신이
있었는지도 기억나지 않거든요 / 제 눈앞에서만 사라지면 당신이
있었는지도 기억나지 않거든요

Subtitle: Watch. You exist. You don't exist.
You're bothering me. Don't care if you die.
Translation:
날 짜증 나게 한다
당신이 죽든 말든 상관 안 한다

Subtitle: -See? -Why are you like this?
Excuse me? Why am I like this?
You don't know me, dude. You don't know what I'm like.
Translation:
넌 날 모르잖아
내가 어떤 사람인지 모른다고

Subtitle: Look what you made me do, jag-off.
[woman] Oh, my God, look out!
Oh, good, you're awake.
Can I ask you a question about where we're going?
Translation:
우리가 가는 곳에
대해 물어봐도 돼요?

Subtitle: Sure.
-Where are we going? I forgot. -[sighs]
We're going somewhere that's not The Good Place, / and it's not The Bad Place.
Translation:
우린 굿 플레이스도
배드 플레이스도 / 아닌 곳으로 가는 중이에요

Subtitle: We're going to a Medium Place.
Hmm. Is there a 7-Eleven on the way? 'Cause Janet's powers aren't working, / and I want some gum, and some football cards, and some scratchy tickets.
Translation:
가는 길에 세븐일레븐이 있을까요?
재닛의 능력이 먹히지 않는 데다가 / 껌이랑 축구 카드랑 복권 좀 사고 싶어요

Subtitle: -Go away from me. -Okay.
Can this train go any faster, Janet?
Translation:
재닛, 이 기차 더 빨리
갈 수 없어요?

Subtitle: No pressure, but Jason and I will literally be tortured / for all of eternity if we get caught.
Translation:
뭐라 하는 건 아니지만
제이슨과 나는 붙잡히면 / 영원히 고문받게 돼요

Subtitle: Don't worry, there's no way to tell we're going to Mindy St. Clair's house.
Translation:
걱정 마세요, 우리가 민디 집으로
간다는 걸 알 방법은 없어요

Subtitle: It'll be our sexy little secret.
Translation:
우리의 섹시한 작은
비밀이 될 거예요

Subtitle: Jason taught me about sexy things.
Oh, yeah? What things did he say were sexy?
Translation:
오, 그래요? 어떤 게
섹시하다고 하던가요?

Subtitle: Lamborghinis, cool snakes, spinning rims, 20,000 followers on Instagram, / girls with pigtails eating lollipops, / latex pants, Carl's Jr. ads, and sex.
Translation:
람보르기니, 유명인사들, 도는 림
인스타그램 팔로워 2만 명 / 막대사탕을 먹는 땋은 머리 소녀 / 라텍스 바지, 칼스 주니어 광고
그리고 섹스요

Subtitle: Hmm. Some of those are right.
I'm here to preside over case number 00003
Translation:
저는 엘리너 셸스트롭의
영혼에 대한 00003번 사건을

Subtitle: regarding the soul of Eleanor Shellstrop.
The Bad Place has sent Bad Janet to present their argument.
Translation:
배드 플레이스에서 그들의 주장을
펼치기 위해 나쁜 재닛을 보냈어요

Subtitle: What up, ding-dongs? Yeah, so basically, / um, the Fake Eleanor's a dirtbag, and these jabronis / are gonna try and claim she's less of a dirtbag now, / but she just stole your train, and she still sucks bad.
Translation:
안녕, 멍청이들?
그래, 그래서 기본적으론 / 가짜 엘리너는 개차반이야
그리고 여기 바보들이 / 엘리너가 덜 개차반이라고
주장하려고 할 거지만 / 엘리너는 방금 당신 기차를 훔쳤고
여전히 아주 나빠

Subtitle: And she belongs with us. Oh, also, check this out.
Translation:
그리고 엘리너는 우리에게 속해
오, 그리고 이걸 봐

Subtitle: Nailed it.
I've ruled the fart inadmissible as evidence.
What I will consider is the recent development / -of Eleanor stealing my train. -Now, hold on a second.
Translation:
저는 엘리너가
제 기차를 훔쳤다는 / - 최근 사실만 고려할 겁니다
- 잠깐만요

Subtitle: She stole your train to voluntarily go down to The Bad Place.
Translation:
엘리너는 배드 플레이스로 가려고
당신 기차를 훔쳤어요

Subtitle: She was sacrificing herself because she is a wonderful, selfless...
Translation:
엘리너는 훌륭하고 이타적이라
자신을 희생하고 있었어요

Subtitle: No, don't... Oh!
-What's happening? -I should have warned you.
Shawn only cares about cold hard facts.
If he detects any feelings in your voice, he retreats into a cocoon, / so what we need to do now is just be very still and very quiet.
Translation:
당신의 목소리에서
어떠한 감정이라도 느끼면 고치 안으로 숨어버리죠
그러니 우린 이제 / 고치 안으로 숨어버리죠
그러니 우린 이제 아주 가만히
정말 조용히 있어야 해요

Subtitle: Finally.
-Oh, come... -What did he just say?
Oh, because you're all so perfect.
[Eleanor] Wow.
This is truly nothing.
-So where does this Mindy St. Clair live? -[Janet] I don't know.
Translation:
그래서 민디 세인트 클레어가
어디 산다는 거죠? 저도 몰라요, 지역 밖으로
나와 있어서 나는 아무런

Subtitle: I'm out of range of our neighborhood. I don't have / -any of my normal abilities here. -Perfect.
Translation:
저도 몰라요, 지역 밖으로
나와 있어서 나는 아무런 / - 정상적인 능력이 없어요
- 완벽하군요

Subtitle: Well, let's try this way.
Mmm. I've never had to walk before. This is fun.
Translation:
전 걸어본 적이 한 번도 없어요
이건 재밌네요

Subtitle: Now I'm bored. Walking is dumb.
Translation:
이제 지겹네요
걷는 건 멍청한 짓 같아요

Subtitle: [Eleanor] Well, given that she's the only person / in the neighborhood, I'm guessing this is the pl...
Translation:
음, 민디가 이 지역의 / 유일한 주민이라는 걸
생각해보면 이건...

Subtitle: Oh! She's naked!
-[screams] -Oh, sorry!
Who are you?
I'm Janet.
Hello, Mindy. My name is Beadie.
I'm from The Good Place, and welcome to your first day / -in the afterlife. -What's up, idiot?
Translation:
전 굿 플레이스에서 왔습니다
그리고 당신의 사후 세계 / - 첫날을 축하해요
- 뭐해, 멍청아?

Subtitle: Sorry I'm late, babe. Hey, are you pregnant?
-[sighs] That's not possible. -Congrats.
Yeah, so, Mindy, look. You mostly sucked, / but then you did this one good thing.
Translation:
그래, 민디, 들어봐
넌 대부분 엿 같지만 / 넌 딱 한 가지 좋은 일을 했어

Subtitle: I mean, I still think we should get you--
Translation:
그러니까 내 생각엔
널 우리 쪽으로...

Subtitle: They didn't, but neither did we.
Translation:
데려갈 수 없어요
우리도 못 했지만요

Subtitle: A compromise was made, / the neighborhood you are in now by yourself.
Translation:
합의가 되었어요 / 지금 당신이 사는 그곳에서
혼자 사는 거예요

Subtitle: You submitted a list of things you wanted, The Good Place provided those things.
Translation:
필요한 것의 목록을 적어 제출하면
굿 플레이스에서 물품을 제공하죠

Subtitle: Yeah, and The Bad Place made some modifications.
Translation:
그래, 그리고 배드 플레이스에선
약간의 수정 작업을 할 거야

Subtitle: -We got you your favorite beer. -Yeah, but it's always warm.
Translation:
- 당신이 좋아하는 맥주가 있어요
- 그래, 하지만 항상 따뜻할 거야

Subtitle: On your jukebox, you'll find every song ever sung.
Translation:
주크박스에선 당신이 불렀던
모든 노래를 찾을 수 있을 거예요

Subtitle: Yeah, by The Eagles, and it's only the live versions.
Translation:
그래, 하지만 이글스가 부른
라이브 버전만 들을 수 있을 거야

Subtitle: Also, there's some spoken word poetry from William Shatner.
Translation:
그리고 윌리엄 샤트너의
시 낭송도 있어

Subtitle: It's deeply terrible.
[Beadie] You get the idea. Welcome to eternal mediocrity.
Translation:
당신은 알 거예요
영원한 평범함에 오신 걸 환영해요

Subtitle: -Welcome to The Medium Place. -So what's up?
Translation:
- 미디엄 플레이스에 잘 왔어요
- 그래서 무슨 일이야?

Subtitle: What's your deal? Are you single? What's going on?
Translation:
대체 뭐가 문제야? 미혼이야?
무슨 일인데?

Subtitle: Sorry about before. [chuckles softly] One of the perks of living alone / is that I get to just walk around naked.
Translation:
아까는 죄송해요, 혼자
사는 것의 특전 중 하나는 / 발가벗고 다닐 수 있다는 거죠

Subtitle: [chuckles] My kind of gal.
And I gotta say, you keep it tight.
Oh, that is the nicest and only thing anyone has said to me in 30 years.
Translation:
이건 30년 만에 누가 내게 해준
가장 친절하고 유일한 말이네요

Subtitle: [Eleanor] So tell us everything.
I mean, what did you do to end up here?
Translation:
그럼 다 말해주세요
그러니까, 어쩌다 - 여기로 온 거예요?
- 그건 꽤 긴 이야기예요

Subtitle: That's kind of a long story.
Translation:
- 여기로 온 거예요?
- 그건 꽤 긴 이야기예요

Subtitle: Gonna need a drink or three. Definitely my kind of gal.
Translation:
- 술 한 잔 걸쳐야 할 거예요
- 완전 제 타입이네요

Subtitle: You guys have fun. This is me and Janet's honeymoon, / so we're gonna go try and figure out how to have sex.
Translation:
그럼 두 분 즐거운 시간 되세요
이건 나와 재닛의 / 신혼여행이니까 우린 가서
섹스하는 법을 알아볼래요

Subtitle: So I was a hotshot corporate lawyer in the 1980s.
Translation:
나는 80년대 아주 잘 나가는
기업 변호사였어요

Subtitle: I only cared about making money and doing cocaine / and I was pretty crappy to my family as well.
Translation:
제가 오직 신경 쓴 건
돈 버는 것과 코카인 하는 거였죠 / 제가 오직 신경 쓴 건
돈 버는 것과 코카인 하는 거였죠 그리고 가족한테도 아주
형편없었어요

Subtitle: But one night, I had an epiphany, right?
Translation:
어느 날 밤에 난
깨달았어요, 알아요?

Subtitle: I needed to do something good with my life.
Translation:
난 내 인생에 뭔가 좋은 일을
해야겠다고 생각했죠

Subtitle: So I drew up plans for this foundation that would help kids all over the world, / would advance human rights, revolutionize agriculture, / and just improve every nation and every society in every possible way. [chuckles]
Translation:
그래서 전 세계 어린이들을 도와줄
재단을 설립할 계획을 세웠어요 / 인권을 증진시키고
농업 혁명을 일으키고 / 모든 국가와 사회를 가능한
모든 방법으로 향상시킬 재단을요

Subtitle: You were pretty coked-up, huh?
Oh, yeah, man. I was flying high. It was so awesome. [laughs]
But you're not gonna believe this, I followed through.
Yeah, I woke up the next morning, I went straight to the bank, / I withdrew my life savings, / -and I was gonna start that charity. -Good for you!
Translation:
전 그 계획을 실행했어요
그래요, 다음 날 아침에 일어나서 곧장 은행으로 갔어요 / 평생 모든 돈을 인출하고
나는 그 자선단체를 / - 시작하려고 했어요
- 대단하네요!

Subtitle: And then I immediately fell into subway tracks / -and was electrocuted by the third rail. -Ooh.
Translation:
그런 후 난 즉시 지하철
선로로 떨어졌어요 / 그리고 송전용 철로에 감전사했죠

Subtitle: Honestly, not the type of rail I thought was gonna kill me.
Translation:
솔직히, 그런 철도 때문에
죽을지는 몰랐어요

Subtitle: [chuckles] 'Cause I love cocaine.
Do you have any? I'm just... I shouldn't... Do you?
Translation:
혹시 코카인 좀 있어요?
그냥... 전... 있어요?

Subtitle: -No. -Oh, yeah. I mean, I was just...
I was just kidding. It was just a joke.
I mean, who would want to do cocaine right now?
Translation:
어떤 사람이 지금 당장
코카인을 하고 싶어 하겠어요?

Subtitle: -Are you okay? -Anyway, so after I died, / uh, my sister found my plan, and, uh, she used my money / to start the Mindy St. Clair Rescue Alliance, yeah.
Translation:
- 괜찮아요?
- 어쨌든, 내가 죽은 후에 / 여동생이 제 계획을
알아냈고 제 돈을 이용해서 / 민디 세인트 클레어
구호 재단을 설립했어요

Subtitle: It's actually the largest relief aid charity in the world. [chuckles]
Translation:
사실 세계에서 가장 큰
구호물자 자선 단체예요

Subtitle: Oh, so the question was, did you get credit / for all those good person points or not?
Translation:
그러니까 문제는
그 일로 좋은 사람 점수를 / 얻었느냐는 거였군요

Subtitle: Exactly. I don't know how long my case was pending or whatever, / but when I woke up, the two sides had been fighting about me for a long time.
Translation:
정확해요, 제 사건이 얼마나 오래
보류 중이었는지 모르겠지만 / 제가 깨어났을 때, 양쪽에서 절 두고 싸우고 있었죠
오랫동안 말이에요

Subtitle: [chuckling] Like a stripper over that / last bump of coke at the party, if you know what I mean.
Translation:
스트리퍼가 파티에 남은
마지막 코카인을 / 스트리퍼가 파티에 남은
마지막 코카인을 놓고 싸우듯이 말이에요
무슨 말인지 아신다면요

Subtitle: But anyway, they finally came to this compromise, you know?
Translation:
하지만 어쨌든, 그들이 마침내
타협해서 이렇게 됐어요

Subtitle: -Well, it beats being tortured. -Hmm.
I was about to turn myself in.
No.
Yeah, there's no time for that morality nonsense, sweetheart.
Translation: 아니요, 그런 도덕성 같은 헛소리할 때가 아니에요

Subtitle: This is about survival. You gotta look out for number one.
Translation:
이건 생존이 달린 거예요
생존이 항상 1순위여야 하고요

Subtitle: Right, well, we don't have proof that it doesn't cure Alzheimer's.
Translation:
맞아요, 그게 알츠하이머를
치료할 수 없다는 증거는 없죠

Subtitle: Eleanor, we've got a surprise for you!
Yeah, thanks, but I brought my own cake.
Translation:
아, 고마워요, 제 케이크는
제가 가져왔어요

Subtitle: Oh, I know you've only worked here a few weeks, / but we have this little office tradition where we all pitch in, and then we--
Translation:
자기가 여기 온 지 몇 주 밖에
안 된 거 알지만 / 우리 모두 몸담고 있는 이곳엔
작은 회사 전통이 있지요

Subtitle: Yeah, no, I get it. It's just, I know what kind of cake I like.
Translation:
네, 아니요, 알았어요, 난 내가 무슨 케이크를 좋아하는지 알아요
그리고 리사 생일이 다음 주고요

Subtitle: Plus, it's Lisa's birthday next week, and if I let you give me a cake, / that means I gotta pitch in to get Lisa a cake / and sing to her and wear one of those dumb hats / you all are wearing right now. No, thanks.
Translation:
무슨 케이크를 좋아하는지 알아요
그리고 리사 생일이 다음 주고요 제가 그 케이크를 받아버리면 / 저도 리사에게 줄 케이크를
사는데 함께 해야 하고 / 그녀에게 노래를 불러주고
지금 여러분이 쓰고 있는 / 그 바보 같은 모자를 써야 하죠
난 사양할게요

Subtitle: This way, I don't owe you anything, you don't owe me anything. Later.
Translation:
이러면, 난 빚진 게 없고 당신들도
나한테 빚진 게 없죠, 나중에 봐요

Subtitle: What were we talking about?
What is her deal? Why is she like this?
Translation:
대체 왜 저래요?
왜 저러는 거죠?

Subtitle: I don't know, but the meaner she is, the more it turns me on. Is that weird?
Translation:
나도 몰라, 하지만 못되게 굴수록
난 더 흥분돼, 이거 이상한 거야?

Subtitle: -You're my boss. -Oh, say that to me again, / but more disgusted with me, like I'm a worm.
Translation:
- 당신 제 상사잖아요
- 오, 그거 다시 말해봐 / 좀 더 혐오하는 투로
벌레 보듯이

Subtitle: Eleanor was supposed to be in The Bad Place, / arrived here by accident, / assumed another person's identity, and has now escaped.
Translation:
엘리너는 배드 플레이스에
가야 했는데 / 사고로 여기 오게 됐어요 / 다른 사람의 신분으로 말이죠
그리고 이제 탈출했고요

Subtitle: Is that the whole story?
Well, no. Someone else was sent here by mistake.
Translation:
아니요, 다른 누군가도 실수로 여기 보내졌어요
제이슨 멘도사라는 사람이에요

Subtitle: His name is Jason Mendoza, and I believe he's on the train with Eleanor.
Translation:
실수로 여기 보내졌어요
제이슨 멘도사라는 사람이에요 그리고 전 그 사람이 엘리너와
함께 기차에 탔다고 믿습니다

Subtitle: You knew about Jason?
Yes, I know that he's a fake / and that he's married to Janet / and that this entire neighborhood is...
Translation:
- 제이슨에 대해 알았어요?
- 네, 제이슨이 가짜이고 재닛이랑
결혼한 걸 알고 있어요 / 가짜이고 재닛이랑
결혼한 걸 알고 있어요 / 그리고 이곳 전체가...

Subtitle: What's the human expression?
Uh, yes, a smokin' hot turd.
[Shawn] I will deal with Jason Mendoza later.
For now, I will hear your arguments for why / Fake Eleanor Shellstrop should stay in The Good Place.
Translation:
지금은 왜 가짜
엘리너가 굿 플레이스에 / 남아야 하는지에 대한
여러분의 주장을 듣겠습니다

Subtitle: We can do this, but we must remain emotionless.
Translation:
우린 이걸 할 수 있어요, 하지만
감정을 개입시키지 말아야 해요

Subtitle: I'm talking "Kristen Stewart on a red carpet"
Translation:
난 '레드 카펫 위의
크리스틴 스튜어트' 수준으로

Subtitle: level of emotionless here, all right? [exhales deeply]
Translation:
감정이 없는 걸 얘기하는
거예요, 알았죠?

Subtitle: Begin.
Eleanor dedicated herself to the study of ethics.
Translation:
시작하세요 엘리너는 윤리학을 공부하기
위해 혼신의 힘을 다했습니다

Subtitle: I was blown away by her capacity for self-improvement.
Translation:
저는 그녀의 자기 향상 능력에
대단히 감명받았습니다
