Subtitle: Eleanor is a magnificent person who has grown tremendously in her time here.
Translation:
엘리너는 이곳에 있는 동안 엄청나게 성장한
대단한 사람이에요

Subtitle: Please, I'm begging you, please.
Voluntarily heading to The Bad Place proves / that she is a selfless person.
Translation:
자발적으로
배드 플레이스로 갔다는 건 / 그녀가 이타적인 사람이란
것을 증명합니다

Subtitle: Sorry. I'm getting choked up.
[sighs] Yes, voluntarily sacrificing herself / and heading to The Bad Place would be a point in her favor.
Translation:
그래요, 자발적으로
자신을 희생하고 / 배드 플레이스로 간 건 엘리너에게
유리하게 작용할 겁니다

Subtitle: However, I've just received word that Eleanor is not currently / in The Bad Place. We have no idea where she is.
Translation:
하지만, 난 엘리너가 지금
배드 플레이스에 있지 않다는 / 얘기를 들었어요 우린 엘리너가 어디
있는지 모릅니다

Subtitle: Fork! [sighs]
I will now review Eleanor's memories.
Her memories? As in, all the things -she's done on Earth? -Mmm.
Translation:
엘리너의 기억이라고요?
엘리너가 지구에서 했던 일들요?

Subtitle: But perhaps we could take a little break first.
Translation:
그런데 우리 그 전에 잠깐
쉬는 게 어떨까요?

Subtitle: You know, we've been at it for a while, and you must be tired.
Translation:
우리 한동안 일만 했잖아요
피곤하실 거예요

Subtitle: I've been asleep in goo for the last 29 years, so I'm good.
Translation:
지난 29년 동안 고치 안에서
푹 자서 괜찮습니다

Subtitle: Call up the screen for Fake Eleanor Shellstrop, please.
Translation:
가짜 엘리너 셸스트롭의
인생 화면을 띄워주세요

Subtitle: Where should we begin, "Waiters Screamed At"
or "Cyberbullying of Pregnant Woman from Spin Class"?
Translation:
아니면 '자전거 운동 클래스에서
임신한 여성에게 악플 달기'?

Subtitle: Hey, you wanna grab a drink or something?
Uh, no, I kind of have my own private time routine.
Translation:
아뇨, 지금은 내 개인적인
시간을 가질 때예요

Subtitle: I thought you'd want company after being here alone for so long.
Translation:
이곳에서 오랫동안 홀로 지내서
같이 있길 원할 거로 생각했죠

Subtitle: -No. -Okay, I get it.
Hey, uh, where did you get that?
That's not one of my books.
I only have Anne Rice vampire novels with water stains, / and I've cut words out of most of them to make pornography.
Translation:
난 물 얼룩이 진 앤 라이스의
뱀파이어 소설밖에 없어요 / 그리고 그걸 포르노로 만드느라
거의 모든 내용을 잘라냈죠

Subtitle: My friend in The Good Place gave it to me when he was teaching me ethics.
Translation:
굿 플레이스에 있는 제 친구가
저에게 윤리를 가르쳐줄 때 준 책이에요, 이 책은
그 친구를 기억하게 해줘요

Subtitle: -[sighs] -It reminds me of him.
Translation:
가르쳐줄 때 준 책이에요, 이 책은
그 친구를 기억하게 해줘요

Subtitle: Look, if you wanna survive, / you have to forget what you left behind. Take that whole experience, / crumple it up, throw it in the garbage can. [clicks tongue]
Translation:
봐요, 당신이 살아남고 싶다면
당신은 잊어야 해요 / 봐요, 당신이 살아남고 싶다면
당신은 잊어야 해요 뒤에 두고 온 것들을 말이죠
그 모든 경험들을 / 구겨서 쓰레기통에 던져요

Subtitle: Okay. Instead of reading, / I will watch this VHS copy of Cannonball Run II.
Translation:
알았어요, 책 읽는 것 대신에 / VHS 비디오로
'캐논볼 2'를 보거나

Subtitle: Or maybe the making of Cannonball Run II.
-Wow. Very medium. -Yeah.
Hey, you two lovebirds figure out how to have sex yet?
Translation:
두 마리 잉꼬들은 섹스하는
법을 알아냈나요?

Subtitle: No. We tried for two hours, / but there was just a lot of, like, bumping into each other.
Translation:
아니요, 두 시간을 시도했지만 / 그냥 우리 둘이 엄청
부딪히기만 했어요

Subtitle: It was weird.
This ain't your Bar Mitzvah anymore, bitch.
It's my 24th birthday! What! Hot tiara, girl.
Translation:
이게 더는 네 '바르미츠바'가
아니라고, 이년아 이건 내 24살 생일이야!
티아라 화끈한데, 아가씨

Subtitle: That was "The Crashing and Subsequent Destruction / "of Vanessa Garcia's quinceañera."
Let's move on to another event.
"Heckling of Mall Santas"?
"Lifetime Ban from Build-a-Bear Workshop"?
"Brief Instagram Flirtation with Kid Rock"? Oh, no.
This is getting away from us. We need to do something quickly.
Translation:
점점 걷잡을 수 없게 되고 있어요
얼른 뭐라도 해야 해요

Subtitle: Yeah, Judge, request permission to speak somewhat emotionally?
Translation:
네, 판사님, 조금 감정적인 얘기를
하는 걸 허락해주세요

Subtitle: Ugh. Fine.
Dramamine.
Helps with the nausea. Proceed.
Okay, look, I know, obviously, these memories aren't great.
Translation:
좋아요, 분명히 이 기억들은
좋은 것들은 아니에요

Subtitle: I was particularly disturbed by "Started Fire in Mailbox / "to Get Mailman to Take Off Shirt,"
Translation:
저는 특히 '우체부 옷을 벗기려고' / '우편함에 불을 지름' 때문에
기분이 거슬렸어요

Subtitle: but that was the old Eleanor. She changed.
Translation:
하지만 저건 옛날 엘리너예요
그녀는 변했어요

Subtitle: She worked, and she studied, and she got better.
Translation:
그녀는 노력하고 공부해서
나은 사람이 됐어요

Subtitle: And it wasn't just self-preservation, it was real self-improvement.
Translation:
그리고 그건 단순한
자기 보호는 아니었어요 그건 진짜 자기 발전이었어요
저는 그 첫 주에 결심했죠

Subtitle: I made the decision to help Eleanor that first week, and I'm glad I did.
Translation:
그건 진짜 자기 발전이었어요
저는 그 첫 주에 결심했죠 엘리너를 도와주기로 말이에요
전 그런 결정을 해서 기쁩니다

Subtitle: Because she's worth it.
I, too, helped Eleanor.
Not as much as Chidi, surely, / but my help was more friendship and sorely needed fashion advice.
Translation:
물론 치디만큼은 아니죠 / 하지만 제 도움은 좀 더 우정과
필요한 패션에 관한 조언이었어요

Subtitle: Eleanor deserves to stay.
Thank you for these testimonials. A ruling has been reached.
Translation:
엘리너는 머물 자격이 있어요 여러분의 증언 감사합니다
판결을 내리겠습니다

Subtitle: Oh, you want to hear it. I forgot how needy humans are.
Translation:
듣기를 원하는군요, 인간들이
요구 사항이 많은 걸 깜빡했어요

Subtitle: [clears throat] Eleanor Shellstrop is a bad person.
The progress she has made does not offset her actions on Earth.
Translation:
그녀의 진전은 지구에서의
행동을 상쇄하지 못합니다

Subtitle: She deserves to be in The Bad Place.
Translation:
그녀는 배드 플레이스에
가는 게 마땅합니다

Subtitle: -Oh. -As concerning Jason Mendoza, / I have heard no statements nor seen any evidence to suggest--
Translation:
제이슨 멘도사에 관해서는 / 어떠한 진술도 듣지 못했고
증거도 보지 못했는데...

Subtitle: Oh, he's from Florida?
Yeah, he belongs in The Bad Place.
No, but how do you intend to enforce this ruling?
Translation:
하지만 이 판결을
어떻게 집행할 거죠? 그들이 어디에 있는지
알지 못하잖아요

Subtitle: -You have no idea where they are. -Bad Janet?
Translation:
그들이 어디에 있는지
알지 못하잖아요 나쁜 재닛?

Subtitle: What's up, fork nuts?
Engage walkie-talkie protocol.
What if you're here, and I'm like this?
Translation:
당신이 이렇게 하고
제가 이렇게 하는 건 어때요?

Subtitle: Yes, that may work.
Whoa. What is happening?
Is she having an orgasm? Did I do it somehow?
Translation:
지금 오르가슴 온 거예요?
내가 뭔가를 했어요?

Subtitle: [Shawn] Attention Eleanor Shellstrop and Jason Mendoza.
This is the Almighty Judge on High of All Beings / Living and Dead for All Eternity. My name's Shawn.
Translation:
영원한 곳, 높은 곳에서
모든 죽은 존재와 / 산 존재를 위한 전능한 판사입니다
숀이라고 합니다

Subtitle: We do not know where you are, but hope you are receiving this message.
Translation:
우린 당신이 어디 있는지 모르지만
이 메시지를 받았길 바랍니다

Subtitle: You have been found to be the rightful property of The Bad Place.
Translation:
우린 당신이 어디 있는지 모르지만
이 메시지를 받았길 바랍니다 당신은 배드 플레이스의 적법한
소유물이라고 결정됐습니다

Subtitle: Either return to your original neighborhood, / or your accomplices Chidi Anagonye and Tahani Al-Jamil / will go to The Bad Place in your stead.
Translation:
당신들의 원래 지역으로
돌아오든지 / 그렇지 않으면 당신들의 공범
치디 아나곤예와 타하니 알자밀이 / 당신 대신 배드 플레이스로
보내질 겁니다

Subtitle: -[both] What? -You have four hours. Goodbye.
Your Honor, please, Chidi and Tahani are completely innocent.
Translation:
판사님, 부탁드려요
치디와 타하니는 정말 결백해요

Subtitle: They are not completely innocent. They told me so themselves.
Translation:
저들은 완벽하게 결백하진 않아요
스스로 그렇게 말했잖아요

Subtitle: They aided and abetted two criminals, one of whom was a DJ.
Translation:
2명의 범죄자를 방조했어요
그중 한 명은 DJ였죠

Subtitle: They're gonna send Chidi and Tahani to The Bad Place?
We're off the hook, this is amazing!
Babe, we are going to be trying to make love all night long.
Translation:
자기야, 우린 매일 밤
사랑을 나눌 수 있어요

Subtitle: We don't have to go back, though. They just said.
Translation:
우린 돌아갈 필요가 없어요 - 말만 그런 거예요
- 우린 타하니와 치디를

Subtitle: We can't let Tahani and Chidi go to The Bad Place. They're our friends.
Translation:
- 말만 그런 거예요
- 우린 타하니와 치디를 배드 플레이스로 가게
놔둘 순 없어요, 우리 친구잖아요

Subtitle: We literally owe it to them.
Translation:
- 우린 그들에게 빚을 졌다고요
- 만약 그들이 정말로

Subtitle: If they're really our "friends", / then why aren't they here with us right "now"?
Translation:
- 우린 그들에게 빚을 졌다고요
- 만약 그들이 정말로 우리 '친구'라면, 왜 '지금'
우리와 같이 있지 않은 거죠? / 우리 '친구'라면, 왜 '지금'
우리와 같이 있지 않은 거죠?

Subtitle: Because we ran away. Are you...
[stammers] Does your brain work, actually?
Do you have a functioning head?
[Mindy] I think he has a good point.
Translation:
난 제이슨 말에
일리가 있다고 봐요

Subtitle: I wouldn't go back for those turkeys.
Translation:
나라면 그 멍청이들 때문에
돌아가지 않겠어요

Subtitle: How can you say that?
Think practically here.
Okay, you go back, you turn yourself in, you get sent to The Bad Place, / and you never see your friends again.
Translation:
현실적으로 생각하세요
당신이 돌아갔다고 쳐요 자수하고
배드 플레이스로 보내지겠죠 / 그리고 다시는
친구들을 볼 수 없겠죠

Subtitle: Or you stay here, you're safe from The Bad Place, / and you never see your friends again.
Translation:
아니면 여기 남고
배드 플레이스에 가지도 않고 / 그리고 다시는
친구들을 볼 수 없어요

Subtitle: It's the same results, / except if you stay here, you don't get tortured.
Translation:
같은 결과예요
다만 당신이 여기 남으면 / 같은 결과예요
다만 당신이 여기 남으면 당신은 고문받지 않겠죠

Subtitle: -But they do. -That's their problem.
Translation:
- 하지만 친구들이 받잖아요
- 그건 그들 문제죠

Subtitle: Your problem is whether you get tortured.
Now if you'll excuse me, / it's my masturbating time. [clears throat]
Translation: 그럼 이만 저는 실례할게요 / 자위할 시간이라서요

Subtitle: When isn't it? We're going back.
Translation:
언젠 안 그랬어요?
우린 돌아갈 거예요

Subtitle: -But-- -Now.
[Eleanor] Can we even make it there in time?
I believe so, though it'll be close.
Translation:
그럴 수 있을 거예요
좀 빠듯하긴 하지만요

Subtitle: -Where's Jason? -[Jason] Heads up!
Sorry, Eleanor, but I can't let us leave.
Translation:
미안해요, 엘리너, 하지만 우리가
떠나게 놔둘 순 없어요

Subtitle: Bortles!
No!
What are you doing, you goon?
Trying to blow up the train.
Blowing stuff up got me out of so many jams on Earth.
Translation:
지구에선 물건을 날려버리면
문제가 다 해결됐었어요

Subtitle: Let me try again. Do you have another bottle?
Translation:
다시 한번 해볼게요
병 하나 더 있어요?

Subtitle: Hi, there. Since there's no Janet here to serve you, / I brought you two a little treat.
Translation:
저 왔어요, 지금 시중
들어줄 재닛이 없어서 / 제가 두 분께 드릴
작은 선물을 가져왔어요

Subtitle: -Uh, kind of like a last meal. -Not like a last meal, / just the... The final food you might ever eat.
Translation:
- 마지막 식사 같은 거군요
- 마지막 식사라기보단 / 그냥, 여러분이 먹을 수 있는
마지막 음식 같은 거죠

Subtitle: I'm gonna miss these little perks when I'm down in The Bad Place.
Translation:
배드 플레이스로 가면 이 자그마한
특권들이 그리울 거예요

Subtitle: Being forced to wear a...
A knock-off handbag and drink tap water.
-That's what you think Hell is? -[groans]
Janet, please, we have to go.
I won't start the train until my husband says it's okay.
Translation:
제 남편이 괜찮다고
할 때까진 출발하지 않겠어요

Subtitle: I'm sorry, Eleanor, but I engaged a ride-or-die protocol / so I'm loyal to Jason forever.
Translation:
죄송해요, 엘리너
하지만 저는 성혼 서약서에 맹세한 몸이라 평생
제이슨에 충실해야 해요 / 맹세한 몸이라 평생
제이슨에 충실해야 해요

Subtitle: [Eleanor] Buddy...
Come on, we gotta go.
I don't wanna go to The Bad Place. It's scary, like the movie Ratatouille.
Translation:
난 배드 플레이스로 가기 싫어요 무서워요
영화 '라따뚜이'처럼 말이죠

Subtitle: -What? -Yo, I ain't trying / to have rats living in my hat and pulling my hair / to get me to do stuff.
Translation:
- 뭐라고요?
- 난 내 모자 속에 살면서 / 내 머리카락을 당기고
날 조종하는 / 쥐를 갖고 싶지 않아요

Subtitle: I'm scared, too.
But we can't just abandon our friends and let them take the fall for us.
Translation:
하지만 그냥 친구들을
버리고 그들을 우리 대신 벌 받게 놔둘 순 없어요

Subtitle: Sure we can. It would be so easy to do that.
Translation:
당연히 그럴 수 있어요
그건 너무 쉬울 거예요

Subtitle: We'd just go back to Mindy's house, chill out--
Translation:
우린 그냥 민디의 집으로
돌아가서 가만있으면...

Subtitle: I'd get used to room-temperature beer.
Me and Janet keep trying to solve the problem / of how to have sex, which could take years.
Translation:
나와 재닛은 섹스하는 방법을
알아내기 위해 / 계속 시도할 거예요
몇 년이 걸릴 수도 있겠지만요

Subtitle: Let's just pretend that we didn't hear the Janet walkie-talkie message.
Translation:
그냥 재닛 무전기 메시지를
못 들은 척해요

Subtitle: No, it's time to own up, dude.
Translation:
안 돼요, 이제 자백할
시간이에요, 친구

Subtitle: I spent my whole life acting like Mindy, me first, no matter what, / and it literally took dying and being around a bunch of good people / to realize that I was kind of a nightmare.
Translation:
난 내 모든 인생을
민디처럼 살아왔어요 무엇보다도 내가 먼저였어요
그리고 내가 죽어서 / 무엇보다도 내가 먼저였어요
그리고 내가 죽어서 많은 좋은 사람들과
지내면서 깨달았어요 / 내가 일종의 악몽이었다는
걸 말이에요

Subtitle: -Why were you like that? -Well...
Translation: 당신 왜 그렇게 된 거죠? 글쎄요...

Subtitle: Let me tell you about Doug and Donna Shellstrop.
Translation:
더그와 도나 셸스트롭이란
사람에 대해 얘기해줄게요

Subtitle: Hey, Dad, just a warning, Mom's gonna be here in a second.
Translation:
아빠, 미리 경고하는 거예요
엄마가 곧 여기 올 거예요

Subtitle: [scoffs] Your mother's coming? Oh, boy, hide the silverware.
Translation:
네 엄마가 온다고?
세상에, 은그릇 다 숨기렴

Subtitle: You mean the silverware -you stole from Mom? -[door opens and closes]
Yeah, but she keeps trying to steal it back.
Translation:
그래, 네 엄마가 계속
다시 훔치려고 하잖아

Subtitle: I drove here as fast as I could. You scored free WrestleMania tickets?
Translation:
최대한 빨리 왔단다
공짜 레슬마니아 티켓을 구했다고?

Subtitle: There are no tickets, Mom. I knew that was the only way I could get you here.
Translation:
티켓은 없어요, 엄마를 부르려면
이 방법뿐이라고 생각했거든요

Subtitle: A-ha! Burn.
Eleanor, just because your father and I are divorced / does not mean you can disrespect me like this, okay?
Translation:
엘리너, 네 아빠랑
내가 이혼했다고 해서 / 나한테 이렇게 무례하게 굴어도
된다는 뜻은 아니란다, 알았니?

Subtitle: We are a family.
Whose birthday is it?
-Mine. -[Doug] Are you serious? No way.
Translation:
- 제 생일요
- 진심이야? 말도 안 돼

Subtitle: That was a BS foul on Chapman.
And since you both forgot, again, which means / you definitely didn't get me a present, again, / I got myself something. I just need you to sign it.
Translation:
둘 다 까먹으셨을까 봐
다시 말씀드리는데 / 두 분 다 저한테
선물 줄 필요 없어요 / 제가 이걸 가져왔어요
그냥 두 분이 서명하시면 돼요

Subtitle: Emancipation papers? Honey!
Translation:
제가 이걸 가져왔어요
그냥 두 분이 서명하시면 돼요 친권 포기 각서? 얘야!

Subtitle: What does "emancipation" mean?
It means I'll be on my own.
All my life, I've been taking care of myself and you guys.
I work two after-school jobs because you blew / half my college fund bailing your boyfriend out of jail.
Translation:
저는 하교 후 일을 두 개나 해요
왜냐면 엄마가 / 남자친구 보석금을 낸다고
제 대학 학비 반을 날려 먹어서요

Subtitle: So irresponsible.
And you blew the other half trying to frame her boyfriend.
Translation:
아빠는 엄마 남자친구를 누명
씌우겠다고 나머지를 날려 먹었죠

Subtitle: It was so stupid. He was already guilty, dumbass.
Translation:
바보 같은 짓이었어
걔는 이미 유죄였다고, 멍청아

Subtitle: I've been on my own for a while now anyway, / and after you sign these papers, it'll be official.
Translation:
어쨌든 근래에도
독립적으로 살아왔지만 / 엄마, 아빠가 여기 서명만 하면
공식적이 되는 거예요

Subtitle: I won't owe you anything, you won't owe me anything.
Translation:
전 아무것도 빚지지 않을 거고
엄마, 아빠도 빚지지 않고요

Subtitle: Well, if you want me to sign... Oh, that's a joint.
Translation:
내 서명을 원한다면...
오, 이건 대마초잖아

Subtitle: Uh, do you have a pen or a lighter?
You're a really interesting person, Eleanor.
We should hang out sometime.
Wow, your parents sucked.
Yeah, they did. And I've been using their crappy parenting as an excuse / for my selfish behavior all my life. No more.
Translation:
그래요, 그랬어요, 그리고 난
살면서 그들의 끔찍했던 양육법을 / 내 이기적인 행동에 대한 변명으로
삼았어요, 더는 안 돼요

Subtitle: We know what's right here. We have to go back.
Translation:
뭐가 옳은지 우린 알고 있어요
우린 돌아가야 해요

Subtitle: Ride-or-die.
In preparation for your trip to The Bad Place, / please put on these fedoras.
Translation: 시간 됐습니다 배드 플레이스로 가는 준비로서 / 이 페도라 중절모를 쓰세요

Subtitle: Oh, no.
Well, no use delaying the inevitable.
Translation:
오, 이런 피할 수 없는 일을
늦출 필요는 없겠죠

Subtitle: -We surrender. Together. -[door opens]
Chidi, Tahani, we're back to save your souls.
Translation:
치디, 타하니, 당신들을 구하려고
우리가 돌아왔어요

Subtitle: Real weird vibe in here.
Was definitely expecting some applause.
You're too late. You... You missed the cut-off.
But we're here. We came here as fast as we could, and we're here.
Translation:
하지만 우리가 여기 있어요
최대한 빨리 왔고 여기 있잖아요

Subtitle: So...
Now what?
What is the most logical decision?
I made my initial ruling.
I established a deadline. The deadline was missed.
Translation:
제한 시간을 만들었고
제한 시간을 어겼죠

Subtitle: Now the original perpetrators are here.
This is exhausting.
I just want to go back to my container of goo and go to sleep.
Translation:
그냥 고치로 들어가서
푹 자고 싶네요

Subtitle: The Bad Place is owed two people.
Translation:
배드 플레이스엔 두 명의
자리가 비었어요

Subtitle: In my opinion, which is an objective fact in this case / and all cases always and forever, / you have all done bad things since you arrived here.
Translation:
제 생각에 이 사건과
모든 사건을 통틀어 / 언제나 그리고 영원히
객관적인 사실은 / 여기 도착한 이후로 여러분 모두
나쁜 짓을 했다는 거예요

Subtitle: Therefore, I don't care which two of you go.
Translation:
그러므로 당신들 중
어떤 두 명이 가든 상관없어요

Subtitle: [Dave] Morning, Mike. How's it hanging?
[Dave] Morning, Mike. How's it hanging?
Oh. Fine, Dave, just fine.
Listen, we got the files for the new crop of incoming, / and the Big Guy thinks it's time for you to fly solo.
Translation:
새로 들어오는
사람들 명단을 받았어요 / 그리고 위에서는 당신이
독립할 때가 됐다고 생각해요

Subtitle: I get to design it myself?
You've been an apprentice long enough. You're ready.
Translation:
견습 기간도 충분히 겪었잖아요
이제 준비됐어요

Subtitle: Oh, Dave, I'm gonna work so hard.
-My design is gonna be absolutely perfect. -[chuckles] Easy there, rookie.
Translation: 정말 완벽하게 설계할 거예요 알았어요, 진정해요, 신입

Subtitle: Starting immediately, you'll be reporting directly to the front office.
Translation:
즉시 시작하세요, 이제
제 부서에서 나가셔도 돼요

Subtitle: This is your shot. Good luck.
[Shawn] The Bad Place is owed two people.
Translation:
배드 플레이스엔 두 명의
자리가 비었어요

Subtitle: You have all done bad things since you arrived here.
Translation:
여기 도착한 이후로 여러분 모두
나쁜 짓을 했다는 거예요

Subtitle: I don't care which two of you go. You can decide.
Translation:
당신들 중
어떤 두 명이 가든 신경 안 써요 여러분이 정하세요
30분 드릴게요

Subtitle: You have 30 minutes.
All I ever wanted was for this neighborhood, / my first neighborhood to be perfect.
Translation:
제가 이곳에서 바란 건 그저... / 제 첫 지구가 완벽하길
원한 것뿐이었어요

Subtitle: Somehow I blew it and... Well, you're all suffering, / and for that, I'm deeply sorry.
Translation:
그걸 제가 날려버렸고...
음, 여러분 모두 고통받고 있죠 / 그리고 그 점에 대해선
정말 죄송해요

Subtitle: This is truly the saddest day of my life.
Translation:
오늘은 제 인생에서
진정으로 가장 슬픈 날이네요

Subtitle: -[sighs] -Okay, I guess I'll speak first.
Jason and I are the mistakes.
We're the ones who misled everybody and dragged you all into this mess, so, / we should go to The Bad Place.
Translation:
모두를 속이고 이 혼란에 빠지게
한 건 우리였어요, 그래서... / 우리가 배드 플레이스로 가야 해요

Subtitle: -Agreed. -Yes.
Okay, I thought you were gonna at least pretend to fight me on that, but whatever.
Translation:
알았어요, 최소한
반박하는 척이라도 할 줄 알았지만 뭐 어쨌든

Subtitle: Hang on. That judge guy just said everyone here has done bad things.
Translation:
기다려요, 판사 말로는
모두가 나쁜 일을 했다고 했잖아요

Subtitle: Let's look at this ethnically.
-"Ethically." -You guys helped me and Eleanor, right, / but we're bad, so you helping us was bad.
Translation:
- '윤리적'이에요
- 당신들이 우리 둘을 도와줬어요 / 하지만 우린 나빠요, 그러니 우릴
도와준 당신들도 나빠요

Subtitle: It's basic consequentialism, the morality of an action / is solely judged on its consequences.
Translation:
이건 기본적인 결과주의예요
즉, 어떤 행위의 도덕성은 / 오로지 그 결과로
판단해야 한다는 거죠

Subtitle: Great. [chuckles]
Translation:
오로지 그 결과로
판단해야 한다는 거죠 대단해요

Subtitle: The one time you actually remember something from class.
Translation:
수업에서 들은 걸 당신이 실제로
기억한 유일한 순간이에요

Subtitle: Maybe I was brought here by mistake, but since we've been here, / I just tried to stay out of everyone's way.
Translation:
내가 여기 실수로 왔을 순 있지만
우리가 여기 온 이후로 / 내가 여기 실수로 왔을 순 있지만
우리가 여기 온 이후로 나는 모두에게 피해를
주지 않으려 했어요

Subtitle: Chidi's done worse stuff than me.
Translation:
치디가 나보다
더 나쁜 짓을 했어요

Subtitle: He murdered Janet. He killed my wife!
Translation:
치디는 재닛을 죽였어요
내 아내를 죽였다고요!

Subtitle: I was trying to stop you from doing it!
Translation:
당신이 죽이려는 걸
막으려 한 거였어요!

Subtitle: Yeah, but you did it. He who smelt it murdered Janet.
Translation:
그렇지만 당신이 했어요 낌새를 눈치챈 치디가
재닛을 죽였어요

Subtitle: Well, it's settled then.
Translation:
낌새를 눈치챈 치디가
재닛을 죽였어요 그래요, 그럼 정해졌네요

Subtitle: Eleanor and Jianyu are leaving.
For the last time, my name is Jason, / not Jianyu, the amazing and incredible monk.
Translation:
마지막으로 하는 말인데
난 제이슨이에요 / 그 엄청나게 놀라운
수도승 지안유가 아니라고요

Subtitle: Which is why you belong in The Bad Place.
Translation:
그렇기 때문에 당신이
배드 플레이스에 가야 한다는 거죠

Subtitle: And by the way, Janet is not your wife, or your soulmate.
Translation:
그리고 재닛은 당신 아내도 아니고
소울메이트도 아니에요

Subtitle: -There's a Janet in every neighborhood. -Well, I'm in love with this Janet.
Translation:
- 모든 지역에 재닛이 있어요
- 난 이 재닛과 사랑에 빠졌어요

Subtitle: We did a bunch of amazing, awesome stuff which almost turned out to be sex, / -and we were married in a legal ceremony. -It was not legal.
Translation:
우린 놀랍고 대단한
일을 엄청 많이 했어요 대부분이 섹스였지만
우린 합법적으로 결혼식도 올렸죠 / 대부분이 섹스였지만
우린 합법적으로 결혼식도 올렸죠 합법적이지 않았어요

Subtitle: Okay, J-bones, you and me, outside.
Translation:
좋아요, 제이슨, 당신과 나
밖으로 나가요

Subtitle: What? But...
I'm not going. I don't wanna.
Translation: 난 안 갈 거예요, 가기 싫어요

Subtitle: Well, I don't wanna either, but let's face it.
Translation:
나도 가기 싫어요
하지만 현실을 직시해요

Subtitle: Chidi and Tahani are better people than we are.
We tried to improve ourselves and we did a good job.
Translation:
우린 스스로 나아지려고 했고
그리고 우린 잘 해냈어요

Subtitle: Well, I did a good job.
You mostly fell asleep in class or made fart noises with your hands.
Translation:
당신은 수업 시간 대부분 졸거나
손바닥으로 방귀 소리나 냈잖아요

Subtitle: -I could never do that on Earth. -[fart noises]
Translation:
난 지구에 있을 때
이거 절대 못 했어요

Subtitle: This place truly is paradise.
-[Tahani] Look at them. -[sighs]
Whispering away like two beefeaters on a tea break.
Translation:
차 마시며 쉬는
경비병처럼 속삭이고 있어요

Subtitle: -I bet they're plotting against us. -No way. Eleanor wouldn't do that.
Translation:
우리를 보낼 음모를
짜고 있는 게 틀림없어요 말도 안 돼요
엘리너가 그럴 리 없어요

Subtitle: You do have feelings for her, don't you?
[stutters] Yes.
But no. Please don't make me think about this again. My brain will break.
Translation:
하지만 아니에요, 이걸 다시 생각
않게 해줘요, 머리가 터질 거예요

Subtitle: I'm sorry, it's just that I have certain feelings for you.
I don't mean to contribute to your misery, it's just that I'm frightened.
Translation:
당신에게 비참함을 더하려는 건
아니에요, 내가 무서워서 그래요

Subtitle: I don't have an actual soulmate.
What's gonna happen to me when Jason and Fake Eleanor go / -and you're off with Real Eleanor? -[sighs]
Translation:
제이슨과 가짜 엘리너가 가버리고
당신은 진짜 엘리너와 가버리면 / 제이슨과 가짜 엘리너가 가버리고
당신은 진짜 엘리너와 가버리면 난 어떻게 되는 거죠?

Subtitle: Whither Tahani?
Okay, team meeting. [sighs]
Jason has agreed that the two of us should go.
Translation:
제이슨이 우리 둘이
가야 한다는 것에 동의했어요

Subtitle: Bye, Tahani.
Sorry for everything.
After I'm gone, you can go ahead and clean out my bud hole.
Translation:
내가 떠나면 가서 내 친구-홀을
정리해도 좋아요

Subtitle: Thank you.
I love you so much, baby. Promise me you'll visit.
Translation:
당신을 정말 사랑해요
면회 오겠다고 약속해줘요

Subtitle: I will not.
It is literally impossible for me to do that.
Well, it's been real, dawg.
Sorry, that's how I ended most of my serious relationships.
Translation:
미안해요, 대부분의 진지한 관계를
이런 식으로 끊었거든요

Subtitle: Yeah. Mmm, that checks out.
I feel like I failed you.
Translation:
내가 당신을 실패하게
만든 것 같아요

Subtitle: No. Don't ever think that.
Translation:
아니에요, 그런 생각은
절대 하지 말아요

Subtitle: I was dropped into a cave, and you were my flashlight.
Translation:
난 동굴 속에 떨어졌고
당신은 내 손전등이었어요

Subtitle: Goodbye forever.
I will miss you so much.
Ugh. I'll miss you too, you sexy skyscraper.
Translation:
나도 당신이 그리울 거예요
섹시한 키다리 아가씨

Subtitle: All right. [sighs] Ready to go? Let's grab Michael.
Translation:
좋아요, 갈 준비 됐죠?
마이클한테 얘기하죠

Subtitle: [Eleanor] Come in.
Hi, guys. Sorry to interrupt.
Um, I'm going to The Bad Place. I'm taking one of the slots.
Translation:
내가 배드 플레이스로 가려고
한 자리를 차지했어요

Subtitle: -What? -Awesome.
Eleanor, that's crazy. You belong here. Why would you go?
Translation:
엘리너, 미쳤어요, 당신은 여기
사람이에요, 왜 가려고 해요?

Subtitle: Everyone here is supposed to have a soulmate, / and my soulmate doesn't love me.
Translation:
여기 모든 사람들은
소울메이트가 있어야 하는데 / 내 소울메이트는 날
사랑하지 않거든요

Subtitle: I don't know if you love the other Eleanor or Tahani or someone else, / but you don't love me, which means that this / will never really be my Good Place.
Translation:
당신이 다른 엘리너를 사랑하는지 아님 타하니인지
다른 사람인지 모르겠지만 / 당신은 날 사랑하지 않아요
그리고 그 말은... / 여긴 나에게 있어 진정한
굿 플레이스가 아니란 말이죠

Subtitle: I'm going, so you only have to choose one more person.
Translation:
내가 갈게요, 당신들은
한 명만 더 고르면 돼요

Subtitle: [stutters] Okay, that means...
What does that mean?
It means...
I get to stay here with my wife forever! We did it, Eleanor!
Translation:
난 여기서 내 아내랑
평생 살 수 있다는 말이죠! 우리가 해냈어요, 엘리너!
미국 만세!

Subtitle: USA! USA! USA!
[sighs] This is a real mess, huh?
No matter what they decide, I'd bet you're gonna be / in pretty hot water with your boss.
Translation:
저들이 어떤 결정을 내리든
당신 상사한테 / 꽤나 혼이 나겠어요

Subtitle: Wouldn't be surprised if retirement were on the table.
Retirement?
Of course, what do I know?
I'm just The All-Knowing Judge of All Matters in the Afterlife.
But face it, this is your mistake.
-[Val] Morning, Mike. -Morning, Val.
Translation:
- 좋은 아침이에요, 마이크
- 좋은 아침, 밸

Subtitle: Oh. Which one's which? I always forget.
Translation: 어떤 게 어떤 거죠? 항상 까먹어요

Subtitle: Black is regular, orange is anti-matter.
Working on your first solo design, right?
Translation: 첫 단독 설계 작업 중인 건가요?

Subtitle: How's it coming?
Do you ever get the feeling we could be doing it all differently?
Translation:
우리가 이 모든 걸
다르게 할 수 있다는... 생각 안 드나요?

Subtitle: I mean, it's always the same. We get the names, / come up with the design, they arrive, we move on to the next one.
Translation: 항상 같잖아요, 이름을 받고 / 설계를 하고, 사람들이 도착하고 다음 지역으로 넘어가고요

Subtitle: We never even get to be there to see how fun it is.
Translation:
심지어 얼마나 재미있는지 보러
그곳에 가보지도 않잖아요

Subtitle: Yeah, I guess, / but don't rock the boat here, pal, just try to do a good job.
Translation:
네, 그렇죠, 하지만 평지풍파를
일으키진 말아요, 친구 / 네, 그렇죠, 하지만 평지풍파를
일으키진 말아요, 친구 그냥 잘하려고 노력하면 돼요

Subtitle: Mmm. French vanilla?
Regular anti-matter's fine. Why flavor it?
Translation:
보통 반물질은 괜찮은데
무슨 맛이 이래?

Subtitle: A good job.
[Eleanor] All right, nerds, let's just get this over with.
I'll go to The Bad Place with Real Eleanor, / -and you three can stay. -[Jianyu] Yes!
Translation:
내가 진짜 엘리너랑
배드 플레이스로 갈게요 / - 당신 셋은 남아요
- 그래요!

Subtitle: We get to stay, baby! We did it!
Wait, no. You're not going.
Translation: 잠깐, 안 돼요 당신은 가지 말아요

Subtitle: I am.
-What? -Why?
Real Eleanor is my soulmate or was my soulmate / and she's only going down there because she thinks that I don't love her.
Translation:
진짜 엘리너가 내 소울메이트예요
혹은 내 소울메이트였죠 / 그리고 그녀는 내가 사랑하지
않는다고 생각하니까 가는 거예요

Subtitle: -Do you? -I don't know.
Please don't ask me that. My stomach hurts.
Translation:
제발 묻지 말아줘요
내 배가 아파요

Subtitle: The point is, if she's going down there because of me, / I'll never be at peace.
Translation:
요점은, 나 때문에
진짜 엘리너가 가는 거라면 / 난 절대 편안할 수 없어요

Subtitle: -Yes! We get to stay, baby! We did it! -No, this is bonkers.
Translation: 됐어! 우린 남아요! 해냈어요! 안 돼요, 이건 제정신이 아니에요

Subtitle: -I am going. End of story. -No, I'm going. End of everything.
Translation:
내가 가요, 이야기 끝이에요 아니, 내가 가요
모든 것의 끝이죠

Subtitle: What? Now you're trying to replace Chidi?
No. I'm going to replace Real Eleanor. Chidi and I are going to go together, / which means that you and Real Eleanor and Jason can stay.
Translation:
아니요, 진짜 엘리너 대신 갈게요
치디와 나는 같이 갈 거예요 / 즉, 당신과 진짜 엘리너
제이슨이 남는 거죠

Subtitle: Yes! We get to stay, baby! We did it!
Look, I love you and I think you love me.
Translation:
봐요, 난 당신을 사랑해요, 그리고
당신도 날 사랑한다고 생각해요

Subtitle: We can be together, away from everyone else.
Translation:
우린 함께할 수 있어요
다른 사람들을 떠나서 말이에요

Subtitle: Obviously, we'll be miserable, / but I truly believe our love will make us happy.
Translation:
분명, 우린 비참해질 거예요 / 하지만 난 진정으로 우리의
사랑이 행복을 주리라 믿어요

Subtitle: Okay, you realize The Bad Place is not some sort of couples retreat, right?
Translation:
배드 플레이스가 연인 휴양지 같은
곳이 아니라는 건 알고 있는 거죠?

Subtitle: If it is, Janet and I would like to go.
Oh, that's enough out of you, robot lover.
Translation: 오, 그만 좀 해, 로봇 성애자 씨

Subtitle: -Hey, that's racist! -Not a robot.
Oh, you have some nerve.
-Guys? -[all arguing]
Guys!
Holy motherforking shirtballs.
What?
Wow!
[laughing] Okay, okay.
Yo, Mikey! Shawn! Come on out!
Is everything okay?
Right as rain, Mikey, my boy.
So, Chidi and I are gonna go to The Bad Place.
Translation:
치디와 내가
배드 플레이스로 갈 거예요

Subtitle: -What? -Trust me, I've got this.
That's our decision. Let's hit it.
Well, what about Real Eleanor?
No, it's me and Chidi. Call the train.
Translation:
아뇨, 저랑 치디가 갈 거예요
기차 부르세요

Subtitle: Point of order. I don't accept this offer.
Translation:
법률에 따라 이 제안은
수락할 수 없습니다

Subtitle: The real mistakes were Jason and Eleanor.
Ga-ga-ga-ga. You said any two of us.
It's me and Chidi. Let's do it to it.
Michael! I just found an obscure precedent / in the rules that might just save everyone.
Translation:
마이클! 저 방금
모두를 구할 수도 있는 / 잘 알려지지 않은 판례를 찾았어요

Subtitle: Buzz off, Bambadjan! Don't need it.
Oh, okay. [chuckles softly]
Ready when you are, boss.
[Chidi] Eleanor, what's going on?

It took me a while to figure it out, / but just now as we were all fighting and yelling at each other / and each one of us demanding we should go to The Bad Place, / I thought to myself, "Man, this is torture."
Translation:
무슨 일인지 알아내는데
시간이 조금 걸렸어요 / 하지만 딱 지금처럼 우리 모두
서로 싸우고 소리 지르고 / 각자 배드 플레이스에 가야 한다고
주장하는 걸 보다가 / 혼자 이런 생각을 했어요
'와, 이거 고문인데'

Subtitle: And then it hit me.
They're never gonna call a train to take us to The Bad Place.
Translation:
저들은 우릴 배드 플레이스에 보낼
기차를 절대 부르지 않을 거예요

Subtitle: The can't, because we're already here.
Translation:
부를 수 없어요, 왜냐하면 우린
이미 여기에 있으니까요

Subtitle: This is The Bad Place.
Oh, man!
I can't believe you figured it out.
[laughs wickedly] Oh, God!
You, you ruined everything, you know that?
[Michael laughs] Oh, man.
Eleanor, you really suck!
-[gasps] -I was so close to pulling it off!
Sorry. So she's right?
Yeah, she figured it out.
[stutters] No, this doesn't make any sense.
Translation:
아니요
이건 전혀 말이 안 되잖아요

Subtitle: -This is paradise. -Oh, it looks like paradise, / but it's actually a filthy dumpster full of our worst anxieties.
Translation:
여긴 낙원이라고요 오, 낙원처럼 보이는 거죠 / 하지만 실은 우리 최악의 걱정으로
꽉 찬 더러운 쓰레기통이죠

Subtitle: I'm surrounded by people who are literally better than me.
Translation:
난 말 그대로 나보다 나은
사람들로 둘러싸여 있어요

Subtitle: Just me being here forced Chidi into an ethical "clusterfork."
Translation:
내가 여기 있는 것만으로도 치디는
윤리적 '혼란'에 빠져버려요

Subtitle: Tahani tortured Jason by constantly trying to get him to talk, / Jason tortured me because I was sure he would blow our cover, / which was torture for Chidi, because he was responsible for me, / which made Chidi seem like the perfect soulmate, / and that tortured Tahani because he didn't love her.
Translation:
타하니는 계속해서 제이슨에게
말을 시키면서 그를 고문했어요 / 제이슨은 날 고문했어요, 난 그가
우리 정체를 발설할 걸 알았어요 / 그건 치디에게도 고문이었어요
그는 나를 책임지고 있었으니까요 / 그건 치디를 완벽한 소울메이트로
보이도록 만들었어요 / 그리고 그건 타하니를 고문했죠
그는 그녀를 사랑하지 않았어요

Subtitle: -You don't love me? -Please, don't ask me that right now.
Translation: 날 사랑하지 않아요? 제발, 지금 그런 질문 하지 말아요

Subtitle: See?
We've been torturing each other since the moment we arrived, / and everything Michael has done has made at least one of us miserable.
Translation:
우린 우리가 도착한 그 순간부터
서로를 고문하고 있었어요 / 그리고 마이클은 최소한 우리 중
하나를 비참하게 만들었어요

Subtitle: -He played us like a fiddle. -Oh, dip!
Translation:
그리고 마이클은 최소한 우리 중
하나를 비참하게 만들었어요 우릴 바이올린 같이 갖고 놀았어요 오, 알겠어요!

Subtitle: Eleanor, I told you that first night that we were in a prank show.
Translation:
엘리너, 내가 당신한테 그날 밤에
이게 몰래카메라라고 했었잖아요

Subtitle: Oh, yeah.
-You did! Great job, man. -[Jianyu laughs]
Chidi, don't go!
I don't care if you don't love me, I love you.
Translation:
날 사랑하지 않는다 해도
상관없어요, 사랑해요

Subtitle: It's the only thing that makes any sense to me in this crazy world, / -and I think we should stay-- -No, stop, Vicky. They figured it out.
Translation:
이 미친 세상에서
내가 이해할 수 있는 유일한 거고 우리가 여기 남아야 한다고... / 우리가 여기 남아야 한다고... 됐어, 그만해, 비키
그들이 알아냈어

Subtitle: -They... -They know this is The Bad Place.
Translation:
- 그들이...
- 그들은 배드 플레이스인 걸 알아

Subtitle: Eleanor figured it out.
Ugh, man!
This was supposed to be my big moment.
Translation:
이게 나의 가장 중요한
순간이었어야 했다고요

Subtitle: I just rehearsed that speech for, like, three hours.
Damn it, Eleanor, you are the worst, / and you can all suck it.
Translation:
젠장, 엘리너, 당신이
제일 최악이에요 / 당신이 다 망쳤어요

Subtitle: -[door slams] -Do you remember what I told you / when you predicted you could do this for 1,000 years?
Translation:
자네가 이걸 1,000년은 / 할 수 있다고 예측했을 때
내가 뭐라고 했는지 기억나나?

Subtitle: The time has come to innovate.
The human afterlife can be more fun.
Translation:
인간들의 사후 세계는
더 재밌을 수 있어요

Subtitle: For us, obviously, not for the people we're torturing.
Translation:
당연히 우리한테죠
우리가 고문하는 사람들 말고요

Subtitle: Who cares about those dummies? -[laughs wickedly] -[scattered laughter]
I present to you the perfect recipe for my proposed experiment.
Translation:
제가 제안한 실험을 위한
완벽한 조합을 여러분께 공개하죠

Subtitle: Four people, perfectly suited to make each other miserable.
Translation:
네 사람이 서로를 완벽하게
비참하게 만들 거예요

Subtitle: I am going to design an afterlife / where they torture each other.
Translation: 저는 이들이 서로를 고문할 / 사후세계를 설계하려 합니다

Subtitle: We've tried this. Humans are very reticent to torture each other.
Translation:
우리도 해본 적 있지, 인간들은
서로 고문하는 것에 주저한다네

Subtitle: Even getting them to do simple things / like pulling out each other's teeth is like...
Translation: 심지어 서로의 이빨을 뽑는 / 간단한 일을 할 때도 말이지

Subtitle: I can't think of the right analogy.
Uh, what makes you think that you can get them to do this?
Translation:
그들이 왜 그런 짓을
할 거로 생각하는 건가?

Subtitle: Because they won't even know that they are doing it.
Translation:
왜냐면 그들은 스스로
그런 짓을 하는지조차 모르니까요

Subtitle: I'm going to make them think that they are in The Good Place, / and to make sure that they drive each other insane, / I will be there, posing as a Good Place architect.
Translation:
저는 그들이 굿 플레이스에
있다고 믿게 할 겁니다 / 그리고 서로를 미치게
할 거라고 확신합니다 / 제가 거기 있을 거예요
굿 플레이스 설계자인 척하면서요

Subtitle: -What? -[murmuring]
I even stole a Good Place Janet we can use.
Translation:
전 심지어 우리가 사용할
굿 플레이스 재닛까지 훔쳤습니다

Subtitle: -[scoffs] -[Michael] Look, / we can just send them all to the hot spike pits with the lava and the bees / and the lightning that tears off their flesh.
Translation:
봐요 / 그냥 용암과 벌로 가득 찬
뜨거운 가시가 박힌 구덩이로 밀어 넣을 수도 있어요 / 그들의 살을 찢어버릴
번개도 내릴 수 있고요

Subtitle: Let's try something new.
I cannot predict everything that's gonna happen, / but we'll improvise.
Translation:
난 일어날 모든 걸
예측할 순 없어요 / 하지만 우린 임기응변으로
대처할 겁니다

Subtitle: We'll be on our toes.
I think that we can get them to torture each other...
Translation:
우린 이 사람들이 서로를
고문하도록 할 수 있어요

Subtitle: For 1,000 years.
I think you'd be lucky to get six months out of this insane gambit.
Translation:
내 생각엔 이 미친 행동은
운이 좋아야 6개월 갈 걸세

Subtitle: But take me through it. How would this work, exactly?
Translation:
하지만 날 이해시켜 보게
정확히 어떻게 된다는 건가?

Subtitle: Oh. Yes, all right, so... [clears throat]
-This is a 14 million-point plan. -[footsteps approaching]
Um... Oh. Sorry.
I thought we reserved the conference room.
Translation:
우리가 이 회의실을
예약한 것 같은데요

Subtitle: No, Todd, we have it until 3:00.
Sorry. Sorry, everyone.
So, everyone else in this neighborhood--
Except for you four, / everyone in this neighborhood is one of us.
Translation:
당신 넷만 빼고 / 이 지역 모든 사람들은
우리 중 하나야

Subtitle: After I came up with everyone's characters, / we'd just create fun scenarios designed to torture you.
Translation:
내가 모든 사람들의
성격을 설정한 후에 / 너희들을 고통받게 할
재미있는 시나리오를 만들었어

Subtitle: How can I be over it? We haven't discussed it or even spoken for days.
Translation:
내가 어떻게 풀리겠어요?
우린 며칠 동안이나 그것에 대해 의논도 안 하고 말조차 안 했어요

Subtitle: Well, it sounds like you've had a really nice vacation from your full-time job.
Translation:
의논도 안 하고 말조차 안 했어요 나한텐 당신이 아주 훌륭한 휴가를
즐기고 있다는 소리로 들리는데요?

Subtitle: Get your story straight.
Okay.
They're at each other's throats already. This should put them over the top.
Translation:
이미 서로 소리 지르고 있어요
완전 절정에 이르게 해줄 거예요

Subtitle: -Ed, you play Bart, a former private eye. -Ooh.
Translation:
에드, 바트 역을 맡아주세요
전직 사설탐정이죠

Subtitle: I know. Tracy, you're his soulmate, / Nina, a marriage counselor.
Translation: 트레이시, 그의 소울메이트예요 / 니나... 결혼 상담사죠

Subtitle: [laughing] Maybe we can get them to swing with us.
Translation:
우리가 난교하자는 것처럼
보이게 할 수 있겠어요

Subtitle: That's perfect, perfect! [shushing]
Hey, guys? It's Michael!
[Michael] That was really a fun time.
Then it all started to go off the rails.
When I confessed.
You had no idea I was gonna do that, / because honestly, I had no idea I was gonna do that.
Translation:
제가 그런 일을 할 거라고
생각 못 한 거죠 / 왜냐면 솔직히
저도 그럴 줄 몰랐거든요

Subtitle: [Michael] Yeah, that came out of nowhere.
I mean, after that, it was just a crazy scramble for all of us.
Translation: 그일 이후 모든 게 엉망이 됐어

Subtitle: You know, I, I definitely underestimated / how effective Chidi was gonna be teaching you to be good, / and obviously, we didn't anticipate that Janet would fall in love with Jason.
Translation:
치디가 이렇게 효과적일 거란 걸
완전히 과소평가했어 / 치디가 이렇게 효과적일 거란 걸
완전히 과소평가했어 널 나아지게 가르치는 데 말이야 / 그리고 당연히 재닛이 제이슨과 사랑에 빠질 거란 것도
예상하지 못했고 말이야

Subtitle: Hang on. That part is real.
Oh, yeah. Janet isn't one of us.
Translation:
오, 그래, 재닛은
우리 편이 아니야

Subtitle: No, she's sort of a... [sighs] Foundational mainframe / for all of the neighborhoods, good and bad.
Translation:
아니야, 재닛은 여기 모든
좋고 나쁜 지역의 / 기반 시스템이라 할 수 있지

Subtitle: And apparently, this Janet is in love with Jason.
Translation:
그리고 명백하게도 이쪽 재닛은
제이슨과 사랑에 빠졌어

Subtitle: I mean... [chuckles] What a world, huh?
[Eleanor] Wait, I don't get something.
I know why Jason and I were sent here, but why Tahani?
Translation:
제이슨이랑 내가 여기 온 건
이해하겠어요, 하지만 타하니는요?

Subtitle: Oh, yeah. Didn't you raise, like, $1,000 for charity, or whatever?
Translation:
오, 맞아요, 자선인지 뭔지를 위해
천 달러를 모금하지 않았어요?

Subtitle: Uh, 60 billion, actually, so.
Translation:
오, 맞아요, 자선인지 뭔지를 위해
천 달러를 모금하지 않았어요? 600억 달러였어요

Subtitle: But it didn't matter...
Because my motivations were corrupt.
I didn't care about helping the people I raised the money for.
Translation:
제가 모은 돈으로 어떻게 사람을
돕는지 신경도 안 썼어요

Subtitle: I just wanted to prove my parents wrong, / stick it to my sister, / get fame and attention.
Translation:
제가 모은 돈으로 어떻게 사람을
돕는지 신경도 안 썼어요 그저 제 부모가 틀렸다는 걸
증명하고, 동생한테 불평하고 / 그저 제 부모가 틀렸다는 걸
증명하고, 동생한테 불평하고 / 명성을 얻고 관심을 받으려 했죠

Subtitle: My only real goal was to snog Ryan Gosling at the Met Ball.
Translation:
제 유일한 목표는 라이언 고슬링과
멧볼에서 키스를 하는 거였죠

Subtitle: Which I did.
Couple of times, actually.
But wait, why is Chidi here?
Well, uh...
There's something you don't know about me.
Translation:
당신이 나에 대해 모르는
무언가가 있어요

Subtitle: I read an article saying that growing almonds / was bad for the environment, and yet I continued to use / -almond milk in my coffee-- -No, dingus!
Translation:
나는 아몬드를 키우는 건
환경에 나쁘다는 / 기사를 읽었지만 커피 마실 때마다 / - 아몬드 우유를 사용했...
- 아니야, 멍청아!

Subtitle: You hurt everyone in your life with your rigidity and your indecisiveness.
Translation:
넌 너의 그 엄격함과
우유부단함으로 네 주변 모든 사람을 상처입혔어

Subtitle: Oh, fork!
You're right.
Every friend, every girlfriend was driven nuts / because I couldn't do anything.
Translation:
내 모든 친구들과 여자친구들은 / 제가 아무것도 못 해서
미칠 지경이었죠

Subtitle: I missed my mom's back surgery / because I had already promised my landlord's nephew / that I would help him figure out his new phone.
Translation:
집주인 조카에게 새 핸드폰을 / 알아봐 주는 걸 도와주겠다고
약속한 것 때문에 / 엄마 척추 수술에 가지 못했어요

Subtitle: I made everyone miserable.
I mean, all this hard work, all the planning, / all for nothing.
Translation:
이렇게 열심히 일하고
짜냈던 모든 계획은 / 다 쓸모없어졌어

Subtitle: This really sucks.
No, it doesn't.
This is wonderful.
You saw us all on Earth, / a selfish ass, an idiot DJ, a tortured academic, / a hot, rich fraud with legs for days...
Translation:
당신은 지구에서의
우리 모습을 봤잖아요 / 이기적인 놈, 멍청한 DJ
고문관 학자 / 섹시한 부자 사기꾼이며...

Subtitle: Side note, I might legit be into Tahani.
Translation:
잠깐 얘기하자면, 저도 아마
타하니에게 빠졌을 거예요

Subtitle: [chuckles] But that's for another time.
Translation:
잠깐 얘기하자면, 저도 아마
타하니에게 빠졌을 거예요 하지만 그건 다른 이야기고요

Subtitle: You thought we would torture each other, / and we did for a little, / but we also took care of each other.
Translation:
당신은 우리가 서로를
고문할 거로 생각했고 / 약간은 그랬어요 / 하지만 우린 서로를 돌보게 됐어요

Subtitle: We improved each other, / and the four of us became a team.
Translation:
우린 서로를
더 나은 사람으로 만들었어요 / 그리고 우리 넷은 팀이 되었죠

Subtitle: So, the only thing you succeeded in doing / was bringing us all together.
Translation: 그러니 당신이 성공한 유일한 건 / 우리를 뭉치게 한 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, Eleanor. That's it!
My big mistake was bringing you all together, / having you be soulmates living next to each other.
Translation:
오, 엘리너, 바로 그거야! 내 가장 큰 실수는
너희를 뭉치게 한 거야 / 소울메이트로 바로 옆에서
살게 하면서 말이지

Subtitle: Next time, I'll spread you out so it's more of a slow burn.
Translation:
다음번엔 너희를 떨어뜨려 놓겠어
더 천천히 고통받도록 말이야

Subtitle: -Uh, next time? -[Michael] Yeah.
Yeah, I'm gonna, uh, erase your memories, / you know, make a few changes and start over again.
Translation:
그래, 너희들 기억을 다 지울 거야 / 그리고 약간 변화를 주고
다시 시작하는 거지

Subtitle: Hopefully. Just gotta get the boss man to sign off.
Translation:
그러면 좋겠단 거야, 위의 허락을
받아야 해서 말이야

Subtitle: Wish me luck.
Guys, we need a plan. Quick.
Tahani, anything?
Chidi, I need ya. You're the smart one.
[stammering] I can't. I can't.
-[Eleanor] Jason? -What? What's up?
What do you say? Take two, huh?
I don't know.
I mean, what is this? All this work for four people.
Translation:
내 말은, 이게 뭔가? 네 명을 위해
준비한 이 모든 게 말이야

Subtitle: Look, for a first attempt it was actually very promising.
Translation:
첫 번째 시도치고는
정말 조짐이 좋았잖아요

Subtitle: Let me, let me just tinker a little, try again.
Translation:
제가... 제가 조금 손 보고
다시 하게 해주세요

Subtitle: Okay.
But you're way out on a limb here, Mike.
Translation:
하지만 이제 다른 사람의
도움은 없을 거야, 마이크

Subtitle: If this thing goes sideways again, you are done.
Translation:
이번에도 다시 다른 방향으로
흘러가면, 자넨 끝이야

Subtitle: Guys, he is going to erase our memories at any second / and all of this will have been for nothing.
Translation:
이봐요, 곧 마이클이
우리 기억을 지우고 / 이 모든 게 사라질 거예요

Subtitle: [grunts] You're useless!
What do I write? What do I write? Ooh, come on, brain.
Translation:
뭘 적어야 하지? 뭘 적어야 할까?
제발, 머리야

Subtitle: Janet?
You can't eat anything, right?
-Correct. -Open up.
Translation:
당신은 아무것도 못 먹죠? - 네
- 입 벌려요

Subtitle: All right, let's try again, shall we?
You know what, bro? Do your worst.
We figured it out once, we can do it again, / because you know what, Michael?
Translation:
우린 한 번 알아냈고
또 알아낼 수 있어요 / 왜냐하면 말이에요, 마이클?

Subtitle: -Ya bas-- -[snaps fingers]
Eleanor, come on in.
You, Eleanor Shellstrop, are dead.
Cool.
[Michael] You know the way you feel when you see / a chimpanzee and a baby tiger who've become friends?
Translation:
당신은 침팬지와 새끼 호랑이가 / 친구가 된 걸 볼 때 당신이
뭘 느끼는지 알아요

Subtitle: That's how you're going to feel every day.
Eleanor? I'm Chris Baker.
Cool. Bring it in, man.
So where are you from, Chris?
I'm from Teaneck, New Jersey, and I was a mailman.
Translation:
뉴저지 주 티넥에서 왔어요
난 우체부였어요

Subtitle: Really? [chuckles]
Chris, you'll stand by me no matter what, right?
Translation:
크리스, 무슨 일이 있어도
제 편이 되어 주실 거죠?

Subtitle: Hold that thought. Is it okay if I go work out?
Translation:
잠시만요, 가서 운동 좀
해도 괜찮을까요?

Subtitle: I love working out. I gotta stay jacked, it's who I am.
Translation:
난 운동을 좋아해요, 계속 흥분한
상태여야 해요, 이게 저예요

Subtitle: Yeah, you gotta.
Once I'm back, we'll get to know each other.
Translation:
제가 돌아오면, 서로에 대해
알아가도록 해요

Subtitle: Great.
Translation:
제가 돌아오면, 서로에 대해
알아가도록 해요 좋아요

Subtitle: -See ya soon. -[door closes]
-Hi, there. -[yelps and gasps]
-Who are you? -I'm Janet.
I think this is yours.
After I was rebooted, I found it in my mouth.
Translation:
제가 재시동된 후에
내 입안에서 찾았어요

Subtitle: What?
What the fork is a "Chidi"?
